Greatly repairs an ally construct, restoring 10 hit points per caster level (max 150hp), while simultaneously granting it an increase in attack speed (15% for melee and 22% for ranged) for a short time. Cooldown: 30/15/6 seconds. Cost: 35/30/25 SP

Enemies damaged by your melee attacks are Shaken for 6 seconds. Repeated damage extends the duration.
Shaken: -2 penalty on attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks, and ability checks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dwarf: Tactics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants a +[1/2/3] bonus on the DC of your combat feats.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dwarf: Child of the Mountain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Fortitude saves Rank 3: +5% Quality Bonus to Maximum Hitpoints.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dwarf: Weapon Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose the same Training from Dwarven Weapon Training, Tier 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Axe Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to hit and damage with battle axes, dwarven waraxes, hand axes, throwing axes, and greataxes. While using dwarven waraxe, +5% Strikethrough

EnhancementSelection.Name: Pick and Hammer Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to hit and damage with heavy picks, light hammer, light picks, throwing hammers, and warhammers. +1 to hit and +2 damage with mauls.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dwarf: Shield Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15]% Shield Armor Class and +[1/2/3] Tower Shield Maximum Dexterity Bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dwarf: Greater Dragonmark of Warding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Radiant Forcefield. (Your target is surrounded in a sphere of magical force that reduces all damage (Except for untyped damage) they take by 25% for a short period of time.) No spell point cost. (Cooldown: 1 minute.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dwarf: Dwarven Runes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +[1/2/3] to saves against spell effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dwarf: Stand Like Stone
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boost: For [12/15/20] seconds you gain +[10/20/30] Balance, Physical Resistance Rating, and stacking Energy Resistance, but have a 50% penalty to movement speed, sink in water, and cannot fly. (Cooldown: 3 minutes.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dwarf: Weapon Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose the same Training from Dwarven Weapon Training, Tier 2:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Axe Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to hit and damage with battle axes, dwarven waraxes, hand axes, throwing axes, and greataxes. While using dwarven waraxe, +5% Strikethrough. You gain dwarven waraxe as a Favored Weapon.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Pick and Hammer Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to hit and damage with heavy picks, light hammer, light picks, mauls, throwing hammers, and warhammers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dwarf: Hands of Stone
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Earthgrab Target corporeal creature is grabbed by earthen hands and rendered helpless. (Reflex DC 10 + Level + Constitution Modifier Negates + Transmutation Bonuses Negates)

DC.Name: Dwarf: Hands of Stone
DC.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Earthgrab Target corporeal creature is grabbed by earthen hands and rendered helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dwarf Fortress
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wearing full plate and using a shield, you gain +[1/2/3] Armor Class, Intimidate, and Will saving throws vs. Fear, and you deal +[3/5/7] Melee and Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dwarf: Weapon Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose the same Training from Dwarven Weapon Training, Tier 3

EnhancementSelection.Name: Axe Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to hit and damage with battle axes, dwarven waraxes, hand axes, throwing axes, and greataxes. While using dwarven waraxe, +10% Strikethrough

EnhancementSelection.Name: Pick and Hammer Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to hit and damage with heavy picks, light hammer, light picks, throwing hammers, and warhammers. +1 to hit and +2 damage with mauls.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Throw Your Weight Around
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose the same Weapon Type from Dwarven Weapon Training, Tier 4

EnhancementSelection.Name: Axes
EnhancementSelection.Description: You may use your Constitution modifier to determine the damage you deal with battle axes, dwarven waraxes, hand axes, greataxes and throwing axes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Picks and Hammers
EnhancementSelection.Description: You may use your Constitution modifier to determine the damage you deal with heavy picks, light hammer, light picks, mauls, throwing hammers, and warhammers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Accuracy I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks. Your Point Blank Shot and Ranged Sneak Attack range is increased by 2 meters for each Elven Core Ability you possess from this tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Dexterity I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Accuracy II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Dexterity II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Accuracy III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Phiarlan Dragonmark Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] dragonmark use per day, +[1/2/3] Hide

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Child of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are able to produce an Entangle effect using a drop of your blood (1 HP) and 10 spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Keen Senses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search, and Spot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Weapon Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants bonuses to hit and damage with a chosen set of weapons. Choose one:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Aerenal Weapon Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Longswords, Rapiers, and Longbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Valenar Weapon Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Scimitars, Falchions, and Shortbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Arcane Fluidity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your arcane spell failure chance while wearing armor is decreased by [5/10/15]%. (This has no effect on arcane spell failure from shields.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Lesser Dragonmark of Shadow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Shadow Walk

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Enchantment Lore
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] saves vs. Enchantments. Rank 3: You also gain +1 Enchantment spell DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Nothing is Hidden
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your senses are so acute that you no longer need to spend time searching for the obvious. You will automatically perform a Search check to locate traps and secret doors when you are in range to Spot them, although this Search check occurs at a -[12/8/4] penalty.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Weapon Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants bonuses to hit and damage with a chosen set of weapons. Choose one:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Aerenal Weapon Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Longswords, Rapiers, and Longbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Valenar Weapon Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Scimitars and Shortbows. +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Falchions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Arcanum
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/100] spell points and +[1/2/3] spell penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Greater Dragonmark of Shadow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Displacement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Fey Energy Tap
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: A drop of blood lets you tap into the endless energy of the realm of the fey, giving yourself or an ally temporary spell points, 10% incorporeality, and a -2 penalty to Will saving throws while they last. This ability can be used one/three/five times per rest. (Activation Cost: 1 HP. Cooldown: 2 minutes) (24 Spell points +6 per level)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Fey Sight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you have 100 or more spell points, you can see things as they truly are. You are able to see invisible creatures and pierce illusions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Weapon Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants bonuses to hit and damage with a chosen set of weapons. Choose one:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Aerenal Weapon Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Longswords, Rapiers, and Longbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Valenar Weapon Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Scimitars and Shortbows. +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Falchions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Arcane Archer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain access to the Arcane Archer enhancement tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Binding Shadows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Dark shadows wrap around an enemy, slowing it and draining its life force, applying 2d4 negative levels.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Elf: Grace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You may use Dexterity to damage with your chosen set of weapons. Choose one:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Aerenal Grace
EnhancementSelection.Description: You may use Dexterity to determine the damage you deal with Longswords, Rapiers, and Longbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Valenar Grace
EnhancementSelection.Description: You may use Dexterity to determine the damage you deal with Scimitars, Falchions, and Shortbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3% Doublestrike, +3% Doubleshot, +3% dodge, and bypass 3% dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Dodge, +1 Use Magic Device

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Dodge, +1 Use Magic Device

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Gnome: Sivis Dragonmark Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] dragonmark use per day, +[1/2/3] Use Magic Device

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Gnome: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75]% effectiveness from your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells, and +[1/2/3] to the save DC of your offensive wands.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Illusory Mark of Flame. This spell works acts as the Symbol of Flame spell, but with Illusion as its school and Will as its saving throw.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Gnome: Against the Giants
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gnomes have passed their tactics for eluding Giants down over generations. +[2/4/6] to Saving Throws and Armor Class against Giants.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Gnome: Greater Color Spray
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies are sprayed with illusions of color, and must make a Will save or be Dazed, Blinded, and/or Silenced. The target must make a saving throw for each effect. Activation Cost: [10/5/2] Spell Points. Cooldown: 8 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Gnome: Permanent Blur
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a permanent Blur effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Armor Maximum Dexterity Bonus and Maximum Dodge Bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Gnome Spell Focus: Illusion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Illusion DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Gnome: Weapon Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to hit and damage with light hammers, light maces, light picks, shortswords, shortbows, light crossbows, and light repeating crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Gnome: Favored Enemy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gnomes have a history of racial enmity with several kinds of creatures. Choose a Favored Enemy feat for one of these: Gnoll or Reptilian

EnhancementSelection.Name: Gnoll
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have Gnolls as a favored enemy

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reptillian
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have Reptiles as a favored enemy

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to hit and damage with light hammers, light maces, light picks, shortswords, shortbows, light crossbows, and light repeating crossbows. +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range with the same weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Saves Boost

EnhancementSelection.Name: Skill Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all skills for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Power Boost

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Greater Heroism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Greater Heroism. This ability shares a common pool of uses per rest with the Heroism ability. Effects that grant extra Action Boost uses give you additional uses per rest of this ability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Half Elven Versatile Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: As a Half-Elf you can choose which heritage you take after, giving you the choice of Human or Elven Core Abilities as you progress through the tree. Your Point Blank Shot and Ranged Sneak Attack range is increased by 2 meters for every Elven Core Ability you select.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an ability score increase, choosing whether to be more elven or human. Your selection here will affect your selection at level 11.

EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks

EnhancementSelection.Name: Attack Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active to gain a +6 Action Boost bonus to hit for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Damage Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +20% Action Boost to weapon damage for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Defense Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +10 Action Boost to Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Saves Boost

EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all skills for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Power Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +20 Action Boost to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Lyrandar Dragonmark Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] dragonmark uses per day, +[1/2/3] Balance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Diplomatic Immunity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Reduce physical damage you take by 25% for 15 seconds or until you attack. Until you rest you have -2 Diplomacy (stacks up to 100 times). On a shared cooldown with Half-Elven Social Graces, and your total Diplomacy score must be positive to use this ability. (Cooldown: 1 minute).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Skill Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a number of different skill to focus on:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Athletic
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Balance, Jump, Swim, and Tumble.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Awareness
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search, and Spot.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Focused
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration and Intimidate.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Negotiator
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle and Perform.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Nimble Fingers
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Disable Device and Open Lock.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Self Sufficient
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Heal and Repair.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stealthy
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Hide and Move Silently.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Improved Dilettante I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Dilettante feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Alchemist
EnhancementSelection.Description: +30 Maximum Spell Points. For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Alchemist (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Artificer
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your knowledge of magical items has improved, and now extends to potions. For item purposes you are now treated as a second level Artificer (or your character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Barbarian
EnhancementSelection.Description: You become more resilient and gain +10 Hit Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Bard
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Bard (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Cleric
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Cleric (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Druid
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Druid (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Favored Soul
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Favored Soul (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Fighter
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your skill with arms is improved and you gain +1 to hit and +1 weapon damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Monk
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your defensive skills have improved, and at level 2 or higher you are able to add up to 3 points of your Wisdom bonus to your armor class.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Paladin
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Lesser Divine Grace has improved and at level 2 or higher you may add up to 3 points of your charisma bonus to your saves. For item use purposes you are now treated as a second level Paladin (or your total character level, whichever is lower)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Ranger
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Lesser Bow Strength has improved and at level 2 or higher are able to add up to 4 points of your strength bonus to attacks with bows. For item use purposes you are now treated as a second level Ranger (or your total character level, whichever is lower)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Rogue
EnhancementSelection.Description: You practice stealthy attacks and gain +2 to hit with Sneak Attacks

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Sorcerer
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Sorcerer (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Warlock
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Warlock (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Wizard
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Wizard (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Arcane Fluidity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your arcane spell failure chance while wearing armor is decreased by 5%/10%/15%. (This has no effect on arcane spell failure from shields.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Lesser Dragonmark of Storm
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Electric Loop

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Improved Recovery I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Positive Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Dilettante Special Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain abilities from your Dilettante Class Enhancements

EnhancementSelection.Name: Armor Mastery
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Armor Class and +2 Maximum Dexterity Bonus when wearing Armor. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Armor Mastery enhancement from the Stalwart Defender tree

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conjure Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to create a stack of returning +1 arrows. These arrows are destroyed when you log out. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Conjure Arrows enhancement from the Arcane Archer tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Damage Reduction I
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Dilettante: Barbarian DR damage reduction is increased by 1/-. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Resistance enhancement from Occult Slayer tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Recovery I
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10% Positive Energy Healing. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Bastion of Purity enhancement from the Shintao Monk tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Spellcasting I
EnhancementSelection.Description: +5 Universal Spellpower

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lesser Divine Health
EnhancementSelection.Description: You are immune to Natural diseases, and gain +4 to saving throws against Magical disease and do not automatically fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sly Flourish
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: Deals +1[W] damage with +1 critical threat range, and reduces your threat with nearby enemies by 100. On Sneak Attack: Intelligent target also gains a -1 penalty to Balance, Reflex, and Will saves for 20 seconds. (Stack 5 times.) This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Sly Flourish enhancement from the Thief-Acrobat tree. (Cooldown: 12 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Call Lightning Storm

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Arcane Archer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain access to the Arcane Archer enhancement tree. (The Elf: Arcane Archer tree uses your total character level instead of Ranger level, but advances Core Abilities at a slower rate. You cannot spend action points in both the Ranger: Arcane Archer and Elf: Arcane Archer trees.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Power of the Storm
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Greater Dragonmark activate: Your attacks gain Shocking, +25 Electrical Spell Power, and you gain 10 temporary spell points any time you take electrical damage from a spell. You also gain +2 bonus to Reflex save, but suffer a -2 penalty to Caster Levels of Earth spells and -2 to your Fortitude Saves. This effect lasts for 2 seconds per point of Concentration skill you have. (Cooldown: 1 minute)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Improved Recovery II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Positive Healing Amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Dilettante Special Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain abilities from your Dilettante Class Enhancements

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Damage Reduction II
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Dilettante: Barbarian DR damage reduction is increased by 1/-. +10 Hit Points. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Resistance enhancement from Occult Slayer tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Recovery II
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10% Positive Energy Healing. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Bastion of Purity enhancement from the Shintao Monk tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Spellcasting II
EnhancementSelection.Description: +5 Universal Spellpower

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lesser Courage
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +4 to saving throws against fear and do not automatically fail saving throws against fear on a roll of a natural 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Master Tactics
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 to the DC's of your Tactical abilities. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Tactics enhancement from the Kensei tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Tanglefoot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Alchemical Trap Activate: Throws a cask of caustic liquid at your enemy, which explodes into a sticky mess. Enemies within the area of the goo puddle take 4d6 acid damage every 2 seconds and are slowed (Reflex DC 10 + Half Character Level + Intelligence Modifier Half). (Cooldown: 30 seconds.) This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Tanglefoot enhancement from the Mechanic tree.

EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +10% chance to make off-hand attacks when dual wielding. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Tempest enhancement from the Tempest tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Halfling: Lesser Dragonmark of Healing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Cure Serious Wounds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Halfling: Break Out The Leeches
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Positive Energy Leeches. Removes one negative level, one poison, and one disease from your living target once every 3 seconds. Duration is equal to your Heal skill. This ability shares a counter with Lesser Dragonmark of Healing.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Halfling: Nimble Reaction
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Armor Maximum Dexterity Bonus and Maximum Dodge Bonus

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Halfling: Guile I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Sneak attack die

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Halfling: Heroic Companion

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Halfling: Skillful Thrower
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use your Dexterity modifier for damage with returning thrown weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Halfling: Improved Dodge

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Sneak attack die

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Halfling: Master Thrower
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Competence bonus to the Critical Threat Range of returning thrown weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Halfling: Agility
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Up to once per second when you are hit, you gain 1% dodge until you are missed. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Halfling: Guile III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Sneak attack die

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Orcish Fury I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When below 80% health, you gain a +2 morale bonus to strength.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Orcish Strength I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Orcish Fury II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When below 60% health, you gain a +4 morale bonus to strength.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Orcish Strength II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Orcish Fury III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When below 40% health, you gain a +8 morale bonus to strength.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Tharashk Dragonmark Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] dragonmark use per day, +[1/2/3] Search

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Mighty Sundering
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Sunder DC's.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Brute Force
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks or spells make enemies more likely to attack you.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Brutal Fighting
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause your melee attacks to generate [25/50/75]% more hate, making enemies more likely to attack you.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Brutal Spellcasting
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your damaging spells generate [25/50/75]% more hate than they normally would, making enemies more likely to attack you.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Orcish Weapon Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to hit and damage when using two handed melee weapons and +1 to hit and damage when using one handed melee weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Stubborn
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] bonus to Will saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Lesser Dragonmark of Finding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Knock (Skill = Character Level + Charisma Modifier). Also allows you to use your Least Dragonmark of Finding an extra time per rest.

DC.Name: Knock
DC.Description: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Knock

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Lock Bash
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Attempt to pick a lock - with your fists. This ability operates as an Open Lock check using your Intimidate skill and Strength modifier.

DC.Name: Half-Orc: Lock Bash
DC.Description: Attempt to pick a lock - with your fists.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Extra Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Half-Orcs keep fighting long after other races tire. You can use each of your action boosts [1/2/3] additional times per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Orcish Weapon Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to hit and damage when using two handed melee weapons and +1 to hit and damage when using one handed melee weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Action Boost: Orcish Rage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boost: You become enraged, and gain gain +40 Melee Power and a +2 Primal Bonus to Strength. Using this ability prevents spellcasting and uncenters you. This Action Boost shares a cooldown with other Action Boosts. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Greater Dragonmark of Finding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Treasure Finding. Activate this ability to harness the bloodline of House Tharashk to cast Treasure Finding once per rest. Also allows you to use your Least and Lesser Marks of Finding an extra time per rest. Treasure Finding lets you target an unopened chest and twist fate for a chance at better rewards for the entire party. Chests can only be improved in this way once time, and there is a chance of failure based on your Charisma. (Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Great Weapon Aptitude
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/20]% Strikethrough

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Improved Power Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Power Attack feat does [1/2/3] additional point(s) of bonus damage but also has an additional -[1/2/3] to your attack bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Orcish Weapon Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to hit and damage when using two handed melee weapons and +1 to hit and damage when using one handed melee weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Raging Crush
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: +4[W] This attack is guaranteed to be a Critical Hit. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Brutality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your melee attacks deal an additional 20% damage to helpless opponents.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Weapon Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to hit and damage when using two handed melee weapons and +1 to hit and damage when using one handed melee weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Power Rage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When raging, you gain an additional +[1/2/3] Strength, but also get an additional -[1/2/3] penalty to AC.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Accuracy I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks. Your Point Blank Shot and Ranged Sneak Attack range is increased by 2 meters for each Elven Core Ability you possess from this tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Intelligence I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Accuracy II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Intelligence II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Accuracy III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Rejuvenation of Dawn
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Heals 10,000 hit point damage, and removes all ability damage, death penalty effects, negative levels, and the conditions blinded, dazed, deafened, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, feebleminded, insanity, nauseated, poisoned, and stunned. This ability can be used once per rest. Tier 2: This ability can be used on yourself or an ally, and you get an additional use per rest. (Cooldown: 3 minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Bane of the Restless
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Turn Undead ability now also deals [6/12/18]d6 light damage to nearby undead (no save). You also count as [2/4/6] levels higher when turning undead. This increases the maximum level of creature you can turn and also increases the total number of hit dice you can turn. In addition, you add an additional [2/4/6] to the number of hit dice you can turn.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Keen Senses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search, and Spot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Weapon Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Morningstars, Maces, and one-handed Hammers. +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Mauls.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Arcane Fluidity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your arcane spell failure chance while wearing armor is decreased by [5/10/15]%. (This has no effect on arcane spell failure from shields.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Blessing of Amaunator
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Amaunator blesses those in the area of effect with the following for 1 minute per caster level (3 uses per rest): Tier 1: Aid Tier 2: Aid and Spell Resistance Tier 3: Aid, Spell Resistance, and Death Ward

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Enchantment Lore
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] saves vs. Enchantments. Rank 3: You also gain +1 Enchantment spell DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Nothing Is Hidden
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your senses are so acute that you no longer need to spend time searching for the obvious. You will automatically perform a Search check to locate traps and secret doors when you are in range to Spot them, although this Search check occurs at a -[12/8/4] penalty.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Weapon Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Morningstars, Maces, and one-handed Hammers. +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Mauls.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Arcanum
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/100] spell points and +[1/2/3] spell penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Light of the Sun God
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +[10/20/30] Light spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Fey Energy Tap
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: A drop of blood lets you tap into the endless energy of the realm of the fey, giving yourself or an ally temporary spell points, 10% incorporeality, and a -2 penalty to Will saving throws while they last. This ability can be used one/three/five times per rest. (Activation Cost: 1 HP. Cooldown: 2 minutes) (24 Spell points +6 per level)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Fey Sight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you have 100 or more spell points, you can see things as they truly are. You are able to see invisible creatures and pierce illusions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Weapon Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Morningstars, Maces, and one-handed Hammers. +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Mauls.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Arcane Archer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain access to the Arcane Archer enhancement tree. (The Elf: Arcane Archer tree uses your total character level instead of Ranger level, but advances Core Abilities at a slower rate. You cannot spend action points in both the Ranger: Arcane Archer and Elf: Arcane Archer trees.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Amaunator's Brilliance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Sunburst Cooldown: [60/45/30] seconds Cost: 25 SP

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Aura of Radiance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The light of Amaunator shines perpetually upon you, protecting you and damaging those who would do you harm. You gain a light shield effect that deals 2d[6/8/10] light damage to enemies each time they attack you in melee. This applies to enemy misses as well as hits. You also gain a +[3/6/9] sacred bonus to Armor Class against attacks from shadows and other undead creatures.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Grace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You may use your Dexterity modifier to determine the damage you deal with Morningstars, Maces, and Hammers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Weapon Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Morningstars, Maces, and one-handed Hammers. +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Mauls.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Skill
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3% Doublestrike, +3% Doubleshot, +3% dodge, and bypass 3% dodge.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Defense Boost

EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all skills for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Power Boost

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Purple Dragon Knight: Cormyrean Knight Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You now use Charisma or Strength, whichever is higher, for attack and damage with shortswords, longswords, bastard swords, and Great Swords. In addition, as long as your Charisma remains higher than your Strength and you are wielding one of the above weapons, you receive a bonus to the DCs of your Tactical Feats equal to 1/3 your Charisma modifier.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Purple Dragon Knight: Skill Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Humans are versatile and can excel at virtually any skill.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Athletic
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Balance, Jump, Swim, and Tumble.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Awareness
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search, and Spot.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Focused
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration and Intimidate.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Negotiator
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle and Perform.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Nimble Fingers
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Disable Device and Open Lock.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Self Sufficient
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Heal and Repair.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stealthy
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Hide and Move Silently.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Positive Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Purple Dragon Knight: Don't Count Me Out
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your range of unconsciousness extends by [5/10/20] hitpoints, and you gain a +[3/6/10] bonus to Physical Resistance Rating while you are under 50% health.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Purple Dragon Knight: Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you use an Action Boost, you gain 5/10/15 Temporary Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Purple Dragon Knight: Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your presence is reassuring to your allies. All nearby allies get +2 unique bonus to their Will/+Fortitude/+Reflex saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Humans are adept at many different fighting styles.

EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +1 to hit when dual-wielding or fighting unarmed. Rank 2: Also gains +1% Dodge. Rank 3: Also gains +1 damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Great Weapon Aptitude
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[5/10/20]% Strikethrough

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shield Mastery
EnhancementSelection.Description: +5%/10%/15% Shield Armor Class and +[1/2/3] Tower Shield Maximum Dexterity Bonus.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sniper

EnhancementSelection.Name: Traditional caster
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[3/6/10] Universal Spell Power when wielding an Orb or Staff.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Purple Dragon Knight: Rallying Cry
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boost: You and all allies within your aura gain +[10/15/20]% Action Boost bonus to movement speed and +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Saving Throws for twenty seconds. This ability can be used while feared, and dispels fear effects. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Purple Dragon Knight: Shield Deflection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants use of the Shield Deflection feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Purple Dragon Knight: Final Stand
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boost: You and all allies within your aura gain Temporary Hit Points equal to your Intimidate score for twenty seconds. If you are below 50% Health when you use this ability, you gain a +20 Morale bonus to Physical Resistance Rating for twenty seconds (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Purple Dragon Knight: For Cormyr!
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Once per rest, you can heal to full. If you are below 50% health when this ability is used, you and all nearby allies gain a Morale bonus to weapon damage equal to your Charisma modifier for two minutes.
