EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Razorclaw Shifter: Magic Fang
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Increases the Enhancement Bonus of the target's natural weapon by 1, plus 1 per five caster levels. An item can have only one temporary item enhancement at a time. Only works on players, hirelings, or pets, and only if they are Animals, Vermin, Magical Beats, Dragons, or Fey. Equipping a new weapon cancels the effect. Cost: 8 Hitpoints Cooldown: 20 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Razorclaw Shifter: Shred
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Handwrap Attack: Requires equipped Handwraps. Make an attack similar to the Druid Spell Shred. This attack deals an extra 3[W] damage, with +1 bonus to critical threat multiplier to the target, and you may reduce the target's Armor Class by 4 for a short time. Some creatures may be immune to the sunder effect. Fortitude save negates. DC: 10 + Half Character Level + Highest of (Wis/Str) + Sunder bonuses.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Razorclaw Shifter: Destructive Shifting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While under the effects of Razorclaw Shift, you gain Improved Destruction, +2 to Hit and Damage with Handwraps, and trip enemies for 2 seconds on a Vorpal hit. Your Iconic Rage now uncenters you.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Razorclaw Shifter: Pounce
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Rush forward, dealing +[2/4/6]W to targets near you when you land. +[0/1/1] Critical Threat Range and +[0/0/1] Multiplier with this attack.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Razorclaw Shifter: Stronger Howl
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you Howl, nearby enemies take -2 to Armor Class, minus an additional 2 per 5 Character Levels you have for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Razorclaw Shifter: Second Claw
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10]% chance to make offhand attachs, +[1/2/3]% Offhand Doublestrike

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Razorclaw Shifter: Favored Enemy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Favored Enemy

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Animal
EnhancementSelection.Description: You receive the Favored Enemy: Animal feat: You receive a damage bonus when attacking animals.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Fey
EnhancementSelection.Description: You receive the Favored Enemy: Fey feat: You receive a damage bonus when attacking fey creatures.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Magical Beast
EnhancementSelection.Description: You receive the Favored Enemy: Magical Beast feat: You receive a damage bonus when attacking magical beats.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Plant
EnhancementSelection.Description: You receive the Favored Enemy: Plant feat: You receive a damage bonus when attacking plants.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Reptilian
EnhancementSelection.Description: You receive the Favored Enemy: Reptilian feat: You receive a damage bonus when attacking reptilian creatures.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Vermin
EnhancementSelection.Description: You receive the Favored Enemy: Vermin feat: You receive a damage bonus when attacking vermin.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Razorclaw Shifter: Overwhelming Shifting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While under the effects of Razorclaw Shift, you gain +2 to Hit and Damage with Handwraps and a +1 Primal bonus to Critical Multiplier with Handwraps.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Razorclaw Shifter: True Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 to Saves vs. Enchantments and Illusions, Freedom of Movement, and +10 to Spot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Razorclaw Shifter: Relentless Onslaught
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Handwraps Attack: Requires equipped Handwraps. Make an attack similar to the Druid spell Relentless Onslaught: Perform a melee attack that deals an extra 5[W], +1 bonus to critical threat and multiplier, and knocks your target down for 4 seconds. For up to 20 seconds afterwards, as long as the target stays down, every successful hit aginst the target has a 30% chance of knocking it down again. Activation Cost: 15 Hit Points. Cooldown: 1 minute 15 Seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Stronger Bonds I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 use of Healing Hands per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Stronger Bonds II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 more uses of Healing Hands per rest. Bond of the Scourge now grants you Ghost Touch on all weapon attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Stronger Bonds III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 more uses of Healing Hands per rest. You recharge one use of Healing Hands every 3 minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Scourge Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain proficiency with Clubs, Light Maces, Heavy Maces, and Morningstars. If you are Good, any of these four weapons you wield are considered Good.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Counsel
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to the Heal, Listen, and Spot skills

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: True Resilience
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to your Fortitude Saving Throws

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Bold
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You overcome fear quickly - fear and shaken effects are removed from you after [12/6/3] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Improved Recovery I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Improved Scourge Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 5% Doublestrike. If you have the Two Weapon Fighting feat, this grants the Oversized Two Weapon Fighting feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Arcanum
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/100] spell points and +[1/2/3] spell penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Divine Purpose
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain an active ability with one charge per rest. Must have your Bond Feat active to use. Scourge: You gain the furious aura of the Scourge of the Undead. For one minute, your weapon attacks deal 3d6 extra Light damage that scales with the higher of your Melee or Ranged Power. On Vorpal, enemies are Blinded.

Stance.Name: Divine Purpose
Stance.Description: Scourge: You gain the furious aura of the Scourge of the Undead. For one minute, your weapon attacks deal 3d6 extra Light damage that scales with the higher of your Melee or Ranged Power. On Vorpal, enemies are Blinded.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Divine Resolve
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Scourge: +[1/2/3] Constitution while your Divine Purpose is active.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Greater Scourge Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While dual-wielding Clubs, Light Maces, Heavy Maces, and Morningstars, you gain 5% chance to make off-hand attacks and 5% chance to doublestrike with your off-hand. Passive: +2 Melee and Ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Strike Down the Dead
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3][W] melee attack with +[1/2/3] Critical Threat Range. 15 second cooldown. On hit: Deals 1d4+4 per Character Level (scales with 100% Melee Power) in Positive Damage to Undead creatures.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Divine Charge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Purpose Charges

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Blessing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[10/20/30] Positive Spellpower

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Improved Recovery II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Destroyer of the Dead
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Clubs, Light Maces, Heavy Maces, and Morningstars you wield gain a +1 Sacred Bonus to Critical Multiplier. Passive: Grants +4 Melee and Ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Divine Form
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: 30sp, toggles off on rest. Must have your Bond Feat active to use. Mutually exclusive with Form feats (PM, Druid, etc). Stage 1: When this stance is enabled, you gain +1 to Hit and Damage, 1% Doubleshot, and 1% Doublestrike. Stage 2: After 20 seconds of this stance being active, these bonuses double. Stage 3: After 40 seconds of this stance being active, you also gain a 10% Action Boost Bonus to Attack Speed, 10% Action Boost bonus to Melee Power, and 5% Action Boost bonus to Ranged Power, but you take your Character Level in Light damage every second until the stance is toggled off. Stage 4: After 60 seconds of this stance being active, all of your bonuses from this stance double once more, but you take one stack of Vulnerability every second. Stage 5: After 70 seconds of this stance being active, your movement speed will drop dramatically. Stage 6: After 75 seconds of this stance being active, you can no longer contain the radiance within, and it will consume you.

Stance.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Divine Form
Stance.Description: Toggle: 30sp, toggles off on rest. Must have your Bond Feat active to use. Mutually exclusive with Form feats (PM, Druid, etc). Stage 1: When this stance is enabled, you gain +1 to Hit and Damage, 1% Doubleshot, and 1% Doublestrike. Stage 2: After 20 seconds of this stance being active, these bonuses double. Stage 3: After 40 seconds of this stance being active, you also gain a 10% Action Boost Bonus to Attack Speed, 10% Action Boost bonus to Melee Power, and 5% Action Boost bonus to Ranged Power, but you take your Character Level in Light damage every second until the stance is toggled off. Stage 4: After 60 seconds of this stance being active, all of your bonuses from this stance double once more, but you take one stack of Vulnerability every second. Stage 5: After 70 seconds of this stance being active, your movement speed will drop dramatically. Stage 6: After 75 seconds of this stance being active, you can no longer contain the radiance within, and it will consume you.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Improved Recovery III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Grit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 to your Fortitude saves. In addition, when you are uncounscious and have stabilized, you get up ten seconds faster than normal.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity, Intelligence or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Shadow Phase
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You become invisible and are able to move through monsters as if you were ethereal for six seconds. (Cooldown: 1 minute)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Shadow Jaunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You become invisible and charge forward. During the jaunt, you are able to move through monsters as if you were ethereal. These effects last for six seconds. (Cooldown: 1 minute)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Empowered Jaunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The cooldown of your Shadow Jaunt and Shadow Phase abilities is reduced to 30 seconds. In addition, when you use either ability, nearby allies become partially incorporeal for six seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Spiked Chain Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Perform an AOE melee attack for 1d6+4 damage plus 1d6 additional damage per level to all nearby enemies. Targets can attempt a reflex save for half damage. The DC is based on your level and Dexterity modifier.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Keen Senses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search, and Spot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Bold
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You overcome fear quickly - fear and shaken effects are removed from you after [12/6/3] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Student of Pain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you take damage, you have a [5/10/15]% chance to gain a +10 bonus to AC for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Stealthy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Hide and Move Silently. Tier 3: Throw attacks you perform while sneaking deal +1[W] damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Vicious Chain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Spiked Chain Attack now has a chance to cause enemies to bleed. Some enemies are immune to bleeding.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Improved Dodge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3]% Dodge when wearing light or no armor.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Ghostly Essence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you are below 50% hit points and get hit by an attack, you gain 25% incorporeality for [6/12/18] seconds. This can occur once every two minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Guile I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Sneak Attack die.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Shadow Smoke
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Use an Action Boost charge. All nearby allies gain +[5/10/15] to Hide and Move Silently for twenty seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Slashing Chain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Spiked Chain Attack now does an aditional 1d10+10 slashing damage to all nearby enemies it hits.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Forceful Chain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Spiked Chain Attack now has a chance to knock enemies down.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Improved Ghostly Essence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When your Ghostly Essence triggers, all nearby allies becomes partially incorporeal for [6/12/18] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Guile II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Sneak Attack die.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Whirling Chain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Perform a 20 seconds long chain attack that deals constant damage to foes in the area around you and increases your defense against incoming attacks with 10 Physical Resistance while active. Every 4 to 5 seconds that you continue to whirl your chain, you deal an extra burst of damage to those in the area. The amount of this extra damage increases over time up to 10d10 + 60 damage. If you move while using Whirling Chain, the attack will be interrupted. (Cooldown: 3 minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Nothing is Hidden
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your senses are so acute that you no longer need to spend time searching for the obvious. You will automatically perform a Search check to locate traps and secret doors when you are in range to Spot them, although this Search check occurs at a -[12/8/4] penalty.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Winter Favored
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Your sneak attacks deal 1d6 extra Cold damage, and you gain 5 Cold resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Gloom Stalker
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While sneaking, your melee weapons gain the ability to envelop their targets in darkness, making them briefly vulnerable to sneak attacks. Your weapons also have a chance to blind their targets for a short time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Extra Shifting I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Rage uses per rest. (You expend Rage uses to activate your Shifting).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between +1 Constitution, Dexterity, Strength or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Extra Shifting II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 Rage uses per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between +1 Constitution, Dexterity, Strength or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Regenerating Shift
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You regenerate 1 Rage use every 90 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Brute Fighting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an option

EnhancementSelection.Name: Brutal Spellcasting
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your damaging spells generate [25/50/75]% more hate than they normally would, making enemies more likely to attack you. Cooldown: 2 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Brutal Fighting
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause your melee attacks to generate [25/50/75]% more hate, making enemies more likely to attack you. Cooldown: 2 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Hunt & Track
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Spot, Listen and Intimidate

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Extend Shifting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Shifting and Barbarian rages last [25/50/75]% longer.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Hardy Shifting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Constitution while Shifting or Raging.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Self Reliant
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Will Saving Throws

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Shifted Defenses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an upgrade based on your subrace

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shifted Defenses
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[4/8/12] Physical Resistance Rating while Raging

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shifted Senses
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[3/6/10] Spot and +[2/4/]% Dodge while Raging

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Natural Armor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Natural Armor

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Howl
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an effect.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Beasthide Howl
EnhancementSelection.Description: Release a mighty howl, granting nearby allies +2 Action Boost Bonus to PRR and MRR, plus an additional 2 per 5 Character Levels you have for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wildhunt Howl
EnhancementSelection.Description: Release a mighty howl, granting nearby allies +1 Action Boost Bonus to Saving Throws, plus an additional 1 per 10 Character Levels you have for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Magic Fang
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Increases the Enhancement Bonus of the target's natural weapon by 1, plus 1 per five caster levels. An item can have only one temporary item enhancement at a time. Only works on players, hirelings, or pets, and only if they are Animals, Vermin, Magical Beats, Dragons, or Fey. Equipping a new weapon cancels the effect. Cost: 8 Hitpoints Cooldown: 20 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Maul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: Requires an equipped Melee weapon. Make an attack similar to the Druid Spell Maul. This attack deals an extra 2[W] to the target, and applies a bleeding effect that deals 1d4 slash damage every 2 seconds for 8 seconds. Striking the target successfully may also intimidate the target based on the player's intinidate skill.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Empowered by Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an upgrade based on your subrace

EnhancementSelection.Name: Empowered by Nature: Beasthide
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[10/20/30] Positive Healing Amplification. You are now immune to Fatigue, including Fatigue from Shifting.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Empowered by Nature: Wildhide
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[25/50/100] Maximum Spell Points. You can now cast while Raging. You are now immune to Fatigue, including Fatigue from Shifting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Augment Summoning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants the Augment Summoning feat: Your summoned creatures, charmed minions, pets, and hirelings have +4 to all ability scores, increased health, and increased fortification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Stronger Howl
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an effect.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stronger Howl: Beasthide
EnhancementSelection.Description: When you Howl, nearby enemies take -2 to Attack, minus an additional 2 per per 5 Character Levels you have for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stronger Howl: Wildhunt
EnhancementSelection.Description: When you Howl, nearby enemies take -1 to Saving Throws, minus an additional 1 per 5 Character Levels you have for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Favored Enemy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Favored Enemy

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Animal
EnhancementSelection.Description: You receive the Favored Enemy: Animal feat: You receive a damage bonus when attacking animals.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Fey
EnhancementSelection.Description: You receive the Favored Enemy: Fey feat: You receive a damage bonus when attacking fey creatures.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Magical Beast
EnhancementSelection.Description: You receive the Favored Enemy: Magical Beast feat: You receive a damage bonus when attacking magical beats.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Plant
EnhancementSelection.Description: You receive the Favored Enemy: Plant feat: You receive a damage bonus when attacking plants.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Reptilian
EnhancementSelection.Description: You receive the Favored Enemy: Reptilian feat: You receive a damage bonus when attacking reptilian creatures.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Vermin
EnhancementSelection.Description: You receive the Favored Enemy: Vermin feat: You receive a damage bonus when attacking vermin.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Exceptional Shifting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an effect based on your subrace

EnhancementSelection.Name: Threatening Shift
EnhancementSelection.Description: While raging, +20% to Threat Generation, +10 Physical resistance rating and +5% Quality Bonus to Maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wild Magic
EnhancementSelection.Description: While raging, gain Lesser Dispacement. When you activate a Rage, you gain Temporary Spell Points equal to 5 + double your Character Level. These last for 5 minutes, until you dismiss or activate another rage, or until used.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: True Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 to Saves vs. Enchantments and Illusions, Freedom of Movement and +10 to Spot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shifter: Howl of Terror
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You utter a terrifying howl, filling your foes with a paralyzing fear. Foes around you are paralyzed for 6 to 24 seconds. Will save (18 + Wis Mod + Enchantment bonuses) negates. This can be cast while Raging. Cost: 45/40/30 SP Cooldown: 20/15/10 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Bloodhunt I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your weapon attacks deal an additional 1d4 Fire damage to enemies under 75% HP. This damage scales with 100% Spell Power.
Passive: +5 Fire Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Charisma I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Bloodhunt II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your weapon attacks deal an additional 1d6 Fire damage to enemies under 50% HP. This damage scales with 100% Spell Power.
Passive: +10 Fire Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Charisma II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Bloodhunt III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your weapon attacks deal an additional 1d8 Fire damage to enemies under 25% HP. This damage scales with 200% Spell Power.
Passive: +20 Fire Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Hellish Rebuke
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enveloped in a cloak of infernal flame, you have a chance to deal fire damage to foes that strike you in melee range. Enemies have a chance to take 1d10 Fire Damage +1 per Character Level, max 30. This damage scales with Fire Spell Power. 5 Minutes + 1 Minute per character level duration. Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Infernal Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Bluff, Spellcraft and Balance

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Innate Protection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Saves vs Spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75]% damage and healing of your wands, scrolls and other items that cast spells. Adds +[1/2/3] to the save DCs of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Obscuring Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can channel your fiendish nature to manifest a zone of Obscuring Darkness at will. Foes inside the darkness suffer a 20% chance of missing any attack they make due to concealment. This does not apply to attacking misted targets from outside. Further Enhancements can modify how Obscuring Darkness can affect both you and your enemies. Lasts 30 seconds, Activation cost: 10 Spell Points Cooldown: 30 Seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Ferocious Rebuke
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Hellish Rebuke is active, enemies that strike you have a chance to be tripped with no save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Infernal Resistance I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tieflings are naturally immune to certain elements.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Resistance (Acid)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Acid Resistance equal to your Character Level.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Resistance (Cold)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Cold Resistance equal to your Character Level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Infernal Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Magical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Traditionalist Caster
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Universal Spell Power while wielding an Orb or Staff.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Lasting Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies that enter your Obscuring Darkness have a chance to be blinded with no save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Ash
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can cast the spell Scorch as a Spell Like Ability, with its Caster Level based on your Character Level. Subsequent ranks in this ability reduce the cooldown and Spell Point cost. Activation cost: [8/6/4] Spell Points Cooldown: [20/15/10] seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Infernal Resistance II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tieflings are naturally immune to certain elements.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Resistance (Acid)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Acid Resistance equal to your Character Level.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Resistance (Cold)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Cold Resistance equal to your Character Level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Inceneration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% Spell Critical Chance with all spells, plus an additional 2% with Fire Spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Student of Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Obscuring Darkness, you gain +3 Saving Throws, +3 Magical Resistance Rating and +15 Magical Resistance Cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Improved Scorch
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies affected by you Scorch spell increase Fire damage that take by 5%. When cast on a creature that is immune to Fire, it makes them vulnerable to that element for a short period of time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Infernal Sovereign
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Fire mastery conquers other elements.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Sovereign (Acid)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You use your Fire Spell Power in place of your Acid Spell Power if it is higher, and vice versa.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Sovereign (Cold)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You use your Fire Spell Power in place of your Cold Spell Power if it is higher, and vice versa.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Sovereign (Electric)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You use your Fire Spell Power in place of your Electric Spell Power if it is higher, and vice versa.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Incineration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% Spell Critical Chance with all spells, plus an additional 2% with Fire Spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Servant of Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Obscuring Darkness, you gain +[10/20/30] Universal Spell Power and +[1/2/2] Evocation and Conjuration DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Bloodsong I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your weapon attacks deal an additional 1d4 Sonic damage to enemies under 75% HP. This damage scales with 100% Spell Power.
Passive: +5 Fire and Sonic Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Charisma I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Bloodsong II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your weapon attacks deal an additional 1d6 Sonic damage to enemies under 50% HP. This damage scales with 100% Spell Power.
Passive: +10 Fire and Sonic Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Charisma II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Bloodsong III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your weapon attacks deal an additional 1d8 Sonic damage to enemies under 25% HP. This damage scales with 200% Spell Power.
Passive: +20 Fire and Sonic Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Hellish Rebuke
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enveloped in a cloak of infernal flame, you have a chance to deal fire damage to foes that strike you in melee range. Enemies have a chance to take 1d10 Fire Damage +1 per Character Level, max 20. This damage scales with Fire Spell Power. 5 Minutes + 1 Minute per character level duration. Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Scoundrel's Skills
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Balance, Bluff and Diplomacy

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Dashing Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are trained in the art of fine weaponry. You have +1 to Hit and Damage with the following weapons: Shortsword, Rapier, Hand Axe, Light Hammer and Light Crossbow

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Innate Protection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Saves vs Spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Obscuring Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can channel your fiendish nature to manifest a zone of Obscuring Darkness at will. Foes inside the darkness suffer a 20% chance of missing any attack they make due to concealment. This does not apply to attacking misted targets from outside. Further Enhancements can modify how Obscuring Darkness can affect both you and your enemies. Lasts 30 seconds, Activation cost: 10 Spell Points Cooldown: 30 Seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Hellish Reverberation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Hellish Rebuke is active, enemies that strike you have a chance to be dazed with no save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Infernal Resistance I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tieflings are naturally immune to certain elements.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Resistance (Acid)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Acid Resistance equal to your Character Level.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Resistance (Cold)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Cold Resistance equal to your Character Level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Improved Dashing Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Hit and Damage with your Dashing Weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Traditionalist Caster
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Universal Spell Power while wielding an Orb or Staff.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Lasting Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies that enter your Obscuring Darkness have a chance to be blinded with no save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Ash Imprisonment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Fiendish Arpeggio attempts to turn your target to Ash. This acts similarly to a Flesh to Stone Spell, and affects anything your Fascinate can affect. Bosses immune and instead take -4 AC and 25% Fort penalties. DC (1d20+Perform Skill) vs Will Duration: 20 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Infernal Resistance II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tieflings are naturally immune to certain elements.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Resistance (Acid)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Acid Resistance equal to your Character Level.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Resistance (Cold)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Cold Resistance equal to your Character Level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Greater Dashing Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to Hit and Damage with your Dashing Weapons as well as 1 sneak attack die.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Scoundrel's Inspiration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Bardic Ballad grants an additional +[1/2/3] to Attack and +[3/6/9] to Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Dance in the Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Obscuring Darkness, you gain +3 Saving Throws, +3 Magical Resistance Rating, and +15 Magical Resistance Cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Staccato Sovereign
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You use your Sonic spell power as if it were your Fire spell power if it is higher, and vice versa.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Charm Hearts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies that attack you have a 10% chance to be subjegated to a Fascinate effect (Will Save vs 1d20 + Perform Skill negates).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Enthralling Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wielding a Dashing Weapon, you gain +2 hit and damage, 1 Sneak Attack Die, and 1 Enchantment DC while using a Dashing Weapon

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Magic of Melodies
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Enchantment DC, +1 Caster Level and +1 Max Caster Level with Enchantment Spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Sonata of Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While inside Obscuring Darkness, you gain Displacement, +5% Dodge, +2 to Enchantment DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Improved Fortification I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your base fortification is increased to 50%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Constitution I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Improved Fortification II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your base fortification is increased to 75%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Constitution II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Improved Fortification III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your base fortification is increased to 100%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Construct Nature I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one

EnhancementSelection.Name: Construct Hardiness
EnhancementSelection.Description: Grants +[1/2/3] to Fortitude saving throws.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Construct Thinking
EnhancementSelection.Description: Grants +[1/2/3] to Will saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Repair Systems
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose whether to embrace your construct nature, or strive for humanity.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Healer's Friend
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your penalty to Positive Energy Healing is reduced from 50% to [40/30/20]%.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mechanist
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] Repair skill and +20/30/40 Repair amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Inscribed Armor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Reduces your body's inherent arcane spell failure by [5/10/15]%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Construct Toughness I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 10 hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Construct Stability
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] to the Repair skill and +[2/4/6] to the Balance skill.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Construct Nature II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one (cannot take the same as tier 1)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Construct Hardiness
EnhancementSelection.Description: Grants +[1/2/3] to Fortitude saving throws.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Construct Thinking
EnhancementSelection.Description: Grants +[1/2/3] to Will saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Tactics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to the DC's of your Tactical abilities.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Great Weapon Aptitude
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/20]% Strikethrough

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Construct Toughness II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 10 hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Damage Reduction
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain damage reduction [1/2/3]/Adamantine, or improve your existing damage reduction by [1/2/3]/Adamantine.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Improved Body
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves Mithral or Adamantine Body feats.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Adamantine Durability
EnhancementSelection.Description: Grants +[3/6/10] Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mithral Fluidity
EnhancementSelection.Description: Increases the maximum dexterity bonus and reduces the armor check penalty of your mithral body plating by [1/2/3].

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Brute Fighting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to cause your melee attacks to generate [25/50/75]% more hate, making enemies more likely to attack you. (Cooldown: 2 seconds)

Stance.Name: Brute Fighting
Stance.Description: Activate this ability to cause your melee attacks to generate [25/50/75]% more hate, making enemies more likely to attack you. (Cooldown: 2 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Improved Power Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Power Attack feat does [1/2/3] additional point of bonus damage but also has an additional -[1/2/3] to your attack bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Construct Toughness III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 10 hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Memories of the Last War I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You recall distant memories of the War.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Arcane Slinger
EnhancementSelection.Description: +25 Determination bonus to Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Final Witness
EnhancementSelection.Description: +3 Determination bonus to all Saving Throws.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Front Lines
EnhancementSelection.Description: +15 Determination bonus to Melee Power and Ranged Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spellcarved Soldier
EnhancementSelection.Description: +8 Determination bonus to Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Weapon Attachment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to attach your currently equipped weapons to yourself, giving you superior control over them. Until you unequip these items or rest, they deal +0.5[W] damage. (Cooldown: 3 minutes)

Stance.Name: Weapon Attachment
Stance.Description: You current weapon is attached to you giving better control. You deal +0.5[W] damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Resolve
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boost: You gain temporary hit points equal to your Repair Skill. If you are below half health, you gain a +2 bonus to all saving throws while these temporary hit points last. (Cooldown: 3 minutes).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Construct Toughness IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 10 hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Memories of the Last War II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You recall distant memories of the War.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Arcane Slinger
EnhancementSelection.Description: +25 Determination bonus to Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Final Witness
EnhancementSelection.Description: +3 Determination bonus to all Saving Throws.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Front Lines
EnhancementSelection.Description: +15 Determination bonus to Melee Power and Ranged Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spellcarved Soldier
EnhancementSelection.Description: +8 Determination bonus to Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Accuracy I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks. Your Point Blank Shot and Ranged Sneak Attack range is increased by 2 meters for each Elven Core Ability you possess from this tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Nature I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between +1 Dexterity or +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Accuracy II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Nature II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between +1 Dexterity or +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Accuracy III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Adept of Trees
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Tumble and Hide skills +[1/2/3] to Saves versus Poison and Disease

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Child of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are able to produce an Entangle effect using a drop of your blood (1 HP) and 10 spell points. Primal magic awakens plants and vines to grasp at the caster's enemies. Entangled creatures suffer a 90% penalty to movement speed, a 50% attack speed penalty and a -1 penalty to attack rolls, AC and Reflex. A successful Reflex save (DC: 10 + Half Character Level + Wisdom Modifier) negates the effect. Entangled creatures may leave the affected area to escape it's effects, or attempt to make a Strength check every 2 seconds to negate. Area of effect fire spells will destory these vines and free any entangled creatures. Incorporeal creatures and oozes are naturally immune. Fire elementals and other fire creatures are immune because they burn through the plants.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Keen Senses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search, and Spot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Weapon Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 to hit and damage with Longswords, Rapiers, Scimitars, Shortbows, and Longbows, as well as +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Falchions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Arcane Fluidity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your arcane spell failure chance while wearing armor is decreased by [5/10/15]%. (This has no effect on arcane spell failure from shields.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Wild Step
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +5 to Tumble. When you tumble, you gain a +10% Action Boost bonus to movement speed and a 10% Action Boost bonus to Missile Deflection for 10 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Enchantment Lore
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] saves vs. Enchantments. Rank 3: You also gain +1 Enchantment spell DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Nothing is Hidden
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your senses are so acute that you no longer need to spend time searching for the obvious. You will automatically perform a Search check to locate traps and secret doors when you are in range to Spot them, although this Search check occurs at a -[12/8/4] penalty.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Weapon Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 to hit and damage with Longswords, Rapiers, Scimitars, Shortbows, and Longbows, as well as +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Falchions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Arcanum
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/100] spell points and +[1/2/3] spell penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Forest Origins
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an option:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Faith of the Forest
EnhancementSelection.Description: You now count Rapiers, Falchions, and Shortbows as Favored Weapons, regardless of your Deity, for the purpose of everything in the Warpriest tree, the War Soul tree, Favored Soul Grace/Knowledge of Battle feats. (Your basic Deity Feats do not add hit+damage with these weapons).

EnhancementSelection.Name: Oath of the Wild
EnhancementSelection.Description: You take an oath to forgo metal armor, metal shields, and Rune Arms. As long as you do not have these equipped, you gain +10 PRR.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Rugged Upbringing
EnhancementSelection.Description: While raging, you gain +5% Doublestrike with Longswords, Rapiers, Scimitars and Falchions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Fey Energy Tap
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: A drop of blood lets you tap into the endless energy of the realm of the fey, giving yourself or an ally temporary spell points, 10% incorporeality, and a -2 penalty to Will saving throws while they last. This ability can be used [1/3/5] times per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Fey Sight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you have 100 or more spell points, you can see things as they truly are. You are able to see invisible creatures and pierce illusions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Weapon Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 to hit and damage with Longswords, Rapiers, Scimitars, Shortbows, and Longbows, as well as +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Falchions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Arcane Archer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain access to the Arcane Archer enhancement tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Forest's Versatility
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an option:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Drive Them Back
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10% Chance of Shield Bash with non-metal shields.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ferocity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +3 to Damage while using Two Handed Weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Like a Leaf
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 to Attack and Damage while Single Weapon Fighting.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Through the Branches
EnhancementSelection.Description: +3% Doubleshot with Longbows and Shortbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Vigor
EnhancementSelection.Description: Vigor SLA: A positive energy conjuration that heals 1d6, +1 per 3 caster levels (max +3 at caster level 9), every 2 seconds for 8 seconds. When the initial effect expires, a smaller healing effect that heals 1 HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds is applied.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wild Swings
EnhancementSelection.Description: +5% Offhand Strike Chance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Forest's Finesse
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You may use Dexterity to determine the damage you deal with Longswords, Rapiers, Scimitars, Falchions, Shortbows and Longbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Weapon Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 to hit and damage with Longswords, Rapiers, Scimitars, Shortbows, and Longbows, as well as +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Falchions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Skill
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3% Doublestrike, +3% Doubleshot, +3% dodge, and bypass 3% dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Determination
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to your Will Saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Alchemical Shield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Cloth armor or Composite Body, your equipped armor or docent grants you a +4 Alchemical bonus to Armor Class and immunity to Magic Missiles. While your Reaction is Verdanite, +5 Positive and Negative Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Curative Admixture: Cure Serious Wounds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Curative Admixture: Cure Serious Wounds Metamagic: Empower, Empower Heal, Maximize, Intensify Spell Point Cost: 4 Cooldown 8 seconds
Infuses a Cure Serious Wounds potion with magical energy, hurling it towards your target in an arc. The potion explodes in a small AOE that deals 3d6+6 plus 1 per caster level (maximum caster level 15) positive energy damage to nearby living allies and enemy undead. This infusion is affected by Artificer/Alchemist Knowledge: Potions.
Passive: +1 Spell Penetration While your Reaction is Verdanite, +5 Positive and Negative Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Spill the Bad Stuff
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Spill the Bad Stuff Metamagic: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Heighten, Intensify Spell Point Cost: 15 Cooldown 12 seconds Primer Element: Gildleaf
Deals 1d6+4 per Caster Level of a random type of damage to enemies in a short cone. The damage all scales with Positive Spell Power. Affected enemies have a chance to be Blinded, Dazed, Silenced, Tripped, Stunned, or Paralyzed. (Fortitude save negates).
Passive: While your Reaction is Verdanite, you get +2% Positive and Negative Spell Critical Damage and 5% Magical Efficiency (reduced spell point cost).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Curative Admixture: Heal
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Curative Admixture: Heal Metamagic: Empower, Empower Heal, Maximize, Intensify Spell Point Cost: 45 Cooldown 12 seconds Primer Element: Gildleaf
Infuses a Heal potion with magical energy, hurling it towards your target in an arc. The potion explodes in a small AOE that deals 3d6+6 plus 1 per caster level (maximum caster level 15) of positive energy damage to nearby living allies and enemy undead. This also grants you the Spell-Like Ability: Curative Admixture: Harm.
Passive: While your Reaction is Verdanite, +1 Transmutation DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Genius Never Dies
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+4 Intelligence. +20 Concentration. +1000 Unconscious Range. You gain the Diehard feat. +1 Spell Penetration.
Passive: While your Reaction is Verdanite, +2 Transmutation DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Curative Admixture: Cure or Inflict Light Wounds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Curative Admixture: Inflict/Cure Light Wounds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Curative Admixture: Cure Light Wounds
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Curative Admixture: Cure Light Wounds Metamagic: Empower, Empower Heal, Maximize, Intensify Spell Point Cost: 4/3/2 Cooldown 12/8/4 seconds Primer Element: Gildleaf
Infuses a Cure Light Wounds potion with magical energy, hurling it towards your target in an arc. The potion explodes in a small AOE that deals 1d6+2 plus 1 per caster level (maximum caster level 5) positive energy damage to nearby living allies and enemy undead. This infusion is affected by Artificer/Alchemist Knowledge: Potions.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Curative Admixture: Inflict Light Wounds
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Curative Admixture: Inflict Light Wounds Metamagic: Empower, Empower Heal, Maximize, Intensify Spell Point Cost: 4/3/2 Cooldown 12/8/4 seconds Primer Element: Gildleaf
Infuses an InflictLight Wounds potion with magical energy, hurling it towards your target in an arc. The potion explodes in a small AOE that deals 1d6+2 plus 1 per caster level (maximum caster level 5) negative energy damage to nearby undead allies and living enemies. This infusion is affected by Artificer/Alchemist Knowledge: Potions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Apothecary Skills
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Haggle, Concentration, and Heal. Rank 3: +1 Will Saves

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Spell Critical Chance: Positive & Negative I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% chance to critically hit with Positive and Negative Spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Energy of the Scholar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/90] Maximum Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Soothing Poultices
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While your Reaction is Verdanite, when you cast spells on yourself of allies you grant temporary hitpoints equal to [33/66/100]% of your Intelligence. These last for three minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Hale & Hearty
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Positive and Negative Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Spell Critical Chance: Positive & Negative II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% chance to critically hit with Positive and Negative Spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Stone of the Scholar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Stone of the Scholar: Alchemist's Stone Toggle: While wielding an Orb in your off-hand, you gain +10 Healing Amplification and +20 Positive Spell Power. You can only have one Alchemist's Stone Toggle active at a time.

Stance.Name: Stone of the Scholar
Stance.Description: While wielding an Orb in your off-hand, you gain +10 Healing Amplification and +20 Positive Spell Power. You can only have one Alchemist's Stone Toggle active at a time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Life Salve
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Training this Enhancement also grants you a similar ability Death Salve.
Target player, hireling, or pet takes 100% base healing from Positive spells for the next 3 minutes (or until target dies.) Has no effect on NPC allies or allies that already take 100% base Positive healing. This overrides their innate base healing from Positive spells for the duration. Shares a cooldown with Death Salve and Converter.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Panacea Poultice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Panacea Poultice Spell Point Cost: [6/3/1] Cooldown: [12/8/6] seconds Primer Element: Gildleaf
Channels powerful positive energy into a target at touch range to wipe away afflictions, restores 3 to 8 hit points plus an additional 1 per caster level (max +20), and removed temporary ability damage and the conditions blinded, confused, dazed, dazzled, deafened, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, feebleminded, insanity, nauseated, and poisoned. Against undead this spell will damage 3 to 8 hit points +1 per caster level (max +20). Undead who make a successful Will save reduce the damage by half.
D&D Dice: Heals 1d6+2 hp +1 pointer per caster level (max +20) and removes temp ability damage and many afflictions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Safety Goggles
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+[1/2/3] Armor Class and +[2/4/6] Resistance to Fire, Cold, Acid and Electric damage. Rank 3: You are immune to Blindness.
Safety First!

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Spell Critical Chance: Positive & Negative III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% chance to critically hit with Positive and Negative Spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Vital Ambition
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When your Reaction is Verdanite, you gain +1 Will Save, +1 for every 5 Alchemist Levels you have.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Intelligence and Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Insulated Boots
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+[2/4/6] Magical Resistance Rating. Rank 3: You are immune to Slippery Surfaces.
Not quite fashionable, but they'll keep you standing!

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Spell Critical Chance: Positive & Negative IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% chance to critically hit with Positive and Negative Spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Run for your life!
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While your Reaction is Verdanite, you gain 1% Movement Speed per Alchemist Level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Intelligence and Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Curative Admixture: Cure or Inflict Critical Wounds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Cure and Inflict Critical Wounds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Curative Admixture: Cure Critical Wounds
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Curative Admixture: Cure Critical Wounds Metamagic: Empower, Empower Heal, Maximize, Intensify Spell Point Cost: 45 Cooldown 12 seconds Primer Element: Gildleaf
Infuses a Cure Critical Wounds potion with magical energy, hurling it towards your target in an arc. The potion explodes in a small AOE that deals 4d6+8 plus 1 per caster level (maximum caster level 20) positive energy damage to nearby living allies and enemy undead. This infusion is affected by Artificer/Alchemist Knowledge: Potions.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Curative Admixture: Inflict Critical Wounds
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Curative Admixture: Inflict Critical Wounds Metamagic: Empower, Empower Heal, Maximize, Intensify Spell Point Cost: 45 Cooldown 12 seconds Primer Element: Gildleaf
Infuses an Inflict Critical Wounds potion with magical energy, hurling it towards your target in an arc. The potion explodes in a small AOE that deals 4d6+8 plus 1 per caster level (maximum caster level 20) negative energy damage to nearby undead allies and living enemies. This infusion is affected by Artificer/Alchemist Knowledge: Potions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Gloves of the Master Apothecary
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+5 Use Magic Device, +10 Universal Spell Power. You have a 15% chance to retain a copy of any single-use Positive, Negative, or Repair Healing Potion that you drink.
The mark of a true Apothecary, and helpful when handling volatile materials.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Master Apothecary
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have no Max Caster Level with Curative Admixtures and any Gildleaf Alchemist Spells. +2 Transmutation DCs, and +1 Spell Penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Dissolve
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target enemy at touch range that is Fascinated, Sleeping, Dancing, Dazed, Tripped, Mesmerized, Paralyzed, Petrified, or Stunned must make a Fortitude save (d20 + your Heal skill) or die instantly.

DC.Name: Dissolve
DC.Description: Target enemy at touch range that is Facinated, Sleeping, Dancing, Dazed, Tripped, Mesmerized, Paralyzed, Petrified, or Stunned must make a Fortitude save (d20 + your Heal skill) or die instantly.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Apothecary: Sleep or Death
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Deadly Neurotoxin and Nightshade.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Deadly Neurotoxin
EnhancementSelection.Description: Offensive Gildleaf or Ceruleite Spells will reduce your targets Armor Class and Magical Resistance rating by -1 per stack, max 5.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Nightshade
EnhancementSelection.Description: SLA: Nightshade Spell Point Cost: 10 Cooldown: 30 seconds Primer Element: Gildleaf Target enemy falls asleep for 6 seconds with no save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Bombardier: Alchemical Resistance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 Magical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Bombardier: Arcane Oil
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
All equipped weapons are considered Spellcasting Implements.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +5 Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Element to specialize in.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Liquid Power: Acid
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Acid Spells.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +5 Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Liquid Power: Cold
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Cold Spells.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +5 Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Liquid Power: Electric
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Electric Spells.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +5 Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Liquid Power: Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Fire Spells.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +5 Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Liquid Power: Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Poison Spells.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +5 Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison Spell Power

You gain +1 Caster Level with Acid Spells.

EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Cold Spells.

EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Electric Spells.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Liquid Power: Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Fire Spells.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +2% Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison Spell Critical Damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Liquid Power: Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Poison Spells.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +2% Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison Spell Critical Damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Element to specialize in.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Liquid Power: Acid
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Acid Spells, and 1 extra Burning Ambition Dice.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +1 Conjuration DC.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Liquid Power: Cold
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Cold Spells, and 1 extra Burning Ambition Dice.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +1 Conjuration DC.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Liquid Power: Electric
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Electric Spells, and 1 extra Burning Ambition Dice.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +1 Conjuration DC.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Liquid Power: Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Fire Spells, and 1 extra Burning Ambition Dice.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +1 Conjuration DC.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Liquid Power: Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain +1 Caster Level with Poison Spells, and 1 extra Burning Ambition Dice.
While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +1 Conjuration DC.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Bombardier: Multivial
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Element to specialize in.

EnhancementSelection.Name: SLA: Multivial of Acid
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Passive: +4 Intelligence, and 2 extra Burning Ambition Dice. While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +2 to Conjuration DCs.
SLA: Multivial of Acid Metamagic: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Enlarge, Eschew Materials Spell Point Cost: 15 Cooldown 12 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: SLA: Multivial of Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Passive: +4 Intelligence, and 2 extra Burning Ambition Dice. While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +2 to Conjuration DCs.
SLA: Multivial of Flame Metamagic: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Enlarge, Eschew Materials Spell Point Cost: 15 Cooldown 12 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Description:
Passive: +4 Intelligence, and 2 extra Burning Ambition Dice. While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +2 to Conjuration DCs.
SLA: Multivial of Frost Metamagic: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Enlarge, Eschew Materials Spell Point Cost: 15 Cooldown 12 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Description:
Passive: +4 Intelligence, and 2 extra Burning Ambition Dice. While in Pyrite Reaction, you gain +2 to Conjuration DCs.
SLA: Multivial of Sparks Metamagic: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Enlarge, Eschew Materials Spell Point Cost: 15 Cooldown 12 seconds
