EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Reverberate or Suggestion: Metamagic Feats can be used at no additional cost.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reverberate
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain SLA "Reverberate" - Wrack the target's body with internal sonic booms, dealing 1 to 10 sonic damage +1 per three caster levels (up to caster level 18) every 2 seconds for a duration of 16 seconds. This spell can stack on the target up to three times, increasing the damage with each stack. Activation cost: 20/15/10 SP Cooldown: 9 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Suggestion
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Suggestion as an SLA Activation cost: 13/11/9 SP Cooldown: 20/15/10 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Wand And Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75]% to the effectiveness of your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells, and +[1/2/3] to the DCs of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Marigold Crown
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +1 to the DCs of your Enchantment, Illusion or Evocation spells.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Blue Marigold Crown
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to DC's of Illusion spells.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Violet Marigold Crown
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to DC's of Evocation spells.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Yellow Marigold Crown
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to DC's of Enchantment spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Enthrallment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Expend a use of Bardic Music to enthrall multiple enemies. Enthralled enemies stop what they are doing and have a chance of breaking free when damaged. Enthralled enemies suffer a -2 penalty to attack rolls and Will saves for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per bard level, even after being disrupted from their reverie. This ability uses a Perform check as Will save DC.

DC.Name: Spellsinger: Enthrallment
DC.Description: Expend a use of Bardic Music to enthrall multiple enemies. Enthralled enemies stop what they are doing and have a chance of breaking free when damaged. Enthralled enemies suffer a -2 penalty to attack rolls and Will saves for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per bard level, even after being disrupted from their reverie.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Reviving Verse
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose permanent bonuses for yourself, or improvements to Inspire Courage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Raucous Refrain
EnhancementSelection.Description: Inspiring Melody: When you use your Bardic Inspiration, your target gains a +[1/2/3] Morale bonus to save vs. Sleep, Paralysis, Exhaustion and Energy Drain for th duration of your song. Passive: You sing your Bardic Inspiriation as if you had 1 more level of Bard.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reviving Verse
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] saving throws vs. Sleep, Paralysis, Exhaustion and Energy Drain

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Shout
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell-Like Ability: Shout. Activation cost: 15/12/9 SP Cooldown: 12/9/6 seconds Metamagic Feats can be used at no additional cost.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Spell Song Trance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Inspiration Melody: When you use your Bardic Inspiration, you grant a +1 morale bonus to spell DC's and 10% morale discount on spell point costs to your target for the duration of the song. Passive: You sing your Bardic Inspiration as if you had 1 more level of Bard.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Charisma I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Sustaining Song
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Inspiration Melody: When you use you Bardic Inspiration, you apply a temporary fast-healing effect to your target for the duration of your song. Passive: You sing your Bardic Inspiation as if you had 1 more level of Bard.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Spell Penetration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose Spell Penetration for yourself or for others.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Arcane Aid
EnhancementSelection.Description: When you Inspire Competence on an ally, they gain +[1/2/3] Spell Penetration for the duration of your song. Passive: You sing your Bardic Inspiation as if you had 1 more level of Bard.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Penetration
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] to your level when trying to overcome enemy's Spell Resistance

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Frolic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Inspiration Melody: When you use your Bardic Inspiration, you target gains Freedom of Movement for the duration of the song. (This is a musical effect and cannot be dispelled). Passive: You sing your Bardic Inspiation as if you had 1 more level of Bard.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Song of Arcane Might
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Inspiration Melody: When you use your Bardic Inspiration, your target gains a +1 morale bonus to caster level for all spells for the duration of your song. Passive: You sing your Bardic Inspiation as if you had 1 more level of Bard.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Charisma II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Song of Capering
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Expend a use of Bardic Music to make a single enemy to dance helplessly. This effect lasts for 6 seconds plus 2 seconds per Bard level. A successful Will save negates this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Advanced Musical Studies
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 Bard Songs per rest. +200 maximum Spell Points. The spell Hold Monster, Mass is added to your Bard Spellboook at level 5.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Prodigy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/2] Concentration and Perform +[1/2/2] Spell Penetration +[1/2/2] to DCs of your Enchantment spells Rank 3: Inspiration Melody: When you use your Bardic Inspiration, your target gains a moderate amount of temporary spell points. Passive: You sing your Bardic Inspiation as if you had 1 more level of Bard.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Spell Song Vigor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Inspiration Melody: When you use your Bardic Inspiration, you apply an effect to your target that restores spell points over time for the duration of your song. Passive: You sing your Bardic Inspiation as if you had 1 more level of Bard.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Spellsinger: Horn of Thunder
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell-Like Ability: Horn of Thunder. Activation cost: 30/25/20 SP Cooldown: 20/16/12 seconds. Blast your foes with 1d4 Sonic and 1d4 Electric damage per caster level. Sonic damage is doubled vs. Oozes, as the thunderous pressure disrupts their amorphous structure. Creatures making a Reflex save take half damage. Max caster level: 25. Affects liches.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Confidence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +1% Dodge, +1 Reflex Save, and +1 to the Max Dex Bonus of your Armor per Swashbuckler Core Ability you have.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Swashbuckling
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Swashbuckling: Stance: You gain 1% Doublestrike and Doubleshot as well as +1 to the Enhancement Bonus of the weapon in your main hand. Swashbuckling requires wielding a Finesseable or Thrown weapon in your main hand, wielding a Buckler or nothing in your off hand, and wearing Light Armor or no armor. (Druids cannot Swashbuckle while in animal forms.) (For Warforged and Bladeforged, you must be using either the Composite Plating or Mithral Body feats).
Passive: While Swashbuckling, the following weapons receive Competence bonuses to their critical profiles (critical threat range bonuses doubled with the appropriate Improved Critical feat, but not with keen or impact):
Dagger, Shortsword, Throwing Dagger: +1 Threat Range, +1 Multiplier Light Mace, Light Hammer, Kama, Sickle, Dart, Shuriken, Throwing Axe, Throwing Hammer: +2 Threat Range, +1 Multiplier Kukri, Rapier: +1 Multiplier Handaxe: +2 Range Light Pick: +1 Range

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Uncanny Dodge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Uncanny Dodge: You gain the Uncanny Dodge feat. Passive: Swashbuckling grants an additional 1% Doublestrike, 1% Doubleshot, and +1 Attack Damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Panache
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Panache: While Swashbuckling, you have an additional 1% Doublestrike, 1% Doubleshot, +1 Attack Damage, +1 Reflex Saving Throw, and the weapon in your main hand gains an additional +1 to its Enhancement bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Roll with the Punches
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Roll with the Punches: While Swashbuckling, you gain +5 Insight Bonus to Character Dodge Cap, the Slippery Mind feat, +1% Doublestrike, 1% Doubleshot and +1 Attack Damage

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Evasive Maneuvers
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Evasive Maneuvers: +2 CHA, +2 DEX. While Swashbuckling, you gain the Evasion feat, +1% Doublestrike, 1% Doubleshot, +1 Attack Damage, and the weapon in your main hand gains an additional +1 to its Enhancement bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Blow By Blow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either a Melee or Ranged attack:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Blow By Blow
EnhancementSelection.Description: Make a Melee attack with +[1/2/3] critical threat range that deals +[1/2/3]d6 extra Sonic damage, and reduces your threat with nearby enemies by [100/200/300]. This Sonic damage scales with spell power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Blow By Blow (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Make a Ranged attack with +[1/2/3] critical threat range that deals +[1/2/3]d6 extra Sonic damage, and reduces your threat with nearby enemies by [100/200/300]. This Sonic damage scales with spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Insults
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Insult that debuffs the saves of nearby enemies.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Appalling Diatribe
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to reduce the Reflex saves of nearby enemies by 3. Costs: 16/12/8 SP Cooldown: 20/15/10 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Cutting Jibes
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to reduce the Will saves of nearby enemies by 3. Costs: 16/12/8 SP Cooldown: 20/15/10 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Scathing Words
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to reduce the Fortitude saves of nearby enemies by 3. Costs: 16/12/8 SP Cooldown: 20/15/10 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Tavern Shanties
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Bard Songs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Limber Up
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Balance, Swim, and Tumble. 3rd Rank: When you Tumble, you gain +3 to saves against traps for 6 seconds. 12 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: En Pointe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: Make two attacks with +[1/1.5/2][W], +[4/8/12] critical threat range, but -1 Critical Multiplier. Costs 10 Spell Points to activate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Deflect Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the benefits of the Deflect Arrows feat, knocking aside one incoming projectile that would have struck you every 6 seconds. (Antireq Tempest Deflect Arrows)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Fast Movement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You run 1% faster for each of your Bard levels.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Sword Dance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Swashbuckling, when enemies miss you in combat, you deal 1d10/1d12/1d20 Sonic Damage. This Sonic damage scales with spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Doubleshot or a Doublestrike action boost bonus: (Cooldown: 30 Seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Double Shot Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain +[10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to Doubleshot for 20 seconds. Usable 5 times per rest.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Double Strike Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain +[10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to Doublestrike for 20 seconds. Usable 5 times per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Elegant Footwork
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When enemies miss you while Swashbuckling, they have a 20% chance to be knocked down with no save. Cooldown: 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Swashbuckling Style
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select your Swashbuckling style: Open Hand, Buckler, Orb or Rune Arm.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Arcane Marauder
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: You can now Swashbuckle with an Orb in your off hand. (Does not count as a Buckler for Buckler-specific abilities). Requires Magical Training (or the Enhancement equivalent)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Cannoneer
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: You can now Swashbuckle with a Rune Arm in your off hand. (Does not count as a Buckler for Buckler-specific abilities).

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dashing Scoundrel
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: While Swashbuckling with nothing in your off hand, you gain +1 Attack Damage per 5 Character levels and 10% Doublestrike/Doubleshot.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Skirmisher
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: While Swashbuckling with a Buckler in your off hand, you gain 10% Dodge, and you may use a Buckler and still benefit from the Single Weapon Fighting line of feats.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Resonant Arms
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Swashbuckling, the Finesseable or Thrown weapon in your main hand deals an additional [2/4/6]d6 Sonic Damage on critical hits. This Sonic damage scales with spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Different Tack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose to use either Charisma, Dexterity or Intelligence modifier for damage when Swashbuckling.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Smooth Flourishes
EnhancementSelection.Description: You get Charisma to Damage with weapon attacks while Swashbuckling.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Swift Strikes
EnhancementSelection.Description: You get Dexterity to Damage with weapon attacks while Swashbuckling.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Two Steps Ahead
EnhancementSelection.Description: You get Intelligence to Damage with weapon attacks while Swashbuckling.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: On the Mark
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive +[1/2/3] to attack rolls to confirm critical hits and damage on critical hits (before weapon multipliers)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Swashbucking Style II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improve your Swashbuckling Style

EnhancementSelection.Name: Loud and Clear
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: While Swashbuckling with an Orb in your off hand, +20 Sonic Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Low Blow
EnhancementSelection.Description: While Swashbuckling and wielding a Buckler in your off hand, activate to perform a shield bash with +2 Critical Threat Range and Multiplier. On hit, knock down affected enemy for three seconds (Perform + d20 saves for the Knockdown). Costs 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Music Box
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: While Swashbuckling with a Rune Arm in your off hand, your Rune Arm Weapon Imbue deals an additional 1d6 Sonic damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Slap in the Face
EnhancementSelection.Description: While Swashbuckling and wielding nothing in your off hand, activate to deal 1 Bludgeon damage. Damaged enemies can't cast spells for 6 seconds and are stunned for three seconds (Perform + d20 saves for the Stun). 18 second cooldown. Costs 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Battering Barrage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Swashbuckling, hits inflict Destruction/Improved Destruction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Wind at my Back
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to the Enhancement Bonus of your equipped Throwing Weapons, plus an additional +1 for every five Bard levels.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Thread the Needle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Swashbuckling, +5 Damage while the Precision feat is active.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Coup de Grace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Multiselector, Melee or Ranged Attack: Make an attack with +3[W]. If it strikes any Fascinated, Sleeping, Dancing, Dazed, Tripped, Mesmerized, Paralyzed, Petrified, or Stunned enemy, it must make a Fortitude save (d20 + your Perform skill) or die instantly. (20 second cooldown)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Second Skin
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Swashbuckling, +[2/4/6] to your Reflex Saves and +[2/4/6] to the Max Dex Bonus of your Armor.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Swashbuckler: Exploit Weaknesses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Swashbuckling, every time you damage an enemy but do not critically hit, you gain a stacking +1 Insight Bonus to Critical Threat Range until you successfully critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Skaldic Rage / Skaldic Constitution
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Skaldic Rage and Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: Skaldic Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: Skaldic Rage
EnhancementSelection.Description: Expend a Song to fly into Rage, granting you a +4 Rage bonus to Strength and -4 penalty to AC. When Skaldic Rage ends you become Fatigued. Requires 4 trained ranks in Perform to use. Skaldic Rage lasts for 3 minutes initially. Duration increases with effects that increase Song durations. (Rage bonuses do not stack with Barbarian Rage.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Weapon Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain proficiency with martial weapons. (Dwarves gain also the Waraxe.) +10 HP. Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Song of Heroism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds the Song of Heroism to your Ballad. Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 damage. Requires 4 trained Ranks in Perform to use. Heroism: +2 Morale bonus to Attack, all saving throws and skill checks, as well as immunity to fear and some temporary hitpoints.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Fighting Spirit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 hit points Your Inspire Greatness now uses your Charisma score for its Temporary hit points, doubled in Epic levels.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Victory Song
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The range of your Bardic Aria is doubled. You have +20 hit points, and a Base Attack Bonus equal to your character level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Skaldic Scream
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You inspire martial combat above and beyond. +2 Charisma, and +2 Constitution, +25 hit points. Activate this ability to scream the songs of your frozen ancestors, expending a Bard Song to force enemies in an area to make a Fortitude saving throw versus being frozen solid in frigid ice for 6 seconds. (DC 14 + Charisma Mod + 1/2 Bard Level + Stunning Modifiers). Even if they make the save, they take 20d20 Cold Damage and are significantly slowed for 6 seconds.

DC.Name: Songs of Frozen Ancestors
DC.Description: You can expend a Bard Song to scream the songs of your frozen ancestors, expending a Bard Song to force enemies in an area to make a Fortitude saving throw versus being frozen solid in frigid ice for 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Inspired Bravery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Inspire Courage grants you and your allies an additional +[1/2/3] to attack rolls and saving throws vs. Fear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: The Poetic Edda
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are steeped in the rich history of the elder sagas. The songs of warrior-poets fill your soul, and you long for battle and glory. +[1/2/3] Attack Bonus and +[1/2/3] Bard Songs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Enchant Weapon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enchant Weapons is added to your spellbook as level 1 Bard spell.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Rough and Ready
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Armor Class and +[2/4/6] Physical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Focused
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration, Intimidate, and Jump Rank 3: +1 Bard Song

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Boast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Sing a Song to gain +[25/50/100] Temporary HP. Cooldown: 8 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Words of Encouragement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Bardic Inspiration grants +[10/20/30] temporary HP for one minute. +[5/10/15] Positive Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Arcane Shield Chant
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and nearby allies gain +[2/4/6] Music bonus to resist Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, and Sonic damage

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Iced Edges
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1d[3/4/6] cold damage with attacks. Cooldown: 1 second.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter Action Boost: Sprint
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[35/40/50]% Action Boost bonus to movement speed for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Balad Melody: Ironskin
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and nearby allies gain DR [2/4/6]/- and [2/4/6] Music bonus to PRR. Requires 8 trained ranks of Perform to use.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Obstinance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] Positive Spell power. Rank 1: You gain +1 to saving throws while below 80% health. Rank 2: Additional +1 while below 60% health. Rank 3: Additional +1 while below 40% health.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: High Spirits
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your spirits are always high, and you are immune to Crushing Despair, Waves of Fatigue and Waves of Exhaustion. +[5/10/15] Positive Spellpower. Rank 2: You are also immune to Sleep. Rank 3: You are also immune to Fatigue, including Fatigue from Skaldic Rage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Frozen Fury
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Make a melee attack with +[1/2/3][W] damage. Affected enemies must make a Fortitude save (10 + Charisma modifier + [0/¼/½] Bard Level + Stunning modifiers) or become frozen solid for number of seconds equal to your Bard level. Cooldown: [12/9/6] seconds. Cost: 1 sp. Bosses cannot be frozen.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Ballad Melody: Recklessness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and nearby allies gain +[2/4/6] Music bonus to Doublestrike and Doubleshot, and Inspire Courage grants an additional +[3/6/9] Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Armorer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain Medium Armor Proficiency and the ability to cast arcane spells in medium armor without arcane spell failure.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Northwind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you score a vorpal hit, your enemy is briefly frozen in ice. This effect triggers at most once every [30/24/18] seconds. Vorpal: Vorpal hits are scored when you roll 20 on the attack and then confirm the critical hit. Bosses cannot be frozen.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Movement Booster
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Expeditious Chant and Rallying Cry:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Expeditious Chant
EnhancementSelection.Description: You and nearby allies gain +[5/10/15]% Action Boost bonus to movement speed.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Rallying Cry
EnhancementSelection.Description: Action Boost: You and all allies within range of your songs gain +[10/15/20]% Action Boost bonus to movement speed and +1 Action Boost bonus to Saving Throws for twenty seconds. This ability can be used while feared, and dispels Fear effects. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Chant of Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warchanter: Spinning Ice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Attack all enemies around you for +2[W] damage. Each affected enemy is frozen solid if they fail a Fortitude save (10/12/14 + Charisma modifier +[0/¼/½] Bard Level + Stunning modifiers) for a number of seconds equal to your half your Bard level. Bosses cannot be frozen. Activation cost: 6/4/2 SP. Cooldown 45/35/25 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target ally or self heal 10,000 HP. Removes ability score damage, death penalty effects, negative levels, and the conditions blinded, dazed, deafened, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, feebleminded, insanity, nauseated, poisoned, and stunned. [1/2/3] use(s) per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Divine Empowerment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 caster level and maximum caster level to Light, Negative Energy, and Fire spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Healing Domain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For each action point spent in this tree, you gain 0.5 Universal Spell Power and 1 Positive Energy Spell Power. (These stack, effectively giving 1.5 Positive Spell Power per point)

Effect.DisplayName: Radiant Servant: Spell power per action point
Radiant Servant: Positive spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Pacifism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: You gain 25 Positive Energy Spell Power and 3% Positive Energy Spell Critical Chance, but have -50 Spell Power and cannot critically hit with other spell damage types, and deal -1[W] damage

Stance.Name: Radiant Servant: Pacifism
Stance.Description: You gain 25 Positive Energy Spell Power and 3% Positive Energy Spell Critical Chance, but have -50 Spell Power and cannot critically hit with other spell damage types, and deal -1[W] damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Positive Energy Burst
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1% Positive Energy Spell Critical Chance. Channel Divinity: A wave of positive energy that expands from the caster, healing 1d8 plus 1 per Cleric level to all nearby allies, as well as removing 1d4 negative levels and 1d6 points of ability damage. Undead are instead damaged by the energy, taking 1d8 points of damage per Cleric level - a successful Will save reduces the damage by half. (Metamagic: Empower, Empower Heal, Maximize, Quicken. Spell Resistance: Yes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Improved Empower Healing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1% Positive Energy Spell Critical Chance. The Empower Healing Spell metamagic now grants +100 Positive Energy Spell Power instead of +75.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Positive Energy Shield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1% Positive Energy Spell Critical Chance. Channel Divinity: Your living ally receives temporary hit points equal to your Heal skill. While these hit points remain, your target receives +10% Sacred bonus to healing they receive from positive energy. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 Wisdom. Every fifth positive energy spell you cast deals maximum healing and has +50% chance to critical.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Extra Turning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Turn Undead per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Wand Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75]% effectiveness of your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells, and +[1/2/3] to the save DCs of your offensive wands.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Divine Cleansing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Channel Divinity: Removes harmful effects from your target. Leaves a lingering immunity to natural and magical diseases and poisons for 12 seconds per Cleric level. (Cooldown: 2 seconds) Rank 1: Removes all Disease and Poison effects. Rank 2: Removes all Blindness, Curse, Disease and Poison effects. Rank 3: Removes all Blindness, Curse, Disease, Paralysis, Petrification and Poison effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Bliss
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you use a Turn Attempt for any reason, you gain [3/4/5] Temporary Hit Points for each Healing Core Ability you possess.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Altruism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration, Diplomacy and Heal. Rank 3: You also gain +10 Positive Energy Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Improved Turning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You count as [1/2/3] levels higher when turning undead. This increases the maximum level of creature you can turn and also increases the total number of hit dice you can turn. In addition, you add an additional [2/4/6] to the number of hit dice you can turn.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Mighty Turning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Undead that you successfully turn are instead destroyed

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Purge Dark Magics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Channel Divinity: Dispels [1/2/3] hostile magical effects from your target. (Cooldown: 6 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Divine Healing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Divine Healing: Your target heals [1/2/4]d4 hp every 2 seconds for 2 seconds per point of Heal skill you possess. (Cooldown: 2 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Efficient Empower Healing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Healing spells cast while the Empower Healing Spell feat is activated cost [1/2/4] fewer spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Intense Healing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Positive Energy Spells are cast at +[1/2/3] caster level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Unyielding Sovereignty
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Fully heals all hit point damage done to a targeted ally, and removes ability damage, death penalty effects, negative levels, and the conditions blinded, dazed, deafened, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, feebleminded, insanity, nauseated, poisoned, and stunned. (Cooldown: 5 minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Martyrdom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: When you are killed, four turn attempts are expended. All nearby living allies and enemy undead receive [250/500/1000] positive energy healing and are affected by your Divine Cleansing ability if you possess it. This healing effect is unaffected by Spell Power. (This ability has no effect if you have insufficient turn attempts when you die.) This ability toggles off on death.

EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Incredible Healing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The maximum caster level of your Positive Energy Spells are increased by [1/2/3].

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Divine Health

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Positive Energy Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Channel Divinity: A positive energy aura envelops you in an aura of healing, positive energy, and affects a number of targets equal to Cleric level. Allies within the aura are healed 1 hit point per 3 Cleric levels as long as they remain within it. Undead enemies are damaged for the same amount. (Cooldown: 6 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Cure Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Cure Wounds spells have no maximum caster level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Radiant Servant: Reactive Heal
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Channel Divinity: The next time your target falls below half hit points, they receive 250 positive energy healing. A target can only benefit from a Reactive Heal once every 3 minutes (reset by resting). This healing effect is unaffected by spell power. (Cooldown: 6 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Smite Foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and a Ranged attack. Passive: +2 Armor Class, +5 Fire Spell Power, +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Smite Foe (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: Smite your enemy with a melee attack that deals an additional 2[W] damage. Cooldown: 12 seconds. Passive: +2 Armor Class, +5 Fire Spell Power, +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Smite Foe (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Attack: Smite your enemy with a ranged attack that deals an additional 2[W] damage. Cooldown: 12 seconds. Passive: +2 Armor Class, +5 Fire Spell Power, +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Resilience of Battle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Damage Reduction 5/-, +2 Armor Class, +5 Fire Spell Power, +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Sanctuary
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For 20 seconds, you gain +20 Sacred bonus to Physical Resistance. (Activation Cost: 10 Spell Points. Cooldown: 1 minute) Passive: +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest War Domain: Blur
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Blur is added to your spellbook as a level 2 spell. In addition, you permanently benefit from the effect of the Blur spell. Passive: +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power +10% Sacred bonus to Hitpoints

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest War Domain: Haste
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Haste is added to your spellbook as a level 3 spell. Passive: +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range with your Favored weapon.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Implacable Foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Strength and Wisdom variants.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Implacable Foe (Strength)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate: You and nearby allies gain 100 Temporary Hit Points and their attacks will deal 10% additional damage. For the next 18 seconds, these bonuses will refresh every 3 seconds on you and each ally that remains in range. These effects will expire 5 seconds after they are no longer refreshed. Cooldown: 3 minutes Passive: Divine Vessel now triggers on reaching 20 stacks of Divine Conduit, instead of 25. +2 Strength, +2 Constitution +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Implacable Foe (Wisdom)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate: You and nearby allies gain 100 Temporary Hit Points and their attacks will deal 10% additional damage. For the next 18 seconds, these bonuses will refresh every 3 seconds on you and each ally that remains in range. These effects will expire 5 seconds after they are no longer refreshed. (Cooldown: 3 minutes) Passive: Divine Vessel now triggers on reaching 20 stacks of Divine Conduit, instead of 25. +2 Constitution, +2 Wisdom +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Divine Might
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Charisma modifier for 30/60/120 seconds. Antirequisite: This ability can not be trained if you have any other Battle Trance abilities.

Stance.Name: Divine Might
Stance.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Charisma modifier for 30/60/120 seconds. Antirequisite: This ability can not be trained if you have any other Battle Trance abilities.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Toughness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] maximum hp.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Righteous Weapons I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your favored weapon you gain +1 to hit and damage and +3 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Sacred Touch
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you heal allies (with positive energy damage spells) they gain +[1/2/3] AC and +[1/2/3] PRR for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Awareness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search and Spot. Rank 3: +1 save vs traps

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Smite Weakness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you strike an enemy with Smite Foe, they gain four to seven stacks of Vulnerable. (For each stack, the target takes 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Wall of Steel
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Physical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Righteous Weapons II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your favored weapon you gain +1 to hit and damage and +3 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Inflame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and your nearby allies gain a +[2/3/4] bonus to Armor Class, Attack Rolls, and Damage Rolls. Duration: 30 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Action Boost Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[10/20/30] Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Magic Backlash
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When an enemy damages you with a spell, there is a [10/20/30]% chance they will be knocked down. (Does not affect bosses.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Priest: Radiant Flourish
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and Ranged attck

EnhancementSelection.Name: Radiant Flourish (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Favored Weapon Melee Attack: +[1/2/3][W]: On Hit: Enemy takes [1/2/3]d6 Light Damage. This damage scales at 200% with the higher of your Melee and Ranged Power. Non-boss enemies have a small chance to be blinded with no save. 6 Second cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Radiant Flourish (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Favored Weapon Ranged Attack: +[1/2/3][W]: On Hit: Enemy takes [1/2/3]d6 Light Damage. This damage scales at 200% with the higher of your Melee and Ranged Power. Non-boss enemies have a small chance to be blinded with no save. 6 Second cooldown

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your favored weapon you gain +1 to hit and damage and +3 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Priest: Greater Inflame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Inflame now also grants a +[2/3/4] bonus to Saving Throws and a +[5/10/15]% bonus to Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, and Sonic Energy Absorption.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Ameliorating Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you strike an enemy with Smite Foe, you and your nearby allies are healed by 1d2 per character level, and benefit from the effects of the Lesser Restoration spell. (The heal from Ameliorating Strike is affected by your Positive Spell Power)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Priest: Silence the Wicked
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and a Ranged attack.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Silence the Wicked (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Favored Weapon Melee Attack: +1[W]: On Hit: Affected enemy can't cast spells for 4/8/12 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Silence the Wicked (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Favored Weapon Ranged Attack: +1[W]: On Hit: Affected enemy can't cast spells for 4/8/12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Righteous Weapons IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your favored weapon you gain +1 to hit and damage and +3 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Priest: Holy Striker
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Doublestrike or Doubleshot

EnhancementSelection.Name: Holy Striker
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[3/6/10]% Doublestrike

EnhancementSelection.Name: Holy Sniper
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[3/6/10]% Doubleshot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Priest: Divine Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Your god has imbued you with power and skill in combat, granting a +6 Sacred bonus to Strength, and a base attack bonus equal to a fighter of the same level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Divine Vessel
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: While active, your attacks generate a stack of Divine Conduit. When Divine Conduit reaches 25, it is removed and nearby enemies take 1d4 Fire and 1d4 Light damage per character level. (Damage from Divine Vessel is affected by Fire and Light Spell Power) You may only gain a stack of Divine Conduit once every 3/2/1 seconds. If you have Implacable Foe, Divine Vessel will trigger upon reaching 20 stacks of Divine Conduit, instead of 25.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Wrathful Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your religion's favored weapon, it gains an additional +1 to its Enhancement Bonus. When you score a Vorpal Hit with your religion's favored weapon, your attacks gain 10d6 Light Damage on hit for the next 6 seconds. This damage scales with 200% of the higher of your Melee or Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Priest: Divine Bastion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wearing Heavy armor (or in Adamantine body feat), you gain +10 PRR, +10 MRR, +10 AC and +50% threat generation with melee and ranged attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warpriest: Divine Intervention
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active: Divine Intervention: Ward your target against fatal damage. Hit point damage cannot lower a warded ally's hit point total below -9. When a warded ally is incapacitated, this effect heals the target after a few seconds for 10 to 39 hit points and then fades. Spell Point Cost: 30 spell points. Cooldown: 2 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +8 hit points and 3 MRR. For every additional core in the tree gain 16 hit points and 3 more MRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Nature's Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Defensive Combat Stance: +8 PRR and MRR. Cannot be used with other defensive stances, but can be used while raging. Cooldown: 6 seconds.

Stance.Name: Nature's Defense
Stance.Description: Defensive Combat Stance: +8 PRR and MRR. Cannot be used with other defensive stances, but can be used while raging. Cooldown: 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Magical Beast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in animal form the penalty on your spell cooldowns is reduced from 2.5 to 2.0. This benefit does not stack with the Nature's Warrior versions of this ability. Grants Heavy Armor Proficiency

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Big Claws
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds Great Maul to your spell book: Requires Bear form: Activate to do an Innate Attack: Deals 3[W] with +1 bonus to critical threat and damage, and the target you strike must make a Fortitude save or be stunned for 6 seconds, DC: 13 + Max(Str, Wis) mod + Tactical bonuses. SP Cost: 3 Cooldown: 12 seconds. Shares a cooldown with Maul.

DC.Name: Nature's Protector: Big Claws
DC.Description: Innate Attack: Deals 3[W] with +1 bonus to critical threat and damage, and the target you strike must make a Fortitude save or be stunned for 6 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Big Bear
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The Tremor spell now has a 20% chance to restore 1 charge of Barbarian Rage. Grants a 5% combat style attack speed bonus in Bear forms.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: The Great Bear
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants a 10% combat style attack speed bonus in Bear forms. +2 Strength and Constitution. While in animal form your spell cooldowns are only increased by 1.5 down from 2. This effect does not stack with Nature's Warrior.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Rage of the Beast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants you the ability to rage like a barbarian. Activiate to rage, gaining +4 Strength and Constitution, +2 Will Saves and -2 Armor Class. Lasts 30 + (6 x Con Modifier) seconds. You are fatigued when this effect ends. You cannot cast spells while raging. 1/2 Charges per rest. Effects that modify Barbarian rage apply to this enhancement. Also grants the Dismiss Rage Feat.

Stance.Name: Rage
Stance.Description: Grants you the ability to rage like a barbarian. Activiate to rage, gaining +4 Strength and Constitution, +2 Will Saves and -2 Armor Class. Lasts 30 + (6 x Con Modifier) seconds. You are fatigued when this effect ends. You cannot cast spells while raging. 1/2 Charges per rest. Effects that modify Barbarian rage apply to this enhancement. Also grants the Dismiss Rage Feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Bloody Claws I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every time you use Maul you gain one stack of Killer Instincts: +1 to damage for 15 seconds. Max stack size: [1/2/3]

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Improved Nature's Defense I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between: Enchanted Defense, Fierce Defense and Grizzled Defense.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enchanted Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in the Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[4/8/12] competence bonus to PRR and MRR.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fierce Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[150/300/450]% competence bonus to melee threat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Grizzled Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[1/2/3] sacred bonus to all saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Fey's Blessing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain a +[2/4/6] bonus to MRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Animal Brutality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain a +[1/2/3] skill bonus to Intimidate, Swim and Jump. Rank 3 grants +1 to hit and damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Primal Beast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While using Barbarian Rage in animal form you gain +[5/10] melee power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Bloody Claws II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Shred attack now grants you one stack of Killer Instinct: +1 to damage for 15 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Improved Nature's Defense II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a different stance to that chosen in tier1, between: Enchanted Defense, Fierce Defense and Grizzled Defense.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enchanted Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in the Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[4/8/12] competence bonus to PRR and MRR.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fierce Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[150/300/450]% competence bonus to melee threat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Grizzled Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[1/2/3] sacred bonus to all saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Thick Hide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Natural Armor Bonus

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Action Boost: Beast at Bay
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain an action boost for [5/10/15] Armor Class and [7/14/21] MRR for 20 seconds. Consumes one action boost.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Enduring Beast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While using Barbarian Rage in animal form you gain +[10/20] positive healing amplification and +[1/2] Strength. Grants [1/2] additional uses of Rage per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Savage Roar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Using the Roar spell with 1 stack of Killer Instincts active now triggers a burst of 1..3 Sonic samage per Druid level you have. Scales with melee power. If you have 2 stacks it also stuns. At 3 stacks the damage is increased to 5..10 per Druid level and also applies the stun. Fortitude save negatives stun. DC: 10 + 1/2 Druid Level + Max(Str, Wis) mod + Stun bonuses. Casting Roar clears all stacks of Killer Instinct.

DC.Name: Nature's Protector: Savage Roar
DC.Description: Using the Roar spell with 1 stack of Killer Instincts active now triggers a burst of 1..3 Sonic samage per Druid level you have. Scales with melee power. If you have 2 stacks it also stuns. At 3 stacks the damage is increased to 5..10 per Druid level and also applies the stun.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Improved Nature's Defense III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose the final stance not chosen at tiers 1 and 2, between: Enchanted Defense, Fierce Defense and Grizzled Defense.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enchanted Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in the Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[4/8/12] competence bonus to PRR and MRR.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fierce Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[150/300/450]% competence bonus to melee threat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Grizzled Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[1/2/3] sacred bonus to all saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Greater Nature's Defense I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between: Ursa's Heart, Ursa's Spirit and Ursa's Will.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[15/20/25]% competence bonus to max hit points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Spirit
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[2/4/6] competence bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Will
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[3/6/9] sacred bonus to MRR.
