EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Constitution and Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Undying Beast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While using Barbarian Rage in animal form you gain immunity to energy drain and death effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Beast Awakened
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can now cast Druidic magic while raging.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Greater Nature's Defense II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a different stance to that chosen in tier1, between: Ursa's Heart, Ursa's Spirit and Ursa's Will.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[15/20/25]% competence bonus to max hit points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Spirit
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[2/4/6] competence bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Will
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[3/6/9] sacred bonus to MRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between wither Constitution or Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Beast Unleashed
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While using Barbarian Rage in animal form, you gain an additional 25 melee power. In addition, if the Druid is in Bear form they gain a +15% bonus to armor class and 50% increase to melee threat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Bear Charge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Bear Form Melee Attack: Charge forward dealing +2[W] with a +1 critical threat and damage multiplier to all targets before you, knocking down enemies. A successful Balance check negates the knockdown. Trip DC vs Balance: 10 + Druid Level + Max(Str, Wis) mod + Trip bonuses. Cooldown: 15 seconds.

DC.Name: Nature's Protector: Bear Charge
DC.Description: Bear Form Melee Attack: Charge forward dealing +2[W] with a +1 critical threat and damage multiplier to all targets before you, knocking down enemies.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Lightning Strikes the Mountain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Bear form Melee Attack: Activate to call down a bolt of lightning as you launch an attack. On Hit: +3[W] and 5..8 Lightning damage per character level, scales with melee power. You are also granted a 100% bonus to melee threat and 20 MRR for 15 seconds. Bonuses are doubled if Nature's Protector stance is active.

Stance.Name: Lightning Strikes the Mountain
Stance.Description: You are also granted a 100% bonus to melee threat and 20 MRR for 15 seconds. Bonuses are doubled if Nature's Protector stance is active.

Effect.DisplayName: Nature's Protector: Lightning Strikes the Mountain (with Nature's Defense)
Nature's Protector: Lightning Strikes the Mountain (with Nature's Defense)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Greater Nature's Defense III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose the final stance not chosen at tiers 1 and 2, between: Ursa's Heart, Ursa's Spirit and Ursa's Will.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[15/20/25]% competence bonus to max hit points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Spirit
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[2/4/6] competence bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Will
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[3/6/9] sacred bonus to MRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Force of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain [10/15/20]% resistance against Force damage and +[1/2/3] Constitution. Your attunement to Nature is emboldened - Your Druidic Oath is no longer broken by wearing metal armor or shields.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Natural Adept
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 8 hitpoints +1 to hit and damage in Wolf and Bear Forms for this and every other core in the tree. In Wolf Form you also gain 1 sneak attack die for this and every other core taken.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Nature's Senses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks penetrate 10% of your target's fortification. You gain a +3 bonus to Spot, Listen and Search.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Nature's Bounty
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have mastered the art of wielding divine magic in animal form, and using it to empower your body in physical combat. While in animal form, the cooldown penalty for non-animal form spells is reduced from 2.5 times the usual length to 2.0

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: A True Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Wolf or Bear form you gain a +1 competence critical damage bonus to your attacks. You must have a weapon equipped to gain this benefit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Howl of Winter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Casting Howl of Terror now grants you the effect Winters Hunt for 10 seconds which grants +10 exceptional bonus to Doublestrike, 25% bonus to spell critical and 50% to spell critical damage to all cold damage spells. This will only occur once every 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Beast Form Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have mastered the art of wielding divine magic in animal form and using it to empower your body in physical combat. While in animal form, the cooldown penalty for non-animal form spells is reduced from 2.5 times the usual length to 1.5. Does not stack with Nature's Protector cores. Passive: You gain +2 Strength and Wisdon and +10% Doublestrike and +10 PRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Extra Wild Empathy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Wild Empathy use per rest. +[1/2/3] Improved Wild Empathy use per rest (if you have this ability). +[5/10/15] Positive Spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Snapping Jaws
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you Bluff or use an ability that triggers a Bluff check such as Baiting Bite, your target is debuffed losing -[2/4/6] AC, and you gain a stack of Snapping Jaw for +[2/4/6] AC for 15 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Take Down
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Increase Trip DCs by [1/2/3]

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Bestial Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Reflex and Fortitude Saves are increased by [1/2].

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Athletic Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Balance, Jump, Move Silently and Hide Skills. Rank 3: Grants +1 Wild Empathy use per rest and +1 Improved Wild Empathy use per rest (if you have this ability).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Flight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain an uncapped +20% Dodge bonus for [10/20/30] seconds. Costs 1 Wild Empathy. Cooldown: 1 minute 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Ghost Wolf
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain Ghost Touch while in Wolf Forms on your melee attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Brother Wolf
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While your wolf pet is alive and within 40 meters, it gains 15 hitpoints every [12/9/6] seconds and [10/15/20] MRR and PRR. You also gain +[1/2/3] to hit and damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Action Boost: Doublestrike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +[10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to Doublestrike for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Fight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] base melee damage and +[1/2/3] AC while in any Bear or Wolf form.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Prey on the Weak
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[8/15]% damage bonus on helpless targets.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Ghost Wolf Pack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Wolf Form Melee Attack: When you trigger this, spectral pack mates appear to assault all foes before you. On Hit: +2[W] damage and a +2 bonus to critical threat range. This also applies a 5 second confusion effect with no save. Bosses are immune to the confusion. You gain 35% Incorporeal defense for 10 seconds. Cost 15 Spell Points Cooldown: 1 minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Essence of the Shrike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Striking a blow focuses your mind and body. When you critically hit an enemy while in any Wolf or Bear form, you gain [10/20] temporary spell points for 8 seconds. Passive: +[5/10] Positive Spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Fatal Harrier
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Killing an enemy grants you a 5% enchantment bonus to attack speed for 20 seconds. You also gain a +1 bonus to Reflex saves. This stacks [1/3/5] times. Enemies your own level or higher have a 100% chance of inspiring your Ferocity to greater heights. For every level below you, the chances are reduced by 20%. A monster two levels below you only has a 60% chance of creating this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Four Legs Good
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You ignore most effects that would knock you down. Requires: Any Wolf, Bear or Tree form.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Ferocity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +[2/4/6] melee power in Wolf or Bear form. Double this if an effect is preventing you from casting spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Great White Wolf
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain [10/20/30] Cold spell power. In Winter Wolf form gain [10/20/30]% Cold absorption.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Alpha Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Area Melee Attack: Delas +[2/3/5][W] You fight for leadership. AOW melee attack. On target above 85% health it reduces their attack, range and spellpower by 25 for 15 seconds. Requires: Any Wolf, Bear or Tree form. Spellpoint cost: 12/9/6 Cooldown: 18/15/12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Swift Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Wold form you gain Evasion. Wolf Wild Shape: Your attack speed bonus increases from 10% to 15%. Winter Wolf Wild Shape: Your attack speed bonus increases from 20% to 30%. Armor restrictions apply as normal.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Throat Rip
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Requires Wolf Form. Melee attack that strikes 3 times, adds 6 sneak attack dice on each attack. Each hit on a living target inflicts a Bleed which causes 1d6 every 3 seconds for 18 seconds. Bleed stacks up to 10 times and scales with 200% melee power. Target must also make a Fortitude save or will be silenced for 15 seconds. Bosses are immune to Silence but take a 25 point spell power debuff. Stun vs Fortitude DC: 10 + Druid Level + Max(Str, Wis) + Stun bonuses.

DC.Name: Nature's Warrior: Throat Rip
DC.Description: Melee attack that strikes 3 times, adds 6 sneak attack dice on each attack. Each hit on a living target inflicts a Bleed which causes 1d6 every 3 seconds for 18 seconds. Bleed stacks up to 10 times and scales with 200% melee power. Target must also make a Fortitude save or will be silenced for 15 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Jaws of Ice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain 10 times your character level in temporary hitpoints for 30 seconds after using Jaws of Winter.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Go for the Kill
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Requires Wolf form. You charge your target for +4[W], +5 to critical threat range, +1 critical multiplier and knock them down and grant yourself a +15 melee power boost for 30 seconds. Charging from a distance of over 10 meters the melee power bonus is doubled. Deals an additional 50 points of damage to helpless targets. Scales with melee power. A successful Blanace check negates Knockdown. Trip vs Balance DC: 10 + Druid Level + Max(Str, Wis) + Trip bonuses.

DC.Name: Nature's Warrior: Go for the Kill
DC.Description: You charge your target for +4[W], +5 to critical threat range, +1 critical multiplier and knock them down and grant yourself a +15 melee power boost for 30 seconds. Charging from a distance of over 10 meters the melee power bonus is doubled. Deals an additional 50 points of damage to helpless targets. Scales with melee power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Child of Summer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the ability Child of Summer: Activate to grant +5 Spellpower when casting Fire, Light, Sonic, Force and Positive spells per core in this tree (Max: 30). Lasts until death or the a change of season. Fire Elemental form changes you to this season automatically. Pasive: +1 Universal Spellpower per AP spent in this tree.

Stance.Name: Child of Summer
Stance.Description: Activate to grant +5 Spellpower when casting Fire, Light, Sonic, Force and Positive spells per core in this tree (Max: 30). Lasts until death or the a change of season. Fire Elemental form changes you to this season automatically.

Effect.DisplayName: Seasons Herald: Spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Elder of Winter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Elder of Winter: You gain Child of Winter: Activate to gain +5 Spellpower when casting Water, Acid, Earth and Electric spells per core in this tree (Max: 30). Lasts until death or season change. Water elemental form changes you into this season automatically. Passive: Your caster level is increased by 1 in your season.

Stance.Name: Elder of Winter
Stance.Description: Activate to gain +5 Spellpower when casting Water, Acid, Earth and Electric spells per core in this tree (Max: 30). Lasts until death or season change. Water elemental form changes you into this season automatically.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Wellspring
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 max caster level for spells appropriate to your season. The effects of your Shillelagh spell are doubled.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Sunburst
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: A globe of searing radiance explodes to blast targets for 6d6 light damage in addition to blinding them. Oozes and Undead take 1d3+3 per caster level damage. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half and nagates the blindness. Light fearing undead may be instantly destroyed by this spell.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Storm of Vengeance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Conjures a storm with a massive thunderclap, deafening enemeies, dousing them in acid rain and lancing them with lightning bolts. Enemies within the cloud when it is first conjured are deafened for 3 seconds per caster level. Enemies within the storm take 1d3 acid damage per caster level every two seconds. Every 4 seconds, a random enemy within the storm takes 1d6 Electric damage for every caster level (a successful Reflex save for half).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Hierophant
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are wise and skilled in the art of wielding divine magic to summon aid and change the world around you. Gain +2 Wisdom and Constitution. Your Transmutation and Evocation spells gain +1 to their DCs. You gain a +1 bonus caster level and max caster level in both seasons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Beguile
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you successfully attack an enemy or cast a spell on one this is a 50% chance to Beguile that enemy 1/0-2/0-3 times for 3/0-6/0-9 seconds. Beguile: -2% attack speed, -2 Spellpower. Beguile stacks up to 25 times, and one stack fades every few seconds. Up to one enemy can be affected each second (by upto 1/2/3 stacks)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Shared Spirit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your wolf companion gains [3/6/10]% to its max health. You gain [1/2/3] universal spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Produce Flame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Flames as bright as a torch appear in your open hand and launch towards your foes. They deal 1d2+2 Fire damage per caster level, up to 15d2+30 at caster level 15. Spellpoint cost: 6/5/3 Cooldown: 10/6/4 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wax and Wane I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% additional critical chance with spells associated with your current season. This is cumulative with Season's Herald. Winter: Acid, Cold, Electric, Earth and Water Summer: Fire, Light, Positive, Force and Sonic

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Druidic Wisdom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Diplomacy, Heal and Spell Craft.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Improved Metamagics I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves a selected Metamagic ability.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Improved Metamagics II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves a Metamagic ability.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Creeping Cold
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals on-going cold damage to the target every 2 seconds for 12 seconds. The damage starts small and grows larget as the spell continues. Each phase lasts 4 seconds. Phase 1: 1d4+2 damage per 3 caster levels (Max +12 at 18) Phase 2: 2d4+4 damage per 3 caster levels (Max +24 at 18) Phase 3: 3d4+6 damage per 3 caster levels (Max +36 at 18). Spellpoint cost: 6/5/3 Cooldown: 12/10/8 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Wax and Wane II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% additional critical chance with spells associated with your current season. This is cumulative with Season's Herald. Winter: Acid, Cold, Electric, Earth and Water Summer: Fire, Light, Positive, Force and Sonic

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Action Boost: Spellpower
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activeate to gain a +[10/20/30] Action Boost bonus to Universal Spell power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Autumn Winds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle to be shielded by the autumn winds. Under this effect gain Feather Fall, +3 Dodge and a 10% chance to knock down any enemy who strikes you in melee. Activation cost: 8 Spell points

Stance.Name: Autumn Winds
Stance.Description: Toggle to be shielded by the autumn winds. Under this effect gain Feather Fall, +3 Dodge and a 10% chance to knock down any enemy who strikes you in melee. Activation cost: 8 Spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Efficient Metamagic: Heighten
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Using the Heighten Spell feat costs you [1/2] fewer spell points per level of heightening.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Efficient Heighten enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Call Lightning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Calls forth a bolt of Lightning, which strikes your target for 1d5+5 Electric damage for every caster level up to 15. A successful Reflex save reduces damage by half.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Wax and Wane III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% additional critical chance with spells associated with your current season. This is cumulative with Season's Herald. Winter: Acid, Cold, Electric, Earth and Water Summer: Fire, Light, Positive, Force and Sonic

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Spring's Resurgence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Fill an ally with the energy of spring. When that ally falls below 50% hit points, they and any other allies near them are healed by 20d6 positive energy and receive a +2 primal bonus to attack rolls. Lasts 5 minutes or until triggered. Spellpoint cost: 8/6/4 Cooldown: 8/4/2 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Strength of the Solstice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to the DCs of your Evocation and Transmutation spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Salt Ray
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: A thin shaft of whirling salt crystals lances out from your crooked finger to strike and shred your foe. Your target takes 1d6 Force damage per 2 caster levels, for a maximum of 5d6 at caster level 10. Targets are also stunned. Fortitude save negates the stun.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Wax and Wane IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% additional critical chance with spells associated with your current season. This is cumulative with Season's Herald. Winter: Acid, Cold, Electric, Earth and Water Summer: Fire, Light, Positive, Force and Sonic

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Crown of Summer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: A target of your choice is filled with the light and vitality of summer. That target gains +15% enhancement bonus to Healing Amplification, +10 melee power and +5 ranged power. Only one target can have the crown at a time. Spell point cost: 1 Cooldown: 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Elemental Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Elemental Master. Gain [5/10/15] additional spell power in your season. Rank 3: Druid level 17 or above: Changing into Fire Elemental form now grants you a brief version of Anger of the Noon Day Sun effect. Changing into Water Elemental Form grants you a similar version of Icy Mantle. This is not affected by meta magics.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Word of Balance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You utter elder words of balance, judging those who stray too far from the path of neutrality. Targets with an alignment one step away from True Neutral take 1d4+4 Bane damage for every 2 caster levels up to 20. Target who are two steps away take twice that. True Neutrals are not affected by this spell.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Time and Tide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 caster level and +1 max caster level for spells in both seasons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Season's Herald: Winter's Heart
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Gain 8 times your Wisdom in temporary hitpoints for 30 seconds. Activation cost: 12 Spell points Cooldown: 1 minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Font Of Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For each action point spent in this tree, you gain +1 Universal Spell Power and +2 Spell Points. Passive: Each core enhancement in this tree grants +1 Caster Level and +2 Max Caster Level with the following spells: Nimbus of Light, Searing Light, Sun Bolt, Cometfall, Divine Punishment, Flame Strike, and Fire Storm.

Effect.DisplayName: Angel of Vengeance: Spell power per action point
Angel of Vengeance: Spell points per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Shield of Condemnation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Enemies that strike you have a chance of suffering divine condemnation for 20 seconds, increasing their vulnerability to light and alignment-based damage by 10%, and decreasing their fortification by 10%. This debuff stacks up to 5 times, and is dispelled by Bless effects. Cooldown: 1 second.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Aura of Menace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: You project a 15 meter Aura of Menace, decreasing the saving throws, attack, and armor class of nearby enemies by 2. Cooldown: 1 second

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Summon Archon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Spell like ability: A small lantern archon hovers over your shoulder and attacks nearby enemies. This archon is indestructible, deals 1 to 3 + caster level light damage every 2 seconds, and uses your Light Spell Power and Spell Critical effects for its light beam attacks. The archon will only attack enemies that have already been damaged, and will not attack fascinated or mesmerized foes, and always attacks the enemy with the fewest hit points in range. All threat generated by the archon is applied to you. Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 6 second.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Vengeful Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +1 to Spell DCs and +20 Light and Alignment Spell Power. When you fall below 80% health, you gain a +1% Sacred bonus to Spell Critical chance for 20 seconds. When you fall below 60% health, you gain +1 Sacred bonus to your spell DCs for 20 seconds. When you fall below 40% health, you gain +50% Sacred bonus to Spell Critical Damage Multiplier with Fire, Force, Light and Physical damage spells for 20 seconds. Each of these effects persist even if you are healed above their health thresholds, but each can only trigger once every two minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Ascendancy Shine Bright
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Wisdom and Charisma variants:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ascendancy Shine Bright (Charisma)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Spell Like Ability: Searing Light. You can cast the spell Searing Light at will without using spell points. Passive: You gain +4 to Charimsa, +20 universal Spell power and +2 to all skills.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ascendancy Shine Bright (Wisdom)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Spell Like Ability: Searing Light. You can cast the spell Searing Light at will without using spell points. Passive: You gain +4 to Wisdom, +20 universal Spell power and +2 to all skills.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Nimbus of Light
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: A glittering corona of light coalesces around your outstretched arm, dealing 5 to 8 points of light damage plus an additional 1 for every caster level. This ray has double spell range. Spell point cost: 4/3/2 spell points Cooldown: 12/8/4 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Scourge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you cast a Fire, Force, Light, or Physical damage spell, you gain +3 to your Fire, Force, Light, or Physical Spell Power for 6 seconds. This stacks up to [3/6/10] times. In addition, when you take damage you have a 20% chance to gain a stack of Scourge

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Smiting I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Fire, Force, Light, and Physical damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Angelic Resistance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] to all saving throws against Magic.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Inquisition
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration, Intimidate, and Will Saves vs Fear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75]% damage and healing from your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells, and +[1/2/3] to the save DCs of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Efficient Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of the following Metamagic feats. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Smiting II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Fire, Force, Light, and Physical damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Just Reward
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you critically hit with a Fire, Force, Light, or Physical damage spell, you gain 3/6/10 Sacred temporary spell points. Passive: Your deity's favored weapon is considered an Implement in your hands.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Spell Power Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[10/20/30] Action Boost bonus to Spell Power for [20/20/30] seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds. (Action boost, 5 uses per rest)

Stance.Name: Spell Power Boost
Stance.Description: You gain a +[10/20/30] Action Boost bonus to Spell Power for [20/20/30] seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Sun Bolt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: A powerful bolt of light deals 5 to 8 light damage per caster level (Max caster level 15) to targets in its path. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half. Spell point cost: 12/10/8 spell points Cooldown: 12/9/6 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Efficient Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose another Metamagic feats. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Smiting III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Fire, Force, Light, and Physical damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Spell Penetration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You add +1 to you Caster Level check to overcome an enemy's Spell Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Crown of Retribution
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: You remove your Shield of Condemnation from yourself and transfer it to an ally. The Shield of Condemnation manifests itself on them while they remain within the area of your Aura of Menace. Enemies that strike your ally while this is active take an additional 1d8+1 points of light damage from your divine wrath. This ability can only be used once per rest, and can only target another player or a hireling. Duration: 10 minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Efficient Heighten
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Using the Heighten Spell Metamagic costs you [1/2] less Spell Point/s per heightened level.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Efficient Heighten enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Smiting IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Fire, Force, Light, and Physical damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Intense Faith
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Fire, Force, Light, and Physical damage spells are cast at +[1/2/3] caster level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Cometfall
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Abaility: You conjure a bright, glowing comet, which appears in midair above your target, then strikes the ground with tremendous force. This area of effect spell does 2d3+6 points of bludgeon damage for every 2 caster levels. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half. The force of this comet can knock some creatures prone. Another successful Reflex save negates the knockdown portion. Spell point cost: 35/30/25 Cooldown: 20/15/12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Unstoppable Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies within your Aura of Menace suffer a -[1/2/3] penalty to Spell Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Evocation Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have trained extensively in Evocation magic, granting a +1 bonus to your spell DCs of that school.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Zealous Faith
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The maximum caster level of your Fire, Force, Light, and Physical damage spells are increased by [1/2/3].

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Archon's Fury
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Your Lantern Archon's attacks will add a stack of Archon's Fury. Archon's Fury: 1d6+1 Fire damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds, stacks up to 20 times. While toggled on, every shot from your Archon costs 12 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Pleasant Disposition
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For each Core ability you gain, +1% Positive Spell Critical Chance, +10 Healing Amp, and +5 Positive Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Beacon of Grace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and allies ahead of you heal for 1 point of Positive Energy per Favored Soul level. Undead enemies ahead of you take the same amount of damage (Will save for half). Both scale with your Positive Spell Power. 6 second cooldown. This ability is considered a 1st Level Favored Soul spell of the Conjuration school. Spell Point Cost: 6 Spell points Cooldown: 6 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Shining Light
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you cast one of your Beacons or use Flight of Glory, you and affected allies gain a Sacred bonus to Healing Amplification equal to your Favored Soul level for 12 seconds. Enemies in the zone of effect are dazzled and take a -1 penalty to attack, spot, and search. Targets are illuminated by Shining Light, dispelling stealth, invisibility, blur and displacement, for 10 seconds, and giving a -40 penalty to hide. Sightless enemies are immune to the dazzle effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Beacon of Hope
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and allies ahead of you take the dispelling effects of a Panacea, Restoration and Dispel Paralysis spell, and heal for 5 points of Positive Energy per Favored Soul level. Undead enemies ahead of you take the same amount of damage (Will save for half). Both scale with your Positive Spell Power. This ability is considered a 5th Level Favored Soul pell of the Conjuration school. Spell Point Cost: 30 Spell points Cooldown: 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Flight of Glory
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you use your Leap of Faith, nearby allies gain Temporary Hit Points equal to triple your character level, plus an additional 50 Hit Points. Cost 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: True Resurrection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain True Resurrection as a Spell Like Ability Spell Point Cost: 25 SP Cooldown: 10 seconds
Passive: Choose either Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +3 Maximum Caster Level with all Positive spells. Your Hope and Beacon abilities that scale with Favored Soul level now add Epic Levels as well. Passive: +4 Wisdom.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +3 Maximum Caster Level with all Positive spells. Your Hope and Beacon abilities that scale with Favored Soul level now add Epic Levels as well. Passive: +4 Charisma.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Good Hope
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell-Like Ability: This area of effect spell instills powerful hope to the recipients, granting a +2 morale bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks and weapon damage rolls. Good Hope counters and dispels Crushing Despair. Spell Point Cost: 10/5/2 SP. Cooldown: 3 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Confidence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration, Diplomacy and Heal. Rank 3: You also gain +10 Positive Energy Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Divine Durability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Competence Bonus to Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Spell Critical Chance I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Positive Healing spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Spell Points
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/90] Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Close Wounds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Spell Like A Ability: Positive energy is quickly channeled to heal light wounds of your target or damage undead for 2/2/3 to 4 hit points plus an additional [1/2/3] for every caster level up to caster level 5. This spell has faster than normal casting speed and minimal cooldown. Spell Point Cost: 6/4/2 Spell Points Cooldown: 3/2/1 seconds
D&D Dices: Heals 1d3+1/2d3+2/3d3+3 per caster level (max 5).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Hope for Inspiration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target ally gains a Sacred bonus to all Skills equal to 1 + 1/4 your Favored Soul level for 18 seconds. 6 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Divine Durability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Competence bonus to Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Spell Critical Chance II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Positive Healing spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Might's Reward
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Multiselector, Choose your bonus:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Might's Reward: Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain an Sacred bonus to Positive Spell Power equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier for 30/60/120 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Might's Reward: Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain an Sacred bonus to Positive Spell Power equal to 5 + your Strength modifier for 30/60/120 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Might's Reward: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain an Sacred bonus to Positive Spell Power equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier for 30/60/120 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Hope for Protection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target ally gains a Sacred bonus to PRR and MRR equal to 3 + Favored Soul level for 20 seconds. 6 Second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Efficient Empower Healing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Using the Empower Healing Spell Metamagic costs you 4 fewer Spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Spell Critical Chance III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Positive Healing spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Death Ward
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Grants an ally immunity to death spells and effects, energy drain and negative energy effects. Spell point Cost: 10/8/5 Spell points Cooldown: 4 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Hope for Victory
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target ally gains a Sacred Bonus to Melee and Ranged power equal to 3 + half your Favored Soul level, and Universal Spell Power equal to 6 + your Favored Soul level. This lasts for 18 seconds, 6 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Optimism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every time you cast one of your Hope abilities, you gain a stack of Rising Beacon, giving yourself +2 PRR, +2 MRR and +1 AC. This stacks up to 10 times, and stacks fade once every 12 seconds. Hope for Success grants 3 stacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Spell Critical Chance IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Positive Healing spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Raise Dead
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Resurrects the target, restores 10% of the target's hit points and preserves current spell points. 15 Spell Points, 9 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Hope for Success
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target ally's main hand weapon (at the time of casting) gains +1 to Critical Threat Range and Muliplier for 20 seconds. 1 Minute cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Heal
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Channels powerful positive energy into allies to wipe away injury and afflictions, restore 10 Hit Points per caster level (Maximum caster level 15.), removes the conditions or effects: Ability Damaged, Blinded, Confused, Dazed, Dazzled, Deafened, Diseased, Exhausted, Fatigued, Feebleminded, Insanity, Nauseated and Poisoned. Against Undead this spell acts as Harm. Undead who make a successful Will save reduce the damage by half. 40 Spell Points. 6 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Undying Beacon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Allies affected by your Beacons gain Unconsciousness Range equal to 10x your Favored Soul level. This effect lasts for 12 seconds, and is refreshed if the target is affected by another Beacon spell.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Flame of the Favored
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Creates a wall that persists for 30 seconds. Allies within the aura are healing 1 hit point per 3 Favored Soul levels as long as they remain within it. Undead enemies are damaged for the same amount. Costs 40 Spell Points. 30 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Smite Foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and a Ranged attack. Passive: +2 Armor Class, +5 Fire Spell Power, +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Smite Foe (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: Smite your enemy with a melee attack that deals an additional 2[W] damage. Cooldown: 12 seconds. Passive: +2 Armor Class, +5 Fire Spell Power, +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Smite Foe (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Attack: Smite your enemy with a ranged attack that deals an additional 2[W] damage. Cooldown: 12 seconds. Passive: +2 Armor Class, +5 Fire Spell Power, +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Resilience of Battle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Damage Reduction 5/-, +2 Armor Class, +5 Fire Spell Power, +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Sanctuary
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For 20 seconds, you gain +20 Sacred bonus to Physical Resistance. Spell Point Cost: 10 Spell Points Cooldown: 1 minute Passive: +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: War Caster: Blur
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Blur is added to your spellbook as a level 2 spell. In addition, you permanently benefit from the effect of the Blur spell. Passive: +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: War caster: Haste
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Haste is added to your spellbook as a level 3 spell. Passive: +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range with your Favored weapon.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Implacable Foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Strength, Wisdom and Charisma variants.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Implacable Foe (Strength)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate: You and nearby allies gain 100 Temporary Hit Points and their attacks will deal 10% additional damage. For the next 18 seconds, these bonuses will refresh every 3 seconds on you and each ally that remains in range. These effects will expire 5 seconds after they are no longer refreshed. Cooldown: 3 minutes Passive: Divine Vessel now triggers on reaching 20 stacks of Divine Conduit, instead of 25. +4 Strength +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Implacable Foe (Wisdom)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate: You and nearby allies gain 100 Temporary Hit Points and their attacks will deal 10% additional damage. For the next 18 seconds, these bonuses will refresh every 3 seconds on you and each ally that remains in range. These effects will expire 5 seconds after they are no longer refreshed. Cooldown: 3 minutes Passive: Divine Vessel now triggers on reaching 20 stacks of Divine Conduit, instead of 25. +4 Wisdom +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Implacable Foe (Charisma)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate: You and nearby allies gain 100 Temporary Hit Points and their attacks will deal 10% additional damage. For the next 18 seconds, these bonuses will refresh every 3 seconds on you and each ally that remains in range. These effects will expire 5 seconds after they are no longer refreshed. (Cooldown: 5 minutes) Passive: Divine Vessel now triggers on reaching 20 stacks of Divine Conduit, instead of 25. +4 Charisma +2 Armor Class +5 Fire Spell Power +5 Light Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Divine Might
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose your upgrade: Divine Might/Presence or Will

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Might
EnhancementSelection.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Charisma modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. Antirequisite: This ability cannot be trained if you have any other Battle Trance abilities. Spell point Cost: 21 Spell Points Cooldown: 20 seconds

Stance.Name: Divine Might
Stance.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Charisma modifier for [30/60/120] seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Will
EnhancementSelection.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. Antirequisite: This ability cannot be trained if you have any other Battle Trance abilities. Spell point Cost: 21 Spell Points Cooldown: 20 seconds

Stance.Name: Divine Will
Stance.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for [30/60/120] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Toughness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] maximum hp.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Righteous Weapons I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your favored weapon you gain +1 to hit and damage and +3 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Sacred Touch
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you heal allies (with positive energy damage spells) they gain +[1/2/3] AC and +[1/2/3] PRR for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Awareness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search and Spot. Rank 3: +1 save vs traps

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Smite Weakness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you strike an enemy with Smite Foe, they gain four to seven stacks of Vulnerable. (For each stack, the target takes 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Wall of Steel
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Physical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Righteous Weapons II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your favored weapon you gain +1 to hit and damage and +3 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Inflame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and your nearby allies gain a +[2/3/4] bonus to Armor Class, Attack Rolls, and Damage Rolls. Duration: 30 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Action Boost Haste
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to attack speed for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Magic Backlash
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When an enemy damages you with a spell, there is a [10/20/30]% chance they will be knocked down. (Does not affect bosses.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Radiant Flourish
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and Ranged attck

EnhancementSelection.Name: Radiant Flourish (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Favored Weapon Melee Attack: +[1/2/3][W]: On Hit: Enemy takes 1/2/3d6 Light Damage. This damage scales at 200% with the higher of your Melee and Ranged Power. Non-boss enemies have a small chance to be blinded with no save. 6 Second cooldown

EnhancementSelection.Name: Radiant Flourish (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Favored Weapon Ranged Attack: +[1/2/3][W]: On Hit: Enemy takes 1/2/3d6 Light Damage. This damage scales at 200% with the higher of your Melee and Ranged Power. Non-boss enemies have a small chance to be blinded with no save. 6 Second cooldown

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Righteous Weapons III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your favored weapon you gain +1 to hit and damage and +3 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Greater Inflame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Inflame now also grants a +[2/3/4] bonus to Saving Throws and a +[5/10/15]% bonus to Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, and Sonic Energy Absorption.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Ameliorating Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you strike an enemy with Smite Foe, you and your nearby allies are healed by 1d3 per character level, and benefit from the effects of the Lesser Restoration spell. (The heal from Ameliorating Strike is affected by your Positive Spell Power) You may only perform this AOE heal once per time you use this skill.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Silence the Wicked
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and a Ranged attack.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Silence the Wicked (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Favored Weapon Melee Attack: +[1/2/3][W]: On Hit: Affected enemy can't cast spells for 4/8/12 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Silence the Wicked (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Favored Weapon Ranged Attack: +[1/2/3][W]: On Hit: Affected enemy can't cast spells for 4/8/12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Righteous Weapons IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your favored weapon you gain +1 to hit and damage and +3 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Holy Striker
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Doublestrike or Doubleshot

EnhancementSelection.Name: Holy Striker
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[3/6/10]% Doublestrike

EnhancementSelection.Name: Holy Sniper
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[3/6/10]% Doubleshot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Divine Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Your god has imbued you with power and skill in combat, granting a +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier with weapons, a +6 Sacred bonus to Strength, and a base attack bonus equal to a fighter of the same level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Divine Vessel
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks generate a stack of Divine Conduit. When Divine Conduit reaches 25, all stacks are cleared and you gain one charge of this attack. (Max uses: 1. You cannot gain stacks of Divine Vessel while you have any uses of this attack.) Choose between Melee and Ranged attacks:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Vessel (Melee Attack)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active: Melee Favored Weapon Cleave Attack: Expend 1 charge. Take a shot with your bow, dealing +5[W] damage. Each affected enemy is hit by a meteor, taking 1 to 4 Fire and 1 to 4 Light Damage per character level. (Damage from the meteor is affected by Fire and Light Spellpower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Vessel (Ranged Attack)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active: Ranged Favored Weapon Attack: Expend 1 charge. Make a sweeping weapon attack against all nearby enemies for +5[W] damage. Each affected enemy is hit by a meteor, taking 1 to 4 Fire and 1 to 4 Light Damage per character level. (Damage from the meteor is affected by Fire and Light Spellpower.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Wrathful Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When wielding your religion's favored weapon in your main hand, you gain +3 to hit and damage, and +9 Universal Spell Power. When you score a Vorpal Hit with your religion's favored weapon, your attacks gain 10d6 Light Damage on hit for the next 12 seconds. This damage scales at 200% with the higher of your Melee or Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Divine Champion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wearing Medium armor (or in Mithral body feat), you gain +5% Doublestrike, +5% Doubleshot, +5 to confirm Critical hits and damage (before weapon multipliers).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: War Soul: Divine Intervention
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active: Divine Intervention: Ward your target against fatal damage. Hit point damage cannot lower a warded ally's hit point total below -9. When a warded ally is incapacitated, this effect heals the target after a few seconds for 10 to 39 hit points and then fades. Spell Point Cost: 30 spell points. Cooldown: 2 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Kensei Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a group of weapons as your Kensei focus. You gain +1 to hit with these weapons, and many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Archery
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of bows. You gain +1 to hit with longbows and shortbows. Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Axes
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of axes. You gain +1 to hit with battleaxes, greataxes, handaxes, and throwing axes. Dwarves also receive this bonus with dwarven waraxes. (The Exotic Weapon Mastery enhancement will add dwarven waraxes to this list of weapons if you are not a dwarf.) Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Crossbows
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of crossbows. You gain +1 to hit with heavy crossbows, and light crossbows. (The Exotic Weapon Mastery enhancement will add great crossbows and repeating crossbows to this list of weapons.) Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Druidic Weapons
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of druidic weapons. You gain +1 to hit with clubs, daggers, darts, quarterstaves, scimitars, sickles, and when using unarmed combat. Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Heavy Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of heavy blades. You gain +1 to hit with falchions, greatswords, longswords, and scimitars. (The Exotic Weapon Mastery enhancement will add bastard swords and khopeshes to this list of weapons.) Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Light Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of light blades. You gain +1 to hit with daggers, kukri, rapiers, shortswords, and throwing daggers. Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Maces and Clubs
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of maces and clubs. You gain +1 to hit with clubs, light maces, heavy maces, greatclubs, morningstars, and quarterstaves. Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Martial Arts
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of monk weapons. You gain +1 to hit with handwraps, kama, quarterstaves, shuriken and when using unarmed combat. Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Picks and Hammers
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of picks and hammers. You gain +1 to hit with light picks, heavy picks, light hammers, warhammers, mauls, and throwing hammers. Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Spiritual Bond
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spiritual Bond: When you have a weapon equipped in your main hand that is part of your Focus, it gains On Vorpal: If this weapon has fewer stacks of Battle Meditation than the number of Kensei cores Abilities you possess, it gains one stack of Battle Meditation: This weapon gains a +1 Insight bonus to Enhancement bonus for 20 seconds. This stacks up to 10 times. On timer expiration, 1 stack of Meditative Focus is removed at a time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Strike With No Thought
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Passive: Your weapons gain +1 competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier. When you have a weapon equipped in your main hand that is part of your Focus, you gain 1% Doublestrike or 1% Doubleshot (depending on whether your Focus is melee or ranged). Each additional Core Ability you acquire from this tree increases this bonus by 1%.
Doublestrike: Your mainhand melee attacks gain a percent chance to strike twice.
Doubleshot: Your ranged attacks, including thrown attacks, gain a percent chance to attack with an extra projectile. Repeating Crossbows have a reduced chance to produce extra shots.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Power Surge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boost: You gain +8 Psionic bonus to all attributes for 60 seconds. If you possess the ability to generate Ki, you gain On Hit: +2 Ki. You may use this 5 times per rest.

Stance.Name: Kensei: Power Surge
Stance.Description: You gain +8 Psionic bonus to all attributes for 60 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: One Cut
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Your currently equipped primary weapon gains x1 Critical Damage Multiplier for 15 secs.(Cooldown: 1 minute) Passive: +20 Melee Power and Ranged Power. +1 use of Power Surge per Rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Alacrity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 to all ability scores, 15% doublestrike and doubleshot, +4 additional action boost uses and +2 to the DCs of all tactical feats. +2 uses of Power Surge per Rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Extra Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] extra action boost

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Weapon Group Specialization I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants bonuses to hit and damage with your selected Weapon group.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Archery
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of bows. You gain +1 to hit and damage with bows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Axes
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of axes. You gain +1 to hit and damage with axes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Crossbows
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of crossbows. You gain +1 to hit and damage with non-repeating crossbows. If you possess Exotic Weapon Mastery, you gain +1 to hit with repeating crossbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Druidic Weapons
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of druidic weapons. You gain +1 to hit and damage with druidic weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Heavy Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of heavy blades. You gain +1 to hit and damage with heavy blades.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Light Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of light blades. You gain +1 to hit and damage with light blades.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Maces and Clubs
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of maces and clubs. You gain +1 to hit and damage with maces and clubs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Martial Arts
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of monk weapons. You gain +1 to hit and damage with martial arts weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Picks and Hammers
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of picks and hammers. You gain +1 to hit and damage with picks and hammers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Exotic Weapon Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds exotic weapons to your Kensei Focus. Axes: Adds dwarven axe if you are not a dwarf. (This has no effect if you are a dwarf.) Crossbows: Adds great crossbows, heavy repeating crossbows, and light repeating crossbows. Heavy Blades: Adds bastard swords and khopesh. Note: This enhancement does not grant exotic proficiency.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an action boost, cooldown 30 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Attack Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain +4/+6/+8 Action Boost bonus to hit and damage for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Haste Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain +10%/+20%/+30% Action Boost bonus to attack speed for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Reed In The Wind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Focus Melee Attack: Deals +[1/2/3][W] damage. If you successfully damage your target you gain a +[3/6/9]% Insight bonus to Dodge for 6 seconds. (Cooldown: 15 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Tactics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to the DC's of your Tactical abilities.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Weapon Group Specialization II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants bonuses to hit and damage with your selected Weapon Group.

RequiresOneOf.DisplayDescription: Weapon Focus Feat for Kensei specialization selection

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Archery
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of bows. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with bows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Axes
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of axes. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with one handed axes, and +1 to hit and +3 damage with two handed axes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Crossbows
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of crossbows. You gain +1 to hit and +3 to damage with non-repeating crossbows. If you possess Exotic Weapon Mastery, you gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with repeating crossbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Druidic Weapons
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of druidic weapons. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with one handed druidic weapons, and +1 to hit and +3 damage with two handed druidic weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Heavy Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of heavy blades. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with one handed heavy blades, and +1 to hit and +3 damage with two handed heavy blades.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Light Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of light blades. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with light blades.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Maces and Clubs
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of maces and clubs. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with one handed maces and clubs, and +1 to hit and +3 damage with two handed maces and clubs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Martial Arts
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of monk weapons. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with one handed martial arts weapons, and +1 to hit and +3 damage with two handed martial arts weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Picks and Hammers
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of picks and hammers. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with one handed picks and hammers, and +1 to hit and +3 damage with two handed picks and hammers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Improved Dodge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3]% Dodge when wearing light or no armor. Note: Does not stack with Tempest: Improved Dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Ascetic Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your rigorous training gives you various benefits.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Agility
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration, Reflex Saves, and Dodge cap (in light or no armor).

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conditioning
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Fortitude Saves, +[5/10/15] HP and +[5/10/15]% Fortification

EnhancementSelection.Name: Contemplation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration and Will Saves. Rank 3: Your passive Ki regeneration is increased by 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Critical Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to confirm critical hits and critical hit damage (before weapon multipliers)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Weapon Group Specialization III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants bonuses to hit and damage with your selected Weapon Group.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Martial Arts
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of monk weapons. You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with martial arts weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Picks and Hammers
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of picks and hammers. You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with picks and hammers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Athletic Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Maximum Dexterity bonus and Dodge cap. -[1/2/3] Armor Check Penalty.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Shattering Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a melee or ranged special attack that deals extra damage and reduces an opponent's fortification.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shattering Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Focus Ranged Attack: Deals +[1/2/3][W] damage. On Damage: Target loses 15% fortification for 10 seconds. (no save)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shattering Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Focus Melee Attack: Deals +[1/2/3][W] damage. On Damage: Target loses 15% fortification for 10 seconds. (no save)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select +1 to either Strength, Dexterity or Wisdom.

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Opportunity Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: 2 Charges. Melee attack: Deals +3[W] Damage, comsumes 1 charge. On Damage: You gain 20 Melee Power for 6 Seconds. There is a 10% chance to regain an expended charge of this enhancement.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Weapon Group Specialization IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants bonuses to hit and damage with your selected Weapon Group.

EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of light blades. You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with light blades.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Maces and Clubs

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Martial Arts
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of monk weapons. You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with one handed martial arts weapons, and +1 to hit and +4 damage with two handed martial arts weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Picks and Hammers
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of picks and hammers. You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with one handed picks and hammers, and +1 to hit and +4 damage with two handed picks and hammers.

EnhancementSelection.Name: A Good Death (Ranged)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Deadly Strike

When you shield bash, damaged enemies gain 1d4 stacks of Vulnerability. This can occur once every [3/2/1] seconds.

Each opponent is knocked down and takes a shield bash attack for +[2/4/6] [W] damage. The knockdown is negated on Fortitude saving throw vs DC (20 + highest ability modifier + class level + bonus to trip attacks). [60/45/25] seconds cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Riddle of Fire
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Each Core Enhancement in the Henshin Mystic tree, including this one, grants you the following passive abilities: +3 Melee Power +2 Fire Resistance +3 PRR Enemies have -2 Fire Resistance against your spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Ki Bolt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Spell-Like Ability: Ki Bolt Passive: +3 Melee Power +2 Fire Resistance +3 PRR Enemies have -2 Fire Resistance against your spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Sounding Staff
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Quick Draw feat, which reduces the time between using Spell-Like Abilities and attacking. In addition, while you are centered and wielding a quarterstaff, you gain +2 Ki each time you hit a creature. This stacks with all other sources of Ki generation. Passive: +3 Melee Power +2 Fire Resistance +3 PRR Enemies have -2 Fire Resistance against your spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Incinerating Wave
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Fire Ki Spell-Like Ability: Incinerating Wave Passive: +3 Melee Power +2 Fire Resistance +3 PRR Enemies have -2 Fire Resistance against your spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Fire Ki Spell-Like Ability: Cauldron of Flame Passive: +3 Melee Power +2 Fire Resistance +3 PRR Enemies have -2 Fire Resistance against your spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Serenity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your understanding of things has evolved to a level that defies description. Passive: +4 Wisdom +10 Concentration +1 Passive Ki Generation +15 Melee Power +2 Fire Resistance Enemies have an additional -2 Fire Resistance against your spells. While wielding a quarterstaff inside your Cauldron of Flame, you gain +5 to hit and damage, and a +1 Critical Multiplier. +15% attack speed with quarterstaves.

EnhancementSelection.Name: All-Consuming Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description: Fire Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to light up like tinder. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more fire damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable. (Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Porous Soul
EnhancementSelection.Description: Earth Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to draw acid in like a sponge. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more acid damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable. (Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Static Charge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Air Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to feel the fury of the sky. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more electrical and sonic damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable. (Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Winter's Touch
EnhancementSelection.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to feel the chill of death. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more cold damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable. (Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Negotiator
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Bluff, Diplomacy, and Haggle. Rank 3: The cooldown for your Bluff, Diplomacy, and Intimidate are reduced by 10%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Animal Forms
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You emulate a creature of nature in your training.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Clever Monkey
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a monkey, no trap in the world can catch you. You gain +1 to your haggle skill and all saves against traps, as well as energy resistance 2. At monk levels 3, 9, and 15, the skill and save bonuses increase by 1 and energy resistance increases by 2.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Elegant Crane
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a crane, you strike with precision and elegance. You gain +1 to your Diplomacy skill, and generate 1 additional Ki on critical hits. Your training has left you more fragile than normal, however, and have a -1 penalty to Fortitude saves. At monk levels 3, 9, and 15, these bonuses and penalties increase by 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Faithful Hound
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a hound, you are ever vigilant and at home amidst the pack. You gain +1 to your Listen skill and a +2 bonus to hit flanked opponents. At monk levels 3, 9, and 15, the bonuses increase by 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Patient Tortoise
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a tortoise, you are calm at heart and worries wash over you. You gain +1 to your Concentration skill and 5 additional hit points. At monk levels 3, 9, and 15, the skill bonus increases by 1 and hit point bonus increases by 5.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Tenacious Badger
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a badger, you are most dangerous when grievously injured. You gain +1 to your Intimidate skill, and whenever you are below 50% health, your passive Ki regeneration is increased by 1 and you deal +0.25[W] additional damage. Your patience has suffered, however, and you generate Ki slower when meditating. At monk levels 3, 9, and 15, the skill bonus increases by 1 and the damage bonus increases by +0.25[W].
