On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more cold damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable. (Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Henshin Staff Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and +2 to damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Quick Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Quarterstaff Attack: Deals +[1/2/3][W] damage. You gain a [5/15/25]% Morale bonus to melee doublestrike for 10 seconds. (Cooldown: 18/15/12 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Elemental Ki Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four attacks that have secondary after effects: (Activation Cost: 5 Ki. Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Eagle Claw Attack
EnhancementSelection.Description: Fire Ki Melee Attack: Your attacks can shatter objects. You strike at weak points in your opponents armor or hide, dealing +2[W] damage and apply four stacks of Armor Destruction. (Each stack reduces Armor Class by 1 and Fortification by 1% for 20 seconds. This effect can stack up to 15 times.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fists of Iron
EnhancementSelection.Description: Earth Ki Melee Attack: You have imbued your attacks with extra force. Performs a melee attack with +3[W] damage, +1 critical threat range, and +1 Critical Damage Multiplier.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knock on the Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: Air Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent, deflecting their momentum. Performs a melee attack with +1[W] damage, and your enemy deals 4% less physical damage for 30 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Unbalancing Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You have learned several joint strikes. You can attack these weak points of your opponent, dealing +3[W] and throwing them off balance for a short period of time. This reduces their armor class by 2, applies a -10 penalty to their Balance skill, and renders them vulnerable to sneak attacks. A successful Reflex save negates this effect (DC 10 + Half Monk Level + Wisdom modifier + Trip modifiers). The target receives periodic saves to attempt to break free of this effect.

DC.Name: Henshin Mystic: Unbalancing Strike
DC.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You have learned several joint strikes. You can attack these weak points of your opponent, dealing +3[w] and throwing them off balance for a short period of time. This reduces their armor class by 2, applies a -10 penalty to their Balance skill, and renders them vulnerable to sneak attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Contemplation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration and Will Saves. Rank 3: Your passive Ki regeneration is increased by 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Elemental Words III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four attacks (not previously selected) that increase elemental damage taken by your opponent:

EnhancementSelection.Name: All-Consuming Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description: Fire Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to light up like tinder. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more fire damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable. (Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Porous Soul
EnhancementSelection.Description: Earth Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to draw acid in like a sponge. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more acid damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable. (Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Static Charge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Air Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to feel the fury of the sky. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more electrical and sonic damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable. (Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Winter's Touch
EnhancementSelection.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to feel the chill of death. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more cold damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable. (Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Henshin Staff Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Lighting the Candle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Weapon Stance: While you are centered, you enhance your attacks with Ki flame. Two handed weapons gain: On Hit: 2d[4/6/8] Fire damage On Critical: [2/4/6]d10 Force damage. One handed weapons and handwraps gain: On Hit: 2d[2/3/4] Fire damage On Critical: [2/4/6]d6 Force damage. This damage scales with Melee Power. Your Ki generation on hit is reduced by 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Embrace the Void
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain [1/2/3] Meditation use per rest, +[1/2/3] to Dodge Cap, and regenerate Ki faster while meditating. While you are meditating, you generate a protective shield which can absorb up to [25/50/100] damage, and is refreshed every 3 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants a passive bonus to the Monk and nearby allies that grants +10 Exceptional bonus to Spellpower and +5 Exceptional Bonuses to both Melee and Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Void Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Void Ki Melee Attack: You have learned to make attacks backed by pure Ki energy. On Hit: +3[W], +1 to Critical Threat Range and Multiplier, and 10d6 Force damage that scales with Melee Power. On Vorpal: Your enemy is erased from existence. (Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Henshin Staff Training V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 to hit and damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Staff Specialization
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier and Threat Range with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Balance in Dawn
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a melee attack that opposes your philosophy:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Henshin Mystic: Every Light Casts a Shadow
EnhancementSelection.Description: Dark Ki Melee Attack: Perform an attack with +2[W] damage. On Damage: Target suffers 1d4 Negative Levels. All nearby enemies suffer 1d2 Negative Levels. (Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 12 seconds)

Requirement.Feat: Path of Harmonious Balance: Fists of Light

EnhancementSelection.Name: Henshin Mystic: Shadows Cannot Exist Without Light
EnhancementSelection.Description: Light Ki Melee Attack: Perform an attack with +2[W] damage. On Damage: Target suffers 1d6 Light damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. This can stack up to 10 times. All allies around you receive 100 Positive Energy healing. (This healing effect is unaffected by Spell Power.) (Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 6 seconds)

Requirement.Feat: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Basic Ninja Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are centered, you can use your Dexterity modifier to hit. You are proficient with short swords and treat them as Ki weapons. If another ability allows you to remain centered while wielding other types of melee weapon, then those weapons will also get the benefit of Ninja Training.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Advanced Ninja Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are centered, you can use your Dexterity modifier for damage. You also gain a chance based on your Dexterity score to throw an extra shuriken per attack. If another ability allows you to remain centered while wielding other types of melee weapon (including unarmed/handwraps), then those weapons will also get the benefit of Advanced Ninja Training.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Shadow Veil
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: You focus your Ki and draw shadows around you. You become invisible and 25% incorporeal for one minute. Actions that break invisibility do not remove the incorporeality portion of this effect. (Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 6 seconds). Note: Becoming uncentered for any reason immediately removes both components of the buff.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Poisoned Darts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: You spit poisoned darts in a cone before you. Nearby enemies are affected by between 1 and 8 stacks of Ninja Poison. Magical Poison: Target takes 1d4 points of Poison damage, which scales with melee power; every 3 seconds for 15 seconds. The Target's vulnerability to poison is increased by 5%. This ability can stack up to 20 times. On timer expiration, 5 stacks of Ninja Poison are removed at a time. Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Diversion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: You turn yourself invisible and create a dummy that attracts the attention of nearby enemies. For the next 20 seconds, gain +5 Sneak Attack Dice. Activation Cost: 50 Ki. Cooldown: 3 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Ninja Master
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 Dexterity and +2 Wisdom, +5 Sneak Attack Dice. While you are centered, you gain a +1 Competence bonus to you Critical Multiplier. Any weapon you wield while centered gains the Vorpal ability. If another ability allows you to remain centered while wielding other types of melee weapon, then those weapons will also gain these effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Ninjutsu I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four toggles that modify your Touch of Despair finisher: (Cooldown: 3 seconds)

Requirement.Feat: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ninja Spy: Impending Doom
EnhancementSelection.Description: If the enemy affected by your Touch of Despair dies within the next 30 seconds, you gain 25 Ki and 25 temporary hit points. Enemies immune to your Touch of Despair cannot be Doomed. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Poison Exploit
EnhancementSelection.Description: On a failed saving throw, your Touch of Despair finisher purges an enemy of Ninja Poison, dealing 1d20 poison damage per stack of Ninja Poison removed. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Poisoned Soul
EnhancementSelection.Description: On a failed saving throw, your Touch of Despair finisher also causes your opponent to gain a stack of Ninja Poison every 6 seconds for 30 seconds. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wave of Despair
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Touch of Despair finisher also causes all nearby enemies to suffer one negative level. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Stealthy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Hide and Move Silently. +20%/+35%/+50% movement speed while sneaking. Rank 3: While centered and Sneaking, your passive Ki regeneration is increased by 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Sneak Attack Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Subtlety
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: -[20/30/40]% threat generation with melee attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Acrobatic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Balance, Jump, and Tumble. +[1/2/3]% Dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[10/20/30] Action Boost bonus to Melee/Ranged Power for 20 seconds. Usable 5 times per rest. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Flash Bang
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Bomb Spell-Like Ability: Throws a fragile eggshell imbued with ninja magic that explodes into light, blinding opponents for 6 seconds on a failed reflex save and momentarily dazing opponents on a failed fortitude save. Both saving throws have DC equal to (10/14/18 + Monk Level + Wisdom Modifier). (Activation Cost: 20 Ki. Cooldown: 30 seconds)

DC.Name: Ninja Spy: Flash Bang (Blind)
DC.Description: Ki Bomb Spell-Like Ability: Throws a fragile eggshell imbued with ninja magic that explodes into light, blinding opponents for 6 seconds on a failed reflex save and momentarily dazing opponents on a failed fortitude save.

DC.Description: Ki Bomb Spell-Like Ability: Throws a fragile eggshell imbued with ninja magic that explodes into light, blinding opponents for 6 seconds on a failed reflex save and momentarily dazing opponents on a failed fortitude save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Sneak Attack Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Sting of the Ninja
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Weapon Stance: You poison your weapon with a secret mixture. While you are centered, your piercing and slashing melee weapons (and shuriken) inflict your foes with a stack of Ninja Poison on critical hits. (Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Sneak Attack Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: No Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You deal [10/20/30]% additional damage to helpless opponents.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Touch of Death
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Dark Ki Melee Attack: You strike a living opponent down with twisted Ki, dealing 500 additional negative energy damage. Your opponent takes half damage on a successful Fortitude save (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + your monk level). (Activation Cost: 50 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

Requirement.Feat: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness

DC.Name: Ninja Spy: Touch of Death
DC.Description: Dark Ki Melee Attack: You strike a living opponent down with twisted Ki, dealing 500 additional negative energy damage. Your opponent takes half damage on a successful Fortitude save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Deadly Striker
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are centered with any weapon (other than Handwraps or a Quarterstaff), you gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Threat Range. Kamas and Shuriken gain double this bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Crippling Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Rogue ability, Crippling Strike. (On Sneak Attack: 2 Strength damage.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Shadow Double
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack with +2[W] and gain 100% melee doublestrike for 6 seconds. (Activation Cost: 30 Ki. Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Bastion of Purity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For each Core Ability you claim in this tree, you gain 10 Positive Energy Spell Power, which affects your monk finishing moves and spell-like abilities. Your Positive Healing Amplification is also increased by 10% for each Shintao Monk Core Ability you possess.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Protection from Tainted Creatures
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class and a +1 bonus to saving throws against attacks from tainted creatures (aberrations, extraplanar creatures that are not Lawful Outsiders, and undead). These bonuses stack with all other bonuses to armor class and saving throws. Your unarmed attacks now bypass Byeshk damage reduction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Iron Hand
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your unarmed attacks now bypass Cold Iron damage reduction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Argent Fist
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain an additional +1 bonus to Armor Class and a +1 bonus to saving throws. Your unarmed attacks and attacks with Handwraps now bypass Silver damage reduction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Touch the Void Dragon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: Spend 30 Ki to gain a 1d4+1 bonus to all ability scores for one minute (Cooldown: 3 minute). Passive: +5 Melee Power, +1[W] with handwraps or while unarmed

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: To Seek Perfection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You continually seek physical and spiritual betterment, reaping many benefits. You gain +4 Wisdom. +15 Melee Power, +2[W] with handwraps or while unarmed. You gain an additional +1 bonus to Armor Class and a +1 bonus to saving throws. You no longer suffer penalties from Meditation of War.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Elemental Curatives I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four toggles that modify your Healing Ki finisher:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Difficulty at the Beginning
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also applies a Lesser Restoration effect. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lifting the Veil
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes blindness. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Restoring the Balance
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes curses. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: The Receptive Earth
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes disease. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Reed in the Wind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: Deals +[1/2/3][W] damage. If you successfully damage your target you gain a +[3/6/9]% Insight bonus to Dodge for 6 seconds. (Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Deft Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[3/6/10]% chance to make offhand attacks while centered and wielding two weapons or fighting unarmed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Ki Shout
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: Intimidates nearby enemies, encouraging them to attack you. This ability uses your Concentration skill, and shares a cooldown with the Intimidate skill. (Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Exemplar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Heal and Intimidate. Rank 3: You also gain +10% threat generation.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Elemental Curatives II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four toggles (not previously selected) that modify your Healing Ki finisher.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Difficulty at the Beginning
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also applies a Lesser Restoration effect. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lifting the Veil
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes blindness. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Restoring the Balance
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes curses. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: The Receptive Earth
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes disease. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Smite Tainted Creature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You have the ability to expend Ki to deal devastating blows in melee against tainted creatures. You gain twice your Wisdom modifier to your attack roll and a damage bonus based on your monk level. A tainted target will be locked in a tomb of jade on vorpal attacks (attack roll of 20 followed by critical confirmation) on a failed Will save DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + your monk level + stun bonuses. Extraplanar Aberrations or Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid their fate. (Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

DC.Name: Shintao: Smite Tainted Creature
DC.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You have the ability to expend Ki to deal devastating blows in melee against tainted creatures. A tainted target will be locked in a tomb of jade on vorpal attacks on a failed Will save. Extraplanar Aberrations or Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid their fate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Iron Skin
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While centered, you gain an additional [5/10/20] PRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Elemental Ki Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four attacks that have secondary after effects: (Activation Cost: 5 Ki. Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Eagle Claw Attack
EnhancementSelection.Description: Fire Ki Melee Attack: Your attacks can shatter objects. You strike at weak points in your opponents armor or hide, dealing +2[W] damage and apply two stacks of the Armor Destruction effect. (Each stack reduces Armor Class by 1 and Fortification by 1% for 20 seconds. This effect can stack up to 15 times.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fists of Iron
EnhancementSelection.Description: Earth Ki Melee Attack: You have imbued your attacks with extra force. Performs a melee attack with +3[W] damage, +1 critical threat range, and +1 Critical Damage Multiplier.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knock on the Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: Air Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent, deflecting their momentum. Performs a melee attack with +1[W] damage, and your enemy deals 2% less physical damage for 30 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Unbalancing Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You have learned several joint strikes. You can attack these weak points of your opponent, dealing +3[w] and throwing them off balance for a short period of time. This reduces their armor class by 2, applies a -10 penalty to their Balance skill, and renders them vulnerable to sneak attacks. A successful Reflex save negates this effect (DC 10 + Half Monk Level + Wisdom modifier + Trip modifiers). The target receives periodic saves to attempt to break free of this effect.

DC.Name: Shintao: Unbalancing Strike
DC.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You have learned several joint strikes. You can attack these weak points of your opponent, dealing +3[w] and throwing them off balance for a short period of time. This reduces their armor class by 2, applies a -10 penalty to their Balance skill, and renders them vulnerable to sneak attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Conditioning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration and Fortitude Saves, +[5/10/15] HP.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Elemental Curatives III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four toggles (not previously selected) that modify your Healing Ki finisher:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Difficulty at the Beginning
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also applies a Lesser Restoration effect. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lifting the Veil
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes blindness. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Restoring the Balance
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes curses. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: The Receptive Earth
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes disease. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Jade Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack that is anathema to tainted creatures, that increases their physical damage vulnerability by 10% and reduces their fortification by 25%. A successful Will save negates this effect (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + your monk level). This ability only functions on aberrations, extraplanar creatures that are not classified as 'Lawful Outsiders', and undead. Creatures that are both extraplanar and either aberrations or undead receive double this effect. On critical hits, a tainted target will be locked in a tomb of jade on a failed Will save (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + monk level + stun bonuses). Extraplanar Aberrations or Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid their fate. (Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

DC.Name: Shintao: Jade Strike
DC.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack that is anathema to tainted creatures, that increases their physical damage vulnerability by 10% and reduces their fortification by 25%. A successful Will save negates this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Dismissing Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack that attempts to force an extraplanar enemy back to its proper plane. A successful Will save negates this effect (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + your monk level). (Activation Cost: 25 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

DC.Name: Shintao: Dismissing Strike
DC.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack that attempts to force an extraplanar enemy back to its proper plane. A successful Will save negates this effect.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Restoring the Balance
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes curses. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: The Receptive Earth
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes disease. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Tomb of Jade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform an attack that encases a tainted target in a tomb of jade on a failed Will save (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + monk level + stun bonuses). Extraplanar Aberrations or Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid this fate. (Activation Cost: 25 Ki. Cooldown: 1 minute)

DC.Name: Shintao: Tomb of Jade
DC.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform an attack that encases a tainted target in a tomb of jade on a failed Will save. Extraplanar Aberrations or Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid this fate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Instinctive Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You take 5%/10%/15% less extra damage when struck while helpless. (Additional damage while helpless varies by difficulty setting from 5% to 25%.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Empty Hand Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are centered and wielding Handwraps, you gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Threat Range and Multiplier.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Kukan-Do
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: You lock gazes with an enemy, stunning them for a short period of time on a failed Will save (DC 10 + Wisdom modifier + Monk level). Any effects that modify your Stunning Blow or Stunning Fist DC's also affect this ability. Sightless creatures are unaffected by this ability. (Activation Cost: 25 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

DC.Name: Shintao: Kukan-Do
DC.Description: Ki Activate: You lock gazes with an enemy, stunning them for a short period of time on a failed Will save. Any effects that modify your Stunning Blow or Stunning Fist DC's also affect this ability. Sightless creatures are unaffected by this ability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Violence Begets Violence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Earth Stance is active, when an opponent misses you in melee, you gain +1 critical threat range for 6 seconds. This stacks up to 5 times and is reset if you critically hit. Minor bug: The in-game description states that this effect only takes place while Earth Stance is active. It has been tested to work in Ocean Stance, and presumably also works in the other stances.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Meditation of War
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Air Stance: +2 to hit +10% bonus to off-hand attack chance You take 10% more physical and elemental damage. Fire Stance: +2 bonus to damage and to the DC's of your Stun, Sunder, and Trip abilities -5 Armor Class Earth Stance: +10 to Physical Resistance +10% Quality bonus to Maximum Hit Points -5% Dodge Cap. Water Stance: +5 Maximum Dodge Bonus You deal 10% less damage with attacks. Note: Mutually exclusive with Stalwart stance and Sacred stance.

Stance.Name: Meditation of War
Stance.Description: Air Stance: +2 to hit +10% bonus to off-hand attack chance You take 10% more physical and elemental damage. Fire Stance: +2 bonus to damage and to the DC's of your Stun, Sunder, and Trip abilities -5 Armor Class Earth Stance: +10 to Physical Resistance +10% Quality bonus to Maximum Hit Points -5% Dodge Cap. Water Stance: +5 Maximum Dodge Bonus You deal 10% less damage with attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Rise of the Phoenix
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate While Dead: The spirit of a phoenix burns within you. You may bring yourself back from death's door, as if affected by the Resurrection spell. This ability may only be used once per rest. (Cooldown: 15 minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Slayer of Evil I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 to attack evil creatures and deal 1d4 additional light damage that scales with 200% Melee oe Ranged Power (whichever is higher). You resist evil influences particularly well, gaining a +2 bonus to saves against spells and effects produced by evil creatures.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Courage of Heaven
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Aura of Courage grants an additional +2 Sacred bonus to saves against Fear and now also grants a +2 Sacred bonus to saves against Enchantment. You gain +1 to hit for all attacks. Your Slayer of Evil now now deals 1d8 Light damage that scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power (whichever is higher).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Slayer of Evil II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your Slayer of Evil now grants +2 to attack evil creatures and deals 2d6 Light Damage that scales with 200% Melee or ranged Power (whichever is higher). You now resist evil influences particularly well, gaining a +2 bonus to saves against spells and effects produced by evil creatures. Your weapons gain the Ghost Touch effect.
In addition, you gain +4 Remove Disease charges and your Remove Disease also applies a Greater Restoration effect on your target.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Improved Courage of Heaven
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your Aura of Courage grants an additional +2 Sacred bonus to saves against Fear and now also grants a +2 Sacred bonus to saves against Enchantment. You now gain +2 to hit for all attacks. Your Slayer of Evil now deals 3d6 Light damage that scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power (whichever is higher).
You are now immune to Energy Drain.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Slayer of Evil III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Slayer of Evil now grants +4 to attack evil creatures and deals 5d6 Light damage that scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power (whichever is higher). You now resist evil influences particulary well, gaining a +4 bonus to saves against spells and effects produced by evil creatures. Your Vorpal hits against undead do an additional 500 damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Champion of Good
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain +4 Charisma and 10 Melee and Ranged Power. The save bonuses vs. Fear and Enchantment granted by Courage of Heaven are increased by an additional +2, Any weapon you wield is considered Good Aligned for purposes of bypassing damage reduction. Your Slayer of Evil now deals 7d6 Light damage that scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power (whichever is higher).
In addition, your Aura of Courage now grants allies a +3% Sacred bonus to Melee and Ranged damage, and if you have Ascendancy your Blessed Purpose now stacks up to 25 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Holy Combatant I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and Damage with Favored Weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Extra Smite
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[2/4/6] additional uses of Smite Evil per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Improved Second Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/20]% Strikethrough

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Shieldbeaker
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Sunder DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Knight's Authority
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Intimidate, Diplomacy and Concentration. Rankk 3: +1 Fortitude Save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Adept Combatant
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and Damage with all weapons. You gain Long Sword, Battle Axe, Heavy Mace, Morningstar and War Hammer as Favored Weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Divine Might
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Charisma modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. Antirequisite: This ability can not be trained if you have any other Battle Trance abilities. Spell Point Cost: 21/18/15 Cooldown: 20 seconds

Stance.Name: Divine Might
Stance.Description: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Charisma modifier for [30/60/120] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Melee Cleave or Ranged Attack.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Avenging Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Take a powerful shot for +3[W] damage. Shares a cooldown with the Cleave feat. Cooldown: 5 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Exalted Cleave
EnhancementSelection.Description: Make a sweeping attack against all nearby enemies for +3[W] damage. Shares a cooldown with the Cleave feat. Cooldown: 5 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Holy Combatant II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to Attack and Damage with Favored Weapons. You gain Greatsword as a Favored Weapon.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Divine Sacrifice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Melee or Ranged Attack.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Sacrifice
EnhancementSelection.Description: Giving up some of your life force to win the battle, you empwer your next blow against your foe. This attack increases the critical multiplier of your weapon by 1 and deals an additional 5d6 Light damage, but costs you 5 HP and 1 SP, whether or not the attack is successful.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Sacrifice (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Giving up some of your life force to win the battle, you empwer your next blow against your foe. This attack increases the critical multiplier of your weapon by 1 and deals an additional 5d6 Light damage, but costs you 5 HP and 1 SP, whether or not the attack is successful.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Lead the Charge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Rush Attack: Rush forward up to 30 feet to your selected opponent and deliver a +[2/3/5][W] strike. 12 second cooldown. Shares a cooldown with Shield Charge,

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Exalted Smite
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Slect a Melee or Ranged Smite.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Exalted Smite
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active: An improved smite that adds +1/+1/+2 to your weapon's critical damage multiplier. Smite Evil: Using this attack, you call on the paladin's ability to strike down evil creatures, gaining twice your Charisma bonus to your attack roll, and a damage bonus based on your paladin level. Smites return at a rate of one every 90 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Exalted Smite (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active: An improved smite that adds +1/+1/+2 to your weapon's critical damage multiplier. Smite Evil: Using this attack, you call on the paladin's ability to strike down evil creatures, gaining twice your Charisma bonus to your attack roll, and a damage bonus based on your paladin level. Smites return at a rate of one every 90 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Knight's Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and Damage with all weapons and +1 to Attack and Damage with Favored Weapons. You also gain the Knight's Training feat: When wielding one of the following weapons, you are granted the following: Longswords you wield have a +1 Morale bonus to Critical Multiplier Battle Axes you wield have a +1 Morale bonus to Critical Threat Range, increasing to +2 Morale bonus if you have Improved Critical: Slashing Heavy Maces, Warhammers, and Morningstars you wield have a +1 Morale bonus to Critical Threat Range

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Ascendancy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+2 to Attack and Damage with all weapons. An additional +2 to Attack and Damage with Favored Weapons. You gain 15% Fotification Bypass.
Whenever you attack an Undead or Evil Outsider with a Favored Weapon, you gain a stack of Blessed Purpose: +3 Sacred Bonus to Melee and Ranged Power that lasts for 6 seconds. You can acquire up to 15 stacks of this by continuing to attack Undead or Evil Outsiders. Switching to a non-Favored Weapon will reset your stacks of Blessed Purpose.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Censure Outsiders
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Censure Demons ability now applies to all Chaotic or Evil outsiders. You also gain 10 Melee and Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Vigor of Life II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +30 Positive Healing Amplification -30 Negative Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Avenging Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Melee Cleave or Ranged Attack

EnhancementSelection.Name: Avenging Cleave
EnhancementSelection.Description: Make a sweeping weapon attack against all nearby enemies for +5[W] damage. Damaged enemies gains one stack of Vulnerability. Shares its cooldown with the Great Cleave feat. Vulnerability: You take 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Avenging Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Take a sweeping weapon attack against all nearby enemies for +5[W] damage. Damaged enemies gains one stack of Vulnerability. Shares its cooldown with the Great Cleave feat. Vulnerability: You take 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Holy Retribution
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Melee or Ranged Attack

EnhancementSelection.Name: Holy Retribution
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Melee Channel Divinity: Executes a powerful holy cleave against nearby targets that deals +5[W] damage, 100 extra holy damage that scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power, -6 to all ability scores for 10 seconds, and recharges one Smite Evil charge to you. On Damage: Evil creatures may be forced to make a Will save (DC 10 + Paladin Level + Charisma Mod + Sunder Bonuses) or be destroyed.
Evil creatures with under 1000 HP must always make this save or die. Evil creatures with between 5000 and 1000 HP have a 50% chance to be forced to make this save or die. Evil creatures with more than 5000 have a 33% chance to be forced to make this save or die.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Holy Retribution Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Ranged Channel Divinity: Executes a powerful holy cleave against nearby targets that deals +5[W] damage, 100 extra holy damage that scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power, -6 to all ability scores for 10 seconds, and recharges one Smite Evil charge to you. On Damage: Evil creatures may be forced to make a Will save (DC 10 + Paladin Level + Charisma Mod + Sunder Bonuses) or be destroyed.
Evil creatures with under 1000 HP must always make this save or die. Evil creatures with between 5000 and 1000 HP have a 50% chance to be forced to make this save or die. Evil creatures with more than 5000 have a 33% chance to be forced to make this save or die.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Holy Bastion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 Hit Point and 1 Positive Energy Spell Spell Power for each action point you spend in this tree. Each Sacred Defender Core Ability you possess grants +2% Fortification.

Sacred Defender: Positive spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Sacred Defence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Defensive Combat Stance: +10 Physical and Magical Resistance Rating +150% bonus to threat generation Cannot become Raged while Sacred Defence is active.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Divine Righteousness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Channel Divinity: You gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma score and a 200% Sacred bonus to threat generation for 60 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Redemption
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The following spells are added to the Paladin spell list: Level 2: Raise Dead Level 3: Resurrection Level 4: True Resurrection Passive: You gain +5 to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Glorious Stand
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +25 Positive Healing Amplification +3 Lay on Hands charges +10% Sacred Bonus to Maximum Hit Points +5 to Physical and Magical Resistance rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Eternal Defender
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain +2 Charisma, +2 Constitution, + 10 to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating , +100% Melee Threat, and your range of unconsciousness extends by 250 hitpoints. Toggle: While Eternal Defender is active, if you drop below 0 hit points but are not killed, two uses of Turn Undead are immediately expended and you receive a reactive heal for 250 points of Positive Energy healing.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Item Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a [25/50/75]% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Extra Lay on Hands
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Lay on Hands use per rest.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Inciting Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain [150/300/450]% Sacred bonus to melee threat generation.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Resilient Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain a +[1/2/3] Sacred bonus to all Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Sacred Armor Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Armor Class and Armor Maximum Dexterity Bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Commanding Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] PRR and +[50/100/150]% Melee Threat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Instinctive Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You take [5/10/15]% less damage when struck while helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Bulwark Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Aura now grants an additonal +[1/3/5] Armor Class.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Improved Sacred Defense II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Sacred Defense stance. Choose one of the options you did not pick at tier 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Durable Defense

EnhancementSelection.Name: Inciting Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain [150/300/450]% Sacred bonus to melee threat generation.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Resilient Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain a +[1/2/3] Sacred bonus to all Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Sacred Shield Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15]% Shield Armor Class and +[1/2/3] Tower Shield Maximum Dexterity Bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Defense Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[5/10/15] Action Boost bonus to Armor Class, Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Resistance Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Aura now grants an additional +[1/2/3] to Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Improved Sacred Defense III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Sacred Defense stance. Pick the third option left.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Durable Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain +[5/10/15] Sacred bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Inciting Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain [150/300/450]% Sacred bonus to melee threat generation.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Resilient Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain a +[1/2/3] Sacred bonus to all Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Greater Sacred Defense I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Further improves your Sacred Defense stance. Choose one:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hardy Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defense: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strong Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defense: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Tenacious Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defense: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[10/15%/20]% Competence bonus to maximum hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Reinforced Defense I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves the Armor Class bonuses you receive from shields or armor.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reinforced Armor
EnhancementSelection.Description: The Armor Class bonus you gain from armor or docents is increased by [15/30/50]%.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reinforced Shield
EnhancementSelection.Description: The Armor Class bonus you gain from using a shield is increased by [15/30/50]%. Note: The Shield bonus does not stack with the bonus from the Unyielding Sentinel Epic Destiny. Note: This stacks with Reinforced Defense from Stalwart Defender.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Spellshield Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Aura now also grants a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Spell Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Swift Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Sacred Defense grants a 10% Action Boost bonus to Movement Speed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Greater Sacred Defense II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Further improves your Sacred Defense stance. Choose one of the options you did not pick at tier 3.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hardy Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defense: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strong Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defense: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Tenacious Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defense: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[10/15%/20]% Competence bonus to maximum hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Reinforced Defense II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves the Armor Class bonuses you receive from shields or armor. Choose the option you didn't chose at Tier 4.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reinforced Armor
EnhancementSelection.Description: The Armor Class bonus you gain from armor or docents is increased by [15/30/50]%.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reinforced Shield
EnhancementSelection.Description: The Armor Class bonus you gain from using a shield is increased by [15/30/50]%. Note: The Shield bonus does not stack with the bonus from the Unyielding Sentinel Epic Destiny. Note: This stacks with Reinforced Defense from Stalwart Defender.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Harbored by Light
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[10/15/25] Physical and Magical Resistance Rating. You gain [1/2/3] additional uses of Lay on Hands. In addition, while you are actively blocking with a shield, enemies that attack you will take [3/4/5]d4 Light Damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Divine Revelation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Aura of Courage. Your Aura of Courage now grants +[1/2/3] additional Armor Class, +[1/2/3] additional Saving Throws, and +[1/2/3] additional Spell Resistance. In addition, you personally also gain 100 HP.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Greater Sacred Defense III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Further improves your Sacred Defense stance. Pick the third option left.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hardy Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defense: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strong Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defense: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Tenacious Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defense: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[10/15%/20]% Competence bonus to maximum hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Sacred Shield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a +10% Exceptional bonus to Armor Class, as well as +12 Spell Resistance and are protected from Magic Missiles.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Summon Falcon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Falconry Familiar

EnhancementSelection.Name: Summon Falcon
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Falcon companion as your Hunting Bird. While your Hunting Bird is by your side, it grants you a +2 bonus to Spot and Listen Checks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Summon Grey Owl
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Grey Owl companion as your Hunting Bird. While your Hunting Bird is by your side, it grants you a +2 bonus to Spot and Listen Checks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Summon Raven
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Raven companion as your Hunting Bird. While your Hunting Bird is by your side, it grants you a +2 bonus to Spot and Listen Checks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Summon Snow Owl
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a Snow Owl companion as your Hunting Bird. While your Hunting Bird is by your side, it grants you a +2 bonus to Spot and Listen Checks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Summon White Falcon
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a White Falcon companion as your Hunting Bird. While your Hunting Bird is by your side, it grants you a +2 bonus to Spot and Listen Checks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Well Rounded II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +3 Melee Power, Ranged Power, Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating. You gain +2 to Spot and Listen.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Master Falconer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 to all ability scores and benefit from the spell Freedom of Movement. Your active Falcon attacks have a chance to reset the cooldown on Death From Above.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Rugged
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +[2/4/6] Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Practiced Accuracy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2] to hit with weapons and +[1/2] to confirm critical attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Hunter's Knowledge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain Animals as a favored enemy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Out in Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +[5/10/15] to Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Wanderlust
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[1/2/3] bonus to Balance, Jump and Swim. Rank 3: You gain +1 to Fortitude saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Killer Instinct I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use your Wisdom modifier to hit with Melee and Missile weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Watch the Center
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants a +[1/2/3] bonus to Assassinate DC's.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Diving Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Choose between a Melee and Ranged attack. You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +[1/2/3][W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional [3/6/10]d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Trip DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses. Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Diving Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Ranged Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +[1/2/3][W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3/6/10d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Trip DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses. Cooldown: 12 seconds

Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3/6/10d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Cooldown: 12 seconds

Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3/6/10d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Trip DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses. Cooldown: 12 seconds

Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3/6/10d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Meticulous Weaponry
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Protect your items or increase your chance of recovering ammunition.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Meticulous Fletching
EnhancementSelection.Description: You are skilled at enhancing, salvaging, and re-purposing your arrows, bolts and throwing weapons. Your ammunition gains a [50/65/80]% chance of returning.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Meticulous Weaponry
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have a [25/50/75]% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Action Boost: Sprint
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: [30/35/45]% Action Boost bonus to movement speed for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Killer Instinct II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use your Wisdom modifier for damage with Melee and Missile weapons. BUG: DDO currently gives the Killer Instinct I to hit for Wisdom also with this enhancement.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Tear Flesh
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your bird attacks now also cause a bleed effect. Bleed: Do 1d6 damage every 2 seconds for 60 seconds. This stacks up to 10 times and scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Strike for the Eyes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a melee or ranged attack that will cause your bird to strike the target for damage, blind them and make them helpless.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shoot for the Eyes
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Ranged Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +[1/2/3][W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3/6/10d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to Blind the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Blind DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

DC.Name: Falconry: Shoot for the Eyes
DC.Description: Ranged Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +[1/2/3][W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3/6/10d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to Blind the target, causing them to become Helpless.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strike for the Eyes
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Melee Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +[1/2/3][W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3/6/10d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to Blind the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Blind DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

DC.Name: Falconry: Strike for the Eyes
DC.Description: Melee Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +[1/2/3][W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3/6/10d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to Blind the target, causing them to become Helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Conditioning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +5% Quality bonus to your hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Eyes of the Eagle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain True Seeing.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Deadly Instinct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to damage and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. 5 Charges per rest. Each attack from your Hunting Bird has a chance to reset 1 charge.
Antirequisite: This ability can not be trained if you have any other Trance abilities.

Stance.Name: Deadly Instinct
Stance.Description: Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to damage and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for 30/60/120 seconds. 5 Charges per rest. Each attack from your Hunting Bird has a chance to reset 1 charge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: No Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You deal +[10/20/30]% additional damage to helpless opponents.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Coordinated Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a melee or ranged attacks that will cause your bird to rain attacks over an area, damaging and blinding all foes in the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Coordinated Cleave
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Melee Falconer Cleave Attack: You cleave all opponents near you for +2[W], as your Hunting Bird descends to frenzy in a large area for an additional 10d6 damage that scales with Melee and Ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to blind each opponent struck.
Blind DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses. Cooldown: 25 seconds

DC.Name: Falconry: Coordinated Cleave
DC.Description: Melee Falconer Cleave Attack: You cleave all opponents near you for +2[W], as your Hunting Bird descends to frenzy in a large area for an additional 10d6 damage that scales with Melee and Ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to blind each opponent struck. Cooldown: 25 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shoot and Destroy
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Ranged Falconer Cleave Attack: You cleave all opponents near you for +2[W], as your Hunting Bird descends to frenzy in a large area for an additional 10d6 damage that scales with Melee and Ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to blind each opponent struck.
Blind DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses. Cooldown: 25 seconds

DC.Name: Falconry: Shoot and Destroy
DC.Description: Ranged Falconer Cleave Attack: You cleave all opponents near you for +2[W], as your Hunting Bird descends to frenzy in a large area for an additional 10d6 damage that scales with Melee and Ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to blind each opponent struck. Cooldown: 25 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Expose Weakness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Attacks from your Hunting Bird also reduce your target's fortification by 50%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Shared Vision
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are immune to Blindness effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Dangerous
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +10 Melee and Ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Death From Above
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and Ranged attack that will cause your bird to attempt to slay your foes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Death From Above
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Falconer Attack: Your Hunting Bird swoops down and attempts to end someone's life. You make an attack for +1/3/5[W], and your Hunting Bird also attacks for 10/100/200 points of damage that scales with 200% of Melee or Ranged Power, whichever is higher. The target struck makes a Fortitude Saving Throw, and on a failed save, dies. DC: 10 + Character level + Wisdom bonus + Assassinate bonuses. Cooldown one minute, with a 4.5 second shared cooldown with other Hunting Bird attacks. Choose One: Death from Above Shot (Ranged Falconer Attack) or Death from Above: (Melee Falconer Attack).

DC.Name: Falconry: Death From Above
DC.Description: Melee Falconer Attack: Your Hunting Bird swoops down and attempts to end someone's life. You make an attack for +1/3/5[W], and your Hunting Bird also attacks for 10/100/200 points of damage that scales with 200% of Melee or Ranged Power, whichever is higher. The target struck makes a Fortitude Saving Throw, and on a failed save, dies.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Death From Above Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Falconer Attack: Your Hunting Bird swoops down and attempts to end someone's life. You make an attack for +1/3/5[W], and your Hunting Bird also attacks for 10/100/200 points of damage that scales with 200% of Melee or Ranged Power, whichever is higher. The target struck makes a Fortitude Saving Throw, and on a failed save, dies. DC: 10 + Character level + Wisdom bonus + Assassinate bonuses. Cooldown one minute, with a 4.5 second shared cooldown with other Hunting Bird attacks. Choose One: Death from Above Shot (Ranged Falconer Attack) or Death from Above: (Melee Falconer Attack).

DC.Name: Falconry: Death From Above Shot
DC.Description: Ranged Falconer Attack: Your Hunting Bird swoops down and attempts to end someone's life. You make an attack for +1/3/5[W], and your Hunting Bird also attacks for 10/100/200 points of damage that scales with 200% of Melee or Ranged Power, whichever is higher. The target struck makes a Fortitude Saving Throw, and on a failed save, dies.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Thrill of the Hunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and Ranged attack.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thrill of the Hunt
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Falconer Attack: You strike your target for +1/3/5[W]. If you hit, you also heal for [5/10/20]% of your total hit points in Positive Healing. Cooldown: 30 Seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thrill of the Hunt Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Falconer Attack: You strike your target for +1/3/5[W]. If you hit, you also heal for [5/10/20]% of your total hit points in Positive Healing. Cooldown: 30 Seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Mark the Prey
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a melee or ranged attack that causes your bird to strike the target and mark them, making them more vulnerable to damage for a short period of time.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mark the Prey
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: You have learned how to spot weaknesses in even the mightiest of foes. You make an attack for +5[W], marking it as prey. The marked target takes 10% extra damage from you and your allies for 10 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mark the Prey Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Attack: You have learned how to spot weaknesses in even the mightiest of foes. You make an attack for +5[W], marking it as prey. The marked target takes 10% extra damage from you and your allies for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Agent of Good III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 to hit and damage vs. Evil. +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Harper's Freedom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Dispel most detrimental effects from you and add +10 to all saving throws for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 5 minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Harper Enchantment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your main and off-hand weapons gains an additional +1 to their Enhancement bonus. (This does not affect shields). You gain +20 to your maximum Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Weathered Traveller
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Energy resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Traveller's Toughness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] maximum hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Strategic Combat I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use your Intelligence modifier to hit with Melee and Missile weapons. Note: This does not function with shields.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Awareness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Listen, Search, and Spot. Rank 3: +1 save vs. traps.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Heroic Companion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boost: Grants an ally +[0.25/0.5/1][W], +[2/4/6] to hit and saving throws, +[0/2%/4]% Dodge and +[0/0/10] Physical Resistance Rating. (Cooldown: 30 seconds) Antireq: Cannot be taken with the Halfling racial enhancement.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Magical Endurance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/100] maximum Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Versatile Adept I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Melee Power, Ranged Power, and Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Know the Angles
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activation cost: [45/30/15] spell points. Cooldown: 20 seconds. Antirequisite: Divine Might. You gain an Insight bonus to damage and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Intelligence modifier for [30/60/120] seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Highly Skilled
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all skills.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Know Your Foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a new Favored Enemy feat, dealing extra damage against those enemies: Aberration / Construct / Dragon / Evil Outsider / Giant / Monstrous Humanoid / Undead.

EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to aberrations
