EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Banishing Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Banish an extraplanar creature back to their home plane. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell bonuses) On hit: Inflict Pull of Reality (-1 PRR/MRR, stacks up to 25 times. 5 stacks fade away every 3 seconds). Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells Instant kill does not affect bosses.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Banishing Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Banish an extraplanar creature back to their home plane.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Paralyzing Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) You imbue your arrows with paralyzing force. On Hit: Target is paralyzed. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses) On Save: -10% Movement and Attack speed. Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Paralyzing Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) You imbue your arrows with paralyzing force. On Hit: Target is paralyzed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Smiting Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Destroy a construct. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses). Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells. On Hit: Inflicts Deconstructed (Reduced attack speed, -25% Fortification, -25% healing from Repair) Instant kill does not affect bosses.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Smiting Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Destroy a construct.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Elemental Arrows IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four elemental arrow imbues (Can't choose the same type again), or Elemental Damage. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Corrosive Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive ability, dealing 1d8 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flaming Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming ability, dealing 1d8 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frost Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost ability, dealing 1d8 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shock Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock ability, dealing 1d8 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Damage dice with Elemental Arrows (Corrosive, Frost, Shock, Flaming, Force)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Moonbow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wielding a bow, once every 30 seconds you gain 20 temporary spell points for 10 seconds. +10 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Arrow of Slaying
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +250 damage. (This damage can be multiplied by critical hits.) (Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 20 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Final Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The first enemy hit triggers an area attack that inflicts Vulnerability and deals damage. More injured enemies receive increased damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Improved Elemental Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Elemental Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your elemental arrow imbues gain On Critical: 1d10-3d10 elemental damage based on critical multiplier and an additional effect:
Corrosive Arrows: Your arrows gain the Destruction ability. Flaming Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Target gains 1 stack of Burning (Target takes 1d6 fire damage every 2 seconds for 6 second. This effect can stack 20 times and loses one stack on expiration.) Frost Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Target gains 1 stack of Lethargy (You have -1 to all Saving throws. Non-bosses also move and attack 5% slower. This effect stacks up to 5 times.) Shock Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Vulnerable (Target takes 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times and loses one stack on expiration.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Damage dice with Elemental Arrows (Corrosive, Frost, Shock, Flaming, Force) Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Runebow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Bows you wield gain an additional +2 enhancement bonus. This is considered a Magic Weapon effect. (Does not stack with the spell Enchant Weapons.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Knife in the Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain proficiency with Kukris. You can also use your Dexterity modifier to hit with Daggers and Kukris

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Dagger in the Back
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can now use your Dexterity modifier for damage with Daggers and Kukris. If you possess the Weapon Finesse feat, this also applies to melee weapons with which you can use your Dexterity modifier to hit. This enhancement does not work with handwraps or unarmed attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Assassin's Trick
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Target opponent loses their immunity to sneak attack and 25% of their fortification. (Cooldown: 6 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Nimbleness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5 Melee Power On Hit: Up to once every 1 seconds, you gain 1% dodge for 6 seconds. This effect can stack up to 10 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Lethality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in light or cloth armor you gain +1 Insight bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier for any one-handed weapon you are wielding.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Deadly Shadow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 Dexterity and +2 Intelligence. You gain 10 Melee Power and +4 Sneak Attack dice. You gain +4 to Reflex Saving Throws. You gain +2 to the DC of your Assassinate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Poison Strikes I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of three poisonous attacks. These attacks apply an "Assassin's Mark" to an opponent for 10 seconds on hit, enabling Weakening Strikes and Deadly Strikes (see below) to effect that opponent. (Cooldown: 6 seconds):

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heartseeker Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 fort save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Con damage, On vorpal: Heartseeker (-5% hit points, Fort save to negate DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier)

DC.Name: Assassin: Heartseeker Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On vorpal: Heartseeker

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ice Chill Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 reflex save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Dex damage, On vorpal: Paralysis (Fort DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier negates) 25% chance for additional save when the affected creature is damaged.

DC.Name: Assassin: Ice Chill Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On vorpal: Paralysis

EnhancementSelection.Name: Soulshatter Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 Will save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Wis damage, On Vorpal: Shattermantle (-100 Spell Resistance for 10 seconds; Will save to negate, DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier)

DC.Name: Assassin: Soulshatter Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On Vorpal: Shattermantle

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Toxin Affinity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Fortitude saves vs. Poisons and to the save DC of your Poison attacks

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Shiv
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: +[1/2/3][W] damage and causes your target to become Bluffed. On Sneak Attack: Target also gains a -2 Fortitude Save against Poisons for 20 seconds. (Stacks 5 times.) (Cooldown: 12 seconds) Bluff duration is 1 second plus 1 second per four Rogue levels.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Sneak Attack Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing sneak attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Stealthy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Hide and Move Silently. +[25/50/75]% movement speed while sneaking.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Poison Strikes II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of three poisonous attacks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heartseeker Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 fort save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Con damage, On vorpal: Heartseeker (-5% hit points, Fort save to negate DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier)

DC.Name: Assassin: Heartseeker Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On vorpal: Heartseeker

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ice Chill Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 reflex save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Dex damage, On vorpal: Paralysis (Fort DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier negates) 25% chance for additional save when the affected creature is damaged.

DC.Name: Assassin: Ice Chill Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On vorpal: Paralysis

EnhancementSelection.Name: Soulshatter Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 Will save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Wis damage, On Vorpal: Shattermantle (-100 Spell Resistance for 10 seconds; Will save to negate, DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier)

DC.Name: Assassin: Soulshatter Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On Vorpal: Shattermantle

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Venomed Blades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Poison Stance: On hit: 1d[4/6/8] poison damage with weapon attacks.

Stance.Name: Venomed Blades
Stance.Description: On hit: 1d[4/6/8] poison damage with weapon attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Bleed Them Out
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: Deal +[1/2/3][W] damage and on successful damage causes your opponent to bleed. The bleed effect can stack up to 5 times. (Cooldown: 6 seconds) Bleed deals 1d6 damage every 2 seconds for 14 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Sneak Attack Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Action Boost: Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[10/20/30] Action Boost bonus to Melee Power and Ranged Power for 20 seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Poison Strikes III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of three poisonous attacks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heartseeker Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 fort save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Con damage, On vorpal: Heartseeker (-5% hit points, Fort save to negate DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier)

DC.Name: Assassin: Heartseeker Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On vorpal: Heartseeker

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ice Chill Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 reflex save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Dex damage, On vorpal: Paralysis (Fort DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier negates) 25% chance for additional save when the affected creature is damaged.

DC.Name: Assassin: Ice Chill Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On vorpal: Paralysis

EnhancementSelection.Name: Soulshatter Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 Will save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Wis damage, On Vorpal: Shattermantle (-100 Spell Resistance for 10 seconds; Will save to negate, DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier)

DC.Name: Assassin: Soulshatter Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On Vorpal: Shattermantle

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Critical Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] bonus to critical damage and to confirm critical hits.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Shadow Dagger
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Throws a dagger made of solidified shadows at your enemy. Deals [4/6/8]d8 unholy damage and blinds the target (Fort DC 10/14/18 + Rogue Level + the greater of Intelligence or Dexterity bonus + bonuses to Assassinate Negates blindness). This damage scales with 400% Melee Power. (Cooldown: 30/20/10 seconds)

DC.Name: Assassin: Shadow Dagger
DC.Description: Throws a dagger made of solidified shadows at your enemy. Deals [4/6/8]d8 unholy damage and blinds the target.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Sneak Attack Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing sneak attacks

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Execute
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Assassinate attack: +3[W] damage. If the target is below 30% health, deal 500 damage. This damage scales with 400% Melee Power. (Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Killer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you kill a target, gain +5% Morale bonus to Doublestrike and Doubleshot for 15 seconds. Weak enemies will not always produce this effect. The killer buff can stack up to [2/3/4] times. Doublestrike: Your mainhand melee attacks gain a percentage chance to strike twice. Doubleshot: Your ranged attacks including thrown attacks, gain a percent chance to attack with an extra projectile. Repeating Crossbows have a reduced chance to produce extra shots.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Weakening Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks against enemies with an Assassin's Mark (from Poisoned Strikes) reduce the Melee and Ranged Power of opponents by (10 + Rogue Level/2) for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Sneak Attack Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing sneak attacks

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Assassinate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Stealth Melee Assassinate Attack: On Sneak Attack: Kills the target instantly if the target fails a Fortitude save DC (10 + Rogue level + the greater of Intelligence or Dexterity bonus + bonuses to Assassinate). Even on a successful save, the target takes 10d6 additional sneak attack damage from this attack. (Cooldown: 12 seconds.)

DC.Name: Assassinate
DC.Description: Stealth Melee Assassinate Attack: On Sneak Attack: Kills a target instantly, Fortitude save negates.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Measure the Foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +6 Melee Power, +2 Dodge, +2 Maximum Dodge, +1 to hit and +1 to the DC's of your Assassinate abilities for every [4/2/1] seconds you remain stealthed. This effect stacks up to five times, and lasts 10 seconds after you come out of stealth.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Deadly Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks against enemies with an "Assassin's Mark". (Applied by Poison Strikes) do +10 damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Knife Specialization
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier with Daggers and Kukris. Daggers also gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Threat Range. If you have Improved Critical: Piercing, this bonus to Threat Range is doubled.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Light Armor Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain [2/4/6] to the maximum dexterity bonus of light armor and [2/4/6] PRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Staff Control
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can also use your Dexterity modifier to hit with Quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Stick Fighting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can now use your Dexterity modifier for damage with Quarterstaves. You have the 'Swords to Plowshares' feat without needing to meet the prerequisites, which grants a +1 Morale bonus to the Critical Threat Range to Quarterstaves, Sickles, and Kama.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Tumbler
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% Maximum Dodge, and +2 Maximum Dexterity Bonus for light armor. You can pass through enemies when you tumble.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Kip Up
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% Maximum Dodge, and +2 Maximum Dexterity Bonus for light armor. You are immune to most knockdown effects and slippery surfaces.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Cartwheel Charge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% Maximum Dodge, and +2 Maximum Dexterity Bonus for light armor. +20% Double Strike while using staves. After tumbling, you gain a +2 Morale bonus to Strength and Dexterity for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Followthrough
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For 12 seconds after tumbling, you gain +50% Strikethrough Chance and gain On Vorpal: Your target is knocked down. As a master thief-acrobat, you also gain the following passive benefits: +2 Strength and Dexterity +1 to hit and +2 damage with quarterstaves +5% attack speed with quarterstaves +2 critical hit damage with all weapons +2 Balance, Jump, and Tumble +2 Sneak Attack dice and +2 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Acrobat Staff Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and +2 damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Thief Acrobatics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Balance, Jump, and Tumble, +[5/10/15]% attack speed with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Charming
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle, and Intimidate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Sly Flourish
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: Deals +[1/2/3][W] with +[1/2/3] critical threat range, and reduces your threat with nearby enemies by [100/200/300] whether or not you deal damage. On Sneak Attack: Intelligent target also gains a -1 penalty to Balance, Reflex, and Will saves for 20 seconds. (Stacks 5 times.) (Cooldown: 8 seconds) Passive: Reduces the threat of all attacks by [5/10/15]%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Fast Movement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wearing light or cloth armor you run 1% faster for each of your Rogue levels.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Acrobat Staff Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and +2 damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Trip Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to the save DC's of Trip Attacks

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Subtlety
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: -[20/30/40]% threat generation with melee attacks. (This enhancement cannot be combined with other Subtlety enhancements.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Quick Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Quarterstaff Attack: Deals +[1/2/3][W] damage. You gain a [5/15/25]% Morale bonus to melee doublestrike for 10 seconds. (Cooldown: 18/15/12 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Haste Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a [10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to attack speed for 20 seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Acrobat Staff Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and +2 damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Improved Second Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/20]% Strikethrough

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Shadow Dodge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Dodge, Dexterity. +[1/2/3] Maximum Dexterity while wearing light armor.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Sweeping Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Quarterstaff Trip Attack: +[1/2/3][W] to all nearby enemies and trips them. Balance DC 10 + Rogue Level + Dexterity Modifier Negates trip. Cooldown: [30/25/20] seconds.

DC.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Sweeping Strikes
DC.Description: Melee Quarterstaff Trip Attack: +[1/2/3][W] to all nearby enemies and trips them.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief Acrobat: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Acrobat Staff Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and +2 damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Improved Defensive Roll
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Defensive Roll now triggers at [30/40/50]% health or below.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: No Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You deal [10/20/30]% additional damage to helpless opponents.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Staff Lunge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Quarterstaff Attack: Deals +[2/4/6][W] damage as you whirl through enemies in a line. Cooldown: [30/25/20] seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief Acrobat: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Acrobat Staff Training V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Melee Power, +3 to hit and +3 damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Staff Specialization
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier and Threat Range with Quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Spinning Staff Wall
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain 50 PRR for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds. Passive: While wearing cloth or light armor, gain 5% Dodge, 5% Maximum Dodge, and 5 Maximum Dexterity Bonus with Light Armor.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Vault
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Quarterstaff Action: Use your quarterstaff to propel yourself forward at great speed. Requires you to have a quarterstaff equipped. (Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Arbalester
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your ranged sneak attack and point blank shot range increases by 5 meters per trained Mechanic Core enhancement. You also gain proficiency with great crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Tanglefoot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alchemical Trap Activate: Throws a flask of caustic liquid at your enemy, which explodes into a sticky mess. Enemies caught within by the goo puddle take: 4d6 Acid damage every 2 seconds (Damage scales with 200% Ranged Power, Reflex DC 10 + Rogue Level + Intelligence Modifier for half damage) Slow (Reflex DC 10 + Rogue Level + Intelligence Modifier negates). Antirequisite: This enhancement cannot be taken at the same time as Tanglefoot in the Half-Elf tree. Cooldown: 30 seconds. Spell Resistance: No

DC.Name: Mechanic: Tanglefoot
DC.Description: Alchemical Trap Activate: Throws a flask of caustic liquid at your enemy, which explodes into a sticky mess. Enemies caught within by the goo puddle take 4d6 acid damage every 2 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Targeting Sights
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can now use your Intelligence modifier for damage with all crossbows and thrown weapons. You also gain proficiency with Light Repeating Crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Improved Detection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can detect traps and search from 50% further away. You gain proficiency with Heavy Repeating Crossbows. You gain +1 to hit and damage and 1 extra Sneak Attack die with bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Expert Builder
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier with bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. Great Crossbows instead gain +2 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier. Cooldowns of Alchemical Trap attacks are reduced by 20%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Hip Flask
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Action Boost: You drink a potion that you've been saving for a special occasion. This heals 10d3+30 positive energy, scaling with 200% Ranged Power. For the next 60 seconds, you gain +1d6 to all ability scores, +2d6 to attack and damage. For 10 seconds you gain +10 Dodge (this ignores Dodge caps). (Cooldown: 3 minutes) "A little something of your own creation. Potent stuff, drink sparingly."
As a Master Mechanic, you also gain these passive benefits: +2 Dexterity +2 Intelligence +1 to hit with all crossbows +1 damage with repeating crossbows +2 damage with non-repeating crossbows +2 Sneak Attack dice and +2 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. +1 additional damage and one Sneak Attack die with all non-repeating crossbows if you are not dual shooting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Lacerating Shots
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have upgraded your Great Crossbow to shoot more forcefully than its construction would normally allow. Your Great Crossbow attacks have a [33/66/100]% chance of putting a stack of Bleed on enemies.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Thunderstone
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: Throws an alchemical charge at your enemy. Deals [4/6/8]d6 sonic damage and dazes in area. Fort DC (12/14/16 + Rogue Level + Intelligence Modifier) Negates daze. The damage scales with 200% Ranged Power Cooldown: 12 seconds. Spell Resistance: No

DC.Name: Mechanic: Thunderstone
DC.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: Throws an alchemical charge at your enemy. Deals 4d6/6d6/8d6 sonic damage and dazes in area. The damage scales with 200% Ranged Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Mechanics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Disable Device, Open Lock, and Repair. +[1/2/3] to Saving Throws you make against traps.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Awareness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search, and Spot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. +1 additional damage and one Sneak Attack die with all non-repeating crossbows if you are not dual shooting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Improved Traps
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to the save DC's of Alchemical Trap Attacks and Magical Traps. Elemental Traps that you place now have a DC equal to [65/80/100]% of your Disable Device Skill instead of 50%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75]% damage and healing of your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells. Adds +[1/3/6] to the save DC's of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Skill Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[2/4/6] Action Boost bonus to all skills for 20 seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. +1 additional damage and one Sneak Attack die with all non-repeating crossbows if you are not dual shooting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Wrack Construct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Perform melee or ranged attacks that hinder constructs and living constructs. Choose one (Cooldown: 12/8/4 seconds):

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wracking Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Melee Attack: +1[W]. On Damage: Deals [3/6/9]d6 extra damage to constructs and living constructs, and applies Wracked: This construct or living construct's fortification is reduced by -10% and loses its inherent immunity to sneak attack. This effect stacks up to five times.
Damage scales with 200% melee power. Duration: 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wracking Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Ranged Attack: +1[W]. On Damage: Deals [3/6/9]d6 extra damage to constructs and living constructs, and applies Wracked: This construct or living construct's fortification is reduced by -10% and loses its inherent immunity to sneak attack. This effect stacks up to five times.
Damage scales with 200% ranged power. Duration: 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Ooze Flask
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: You throw a flask at your enemy that contains concentrated grey ooze secretions. Deals [4/8/12]d8 Acid damage (scales with 200% Melee Power), no save, and reduces the Armor Class and PRR of your opponent by [2/4/8] for 30 seconds, Fort DC 10 + Rogue Level + Intelligence Modifier negates. Cooldown: 12 seconds. Spell Resistance: No

DC.Name: Mechanic: Ooze Flask
DC.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: You throw a flask at your enemy that contains concentrated grey ooze secretions. Deals [4/8/12]d8 acid damage (scales with 200% Melee Power), no save, and reduces the Armor Class and PRR of your opponent by [2/4/8] for 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Use Magical Device
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Use Magic Device

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. +1 additional damage and one Sneak Attack die with all non-repeating crossbows if you are not dual shooting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Disable Construct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Target construct or living construct is dazed for [10/20/30] seconds. This effect is removed on damage. Using this ability on a target already affected by it will extend the duration. (Cooldown: 25 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Fletching
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are skilled at enhancing, salvaging, and re-purposing your arrows, bolts, and throwng weapons. +[3/6/10] Ranged Power and your ammunition gains a [50/65/80]% chance of returning.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Leg Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Attack: +2[W]. On Damage: Slow your enemy's movement by 50% for 10 seconds. (Cooldown: 10 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 to-hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. +3 additional damage and one Sneak Attack die with all non-repeating crossbows if you are not dual shooting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Rapid Fire
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10]% Doubleshot Doubleshot: Your ranged attacks, including thrown attacks, gain a percent chance to attack with an extra projectile. Repeating Crossbows have a reduced chance to produce extra shots.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Time Bomb
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: Creates an alchemical charge at your feet. Deals [10/25/50] Sonic and [10/25/50] Fire damage per Rogue level to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds, and knocks them to the ground. Reflex (DC [10/14/18] + Rogue Level + Intelligence Modifier) for half damage. Balance DC 10 + Rogue Level + Intelligence Modifier to Negate knockdown. Cooldown: 20 seconds. Spell Resistance: No

DC.Name: Mechanic: Time Bomb
DC.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: Quickly creates an alchemical charge at your feet. Deals [10/25/50] Sonic and [10/25/50]Ffire damage per rogue level to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds, and knocks them to the ground.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sniper
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1d6 Sneak Attack die with bows, repeating crossbows, and thrown weapons. Non-repeating crossbows instead gain +3d6 extra sneak attack damage and +2[W]. Great Crossbows now vorpal on a 19-20.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Mechanical Reloader
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Ranged Power, +10% Ranged Alacrity with repeating crossbows, dual shooters and thrown weapons. +30% to Ranged Alacrity with non-repeating crossbows when not dual shooting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Cleave Attack: Sheathe your weapon in eldritch energies, striking foes in front of you for +1[W] damage. If this attack hits, your weapon also releases a blast of magical energy, dealing an additional 1 to 2 Force Damage per character level to all nearby foes. This additional Force damage is affected by your Force Spell Power. Cooldown: 12 seconds Passive: You gain proficiency with Simple Weapons. Every Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants +10 Maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Spellsword
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain four elemental toggles that each imbue your weapon with elemental power. Only one may be active at a time, causing them to deal an additional 1d6 (element) damage on hit. You gain an additional 1d6 every 3 Sorcerer levels (at 6, 9, 12, 15 and 18). This damage scales with Spell Power. While active, your Eldritch Strike deals 1-2 additional (element) damage per Character Level which scales with Spell Power. Passive: +2% Doublestrike, +10 Universal Spell Power. You also gain proficiency in Light Armor and Martial weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Imbue the Blade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee weapons are considered Spellcasting Implements in your hands. You gain the Quick Draw feat, reducing the time between spellcasting and weapon use. -15% Arcane Spell Failure from equipped Armor, Shields, and Warforged Body feats. +2% Doublestrike, +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Subtle Force I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the benefits of the Deflect Arrows feat, knocking aside one incoming projectile that would have struck you every 6 seconds. Your Spellsword dice are now D8s instead of the original d6s -20% Arcane Spell Failure from equipped Armor, Shields, and Warforged Body feats. +6 Resistance to Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire and Sonic damage. +2% Doublestrike and +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Subtle Force II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5% Stacking Incorpreality. Your Deflect Arrows now triggers every 2 seconds. Your Spellsword Dice are now d10s (Replacing previous d8s). +2% Doublestrike. +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Blade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Eldritch Strike now grants you a Power Charge. When you have 5 Power Charges, they are removed, and you gain Eldritch Power. Eldritch Power: +10% to your damage with weapon attacks, +4 Spellsword Dice, +25 Universal spellpower. Duration: 30 seconds. Passive: Your Spellsword die size is now d12 +1 Spellsword die +2 Charisma, +2 Constitution +2% Doublestrike +10 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Mage Armor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Mage Armor. You gain Mage Armor as a spell-like ability. In addition, while you are under the effect of the Mage Armor spell, you gain a +[3/6/10]% exceptional bonus to your total Armor Class. Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Arcane Siphon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: +[1/2/3][W]: On Hit: Gain +[10/20/30] Competence bonus to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Item Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a 25%/50%/75% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Toughness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Battlemage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration, Intimidate, and Spellcraft.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Shield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Shield You gain the Shield spell as a spell-like ability. In addition, while you are under the effect of the Shield spell, you gain +[3/6/10] Physical Resistance Rating. Shield: +4 Shield bonus to Armor Class and Immunity to Magic Missiles. Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Mystic Wards
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Magical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Action Boost Spellpower
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[10/20/30] Action Boost bonus to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Shield Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain proficiency with all shields except Tower Shields, and your Arcane Spell Failure chance from equipped shields is reduced by 5%. This enhancement does not count as a prerequisite for Feats which require shield proficiency.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75]% effectiveness from your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells, and +[1/2/3] to the save DC of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Arcane Barrier
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: When your HP drop below 50% of maximum, you are immediately protected by an Arcane Barrier that reduces all incoming damage by 25% for the next 20 seconds. This effect may only trigger once every 90 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Accuracy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You get Charisma to hit with weapons and shield bashes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Synergetic Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you activate Action Boost: Spell Power, you also gain an equal Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Critical Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to confirm critical hits and critical hit damage (before weapon multipliers)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Dexterity or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Knight's Transformation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Toggle: While this is turned on, all your spells and SLAs that are affected by Metamagics have their range reduced to touch range. You gain +30 Universal Spell Power and +3% Spell Critical Damage. Your Base Attack Bonus equals your Character Level. You gain +5 to hit with Melee Weapons and 3% Doublestrike.
Exclusive from the Enlarge Metamagic and any Eldritch Blast shape stance. This stance works with other offensive and defensive stances, as well as Rages.

Stance.Name: Knight's Transformation
Stance.Description: While this is turned on, all your spells and SLAs that are affected by Metamagics have their range reduced to touch range. You cannot enable the Enlarge Metamagic while this is active. You gain +30 Universal Spell Power and +3% Spell Critical Damage. Your Base Attack Bonus equals your Character Level. You gain +5 to it with Melee Weapons and 3% Doublestrike.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Offhand Defenses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick between Shield and Orb bonuses.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Orb Saves
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] to saving throws and +[3/6/10] Universal Spell Power while holding an Orb

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shield Striking
EnhancementSelection.Description: On Hit: +[5/10/15]% chance to proc an immediate Shield Bash attack with an equipped shield.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Force's Point
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you cast an offensive spell, you gain a stack of Force's Point: Martial (+1 to Hit and Damage). This stacks up to 5 times. When you hit with a melee weapon, you gain a stack of Force's Point: Magical (+2 Universal Spell Power). This stacks up to 10 times. Stacks last 12 seconds each. You may only gain each effect once per second.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Armored Arcana
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain proficiency in Medium Armor, and you no longer suffer Arcane Spell Failure from Light Armor, Medium Armor or Mithral Body.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Dexterity or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Knight's Transformation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: If you have Knight's Transformation active, you also gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier with Melee Weapons, +3 Damage and the Mobile Spellcasting feat, allowing yout to cast while moving at full speed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Knight's Arcanum
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a focus for your spells while in Knight's Transformation

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knight's Controller
EnhancementSelection.Description: If you have Knight's Transformation active, you also gain: +2 Enchantment DCs, +2 Illusion DCs, +4 Spell Penetration and +20 Melee Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knight's Striker
EnhancementSelection.Description: If you have Knight's Transformation active, you also gain: +2 Evocation and Conjuration DCs and +20 Melee power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Force's Edge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you cast an offensive spell, you gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range for 12 seconds. When you make a Melee Attack, you gain +5% Spell Critical Chance for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Radiant Forcefield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Radiant Forcefield Activation Cost: 30 Spell Points. Cooldown: 3 Minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Tempest
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Perform a spinning melee attack, dealing weapon damage +5[W] to all nearby enemies and knocking them prone for 1 second. This attack has +10 to Critical Threat Range and +3 to Critical Multiplier. Enemies affected are knocked prone for one second and Slowed by 50% for 6 seconds. If any foes are struck by Eldritch Tempest, your weapon also releases an explosion of magical force, dealing an additional 1d6 Force damage per character level to all nearby enemies. This additional force damage is affected by your spell power. Activation Cost: 25/20/15 Spell points. Cooldown: 60/45/30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every point you spend in the Air Savant enhancement tree provides +0.75 Universal Spell Power. Passive: +10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. -10 Acid Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells Selecting this enhancement will prevent you from spending points in the Earth Savant enhancement tree.

Effect.DisplayName: Air Savant: Spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Air Affinity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. -10 Acid Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Greater Air Affinity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. -10 Acid Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Conduction
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: On Electric or Sonic Spell Cast: Your target randomly gains zero, one, or two stacks of Vulnerable (Target takes 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.) +10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. -10 Acid Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Light on Your Feet
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Immunity to most knockdown effects +10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. -10 Acid Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Elemental Apotheosis: Air
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to transform into an Air Elemental. While in elemental form, you gain +100% fortification. If you are a Warforged, you are no longer considered a Living Construct, and so are immune to Repair spells, but can be healed normally by Positive Energy spells. While in Air Elemental form, you also gain an additional +20 Electric and Sonic Spell Power, +2% Electric and Sonic Spell Critical Chance, and a +1 bonus to caster level and max caster level for Air, electrical, and sonic spells, but your water, earth, and fire spells have a -3 penalty to caster level and max caster level. You also gain a +10 racial bonus to electrical resistance, +20 Physical Resistance Rating, +3% dodge chance, and a -10 penalty to acid resistance. While in Elemental Form, your spells also cost an additional 10% Spell Points to cast. You also gain the following passive benefits, even while not in elemental form: +2 Charisma +10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. -10 Acid Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells

Stance.Name: Air Elemental
Stance.Description: While in elemental form, you gain +100% fortification. If you are a Warforged, you are no longer considered a Living Construct, and so are immune to Repair spells, but can be healed normally by Positive Energy spells. While in Air Elemental form, you also gain an additional +20 Electric and Sonic Spell Power, +2% Electric and Sonic Spell Critical Chance, and a +1 bonus to caster level and max caster level for Air, electrical, and sonic spells, but your water, earth, and fire spells have a -3 penalty to caster level and max caster level. You also gain a +10 racial bonus to electrical resistance, +20 Physical Resistance Rating, +3% dodge chance, and a -10 penalty to acid resistance.

Effect.DisplayName: Air Savant: Elemental Apotheosis: Air Penalty

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Shocking Grasp
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Shocking Grasp (Activation Cost: 4/3/2 Spell Points. Cooldown: 12/8/4 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Acrobatic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[2/4/6] to your Tumble, Jump and Balance skills. Rank 3: In Addition, your chance to Dodge enemy attacks is increased by 1%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: One with the Storm
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[3/6/10] bonus to your Electricity Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Spell Critical: Electric I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric and Sonic damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Electrocution
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you cast an Electric or Sonic damage spell, you gain +5 to your Electric and Sonic Spell Power for 6 seconds. This stacks up to 1/3/5 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Efficient Metamagic I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of the following Metamagic feats. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Pierce Electric Resistance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric and Sonic damage spells now bypass 5/10/15 points of your target's resistance to those damage types, if any.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Spell Critical: Electric II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric and Sonic damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Alternating Current
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you cast an Electric or Sonic damage spell, you have a [10/20/30]% chance to gain 3 Temporary Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Efficient Metamagic II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose another Metamagic feat. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic. (You can't choose the same one you chose at Tier 2)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Spell Penetration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You add +1 to your Caster Level check to overcome an enemy's Spell Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Spell Critical: Electric III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric and Sonic damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Electric Loop
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Electric Loop. (Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell Points. Cooldown: 15/10/5 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Efficient Heighten
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Using the Heighten Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2 fewer Spell Points per heightened level.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Efficient Heighten enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Feather Fall
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain Feather Falling, and may toggle it on or off at will. (Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Spell Critical: Electric IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric and Sonic damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Lightning Bolt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Lightning Bolt. (Activation Cost: 12/8/6 Spell Points. Cooldown: 18/12/6 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Awaken Elemental Weakness: Electric
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are able to curse an enemy, increasing Electric damage they take by 15%. (Activation Cost: 5 Spell Points. Cooldown: 20 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Wind Dance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You leap through the air, propelled by a gust of wind. Uses of this ability recharge at a rate of one every 15 seconds in private areas, and 3 seconds in town. (Activation Cost: 10 Spell Points. Cooldown: 3 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Evocation Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have trained extensively in Evocation magic, granting a +1 bonus to your spell DCs of that school.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Elemental Diversification
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one

EnhancementSelection.Name: Power of Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have extensively practiced with Fire magic, granting an additional +15 Fire Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Power of Force
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have extensively practiced with Force magic, granting an additional +10 Force Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Power of Frost
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have extensively practiced with Cold magic, granting an additional +15 Cold Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every point you spend in the Earth Savant enhancement tree provides +0.75 Universal Spell Power. Passive: +10 Acid Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells -10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. Selecting this enhancement will prevent you from spending points in the Air Savant enhancement tree.

Effect.DisplayName: Earth Savant: Spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Earth Affinity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +10 Acid Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells -10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Greater Earth Affinity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +10 Acid Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells -10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Crumbling
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: On Acid Spell Cast: Your target gains one stack of Armor Destruction +10 Acid Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells -10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: One With Stone
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Immunity to Petrification +10 Acid Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells -10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Elemental Apotheosis: Earth
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to transform into an Earth Elemental. While in elemental form, you gain +100% fortification. If you are a Warforged, you are no longer considered a Living Construct, and so are immune to Repair spells, but can be healed normally by Positive Energy spells. While in Earth Elemental form, you also gain an additional +20 Acid Spell Power, +2% Acid Spell Critical Chance, and a +1 bonus to caster level and max caster level for Acid and Earth spells, but your air, fire, and water spells have a -3 penalty to caster level and max caster level. You also gain a +10 racial bonus to acid resistance, +25 Physical Resistance Rating, and a -10 penalty to electrical resistance. While in Elemental Form, your spells also cost an additional 10% Spell Points to cast. You also gain the following passive benefits, even while not in elemental form: +2 Charisma +10 Acid Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells -10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells.

Stance.Name: Earth Elemental
Stance.Description: While in elemental form, you gain +100% fortification. If you are a Warforged, you are no longer considered a Living Construct, and so are immune to Repair spells, but can be healed normally by Positive Energy spells. While in Earth Elemental form, you also gain an additional +20 Acid Spell Power, +2% Acid Spell Critical Chance, and a +1 bonus to caster level and max caster level for Acid and Earth spells, but your air, fire, and water spells have a -3 penalty to caster level and max caster level. You also gain a +10 racial bonus to acid resistance, +25 Physical Resistance Rating, and a -10 penalty to electrical resistance.

Effect.DisplayName: Earth Savant: Elemental Apotheosis: Earth Penalty

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Acid Spray
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Acid Spray (Activation Cost: 4/3/2 Spell Points. Cooldown: 12/8/4 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Stability
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[2/4/6] to your Balance and Concentration skills. Rank 3: +1 to your Fortitude Saving Throw.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: One with the Soil
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[3/6/10] bonus to your Acid Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Spell Critical: Acid I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Acid damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Erosion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you cast an Acid damage spell, you gain +5 to your Acid Spell Power for 6 seconds. This stacks up to 1/3/5 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Efficient Metamagic I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of the following Metamagic feats. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Pierce Acid Resistance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Acid damage spells now bypass 5/10/15 points of your target's resistance to those damage types, if any.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Spell Critical: Acid II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Acid damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Devouring Earth
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you cast an Acid damage spell, you have a [10/20/30]% chance to gain 3 Temporary Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Earthgrab

EnhancementSelection.Name: Power of Frost

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fire Savant
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every point you spend in the Fire Savant enhancement tree provides +0.75 Universal Spell Power. Passive: +10 Fire Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Fire spells -10 Cold Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Cold or Water spells. Selecting this enhancement will prevent you from spending points in the Water Savant enhancement tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: On Fire Spell Cast: Your target gains one stack of Burning (Target takes 1d6 fire damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds. This effect can stack 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.) +10 Fire Spell Power +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Fire spells -10 Cold Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Cold or Water spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Immunity to Paralysis +10 Fire Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Fire spells +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Fire spells -10 Cold Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Cold or Water spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Eldritch Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Stance: While this is active, your Eldritch Blast changes into an aura that deals the same damage as your Eldritch Blast to all foes in range every 5 seconds, and scales with 130% spell power. You cannot fire Eldritch Blasts while in this stance, but may attack normally with weapons and cast spells. Stance cooldown: 8 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Aura of Courage
