EnhancementSelection.Description: Waves of electric energy emanate from your body, dealing [1d10+10/1d12+12/1d15+15] per caster level Electric damage to enemies in your vicinity. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Burst: Electric
DC.Description: Waves of electric energy emanate from your body, dealing [1d10+10/1d12+12/1d15+15] per caster level Electric damage to enemies in your vicinity. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Secondary Spell Speciality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an energy type not opposed to your dragon heritage. You gain +[10/20] spell power to that element and and +[1/2] caster level and maximum caster level for that element.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Secondary Spell Speciality: Acid
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[10/20] Acid Spell Power and +[1/2] caster levels for Acid spells

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Secondary Spell Speciality: Electric
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[10/20] Electric Spell Power and +[1/2] caster levels for Electric spells

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Secondary Spell Speciality: Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[10/20] Fire Spell Power and +[1/2] caster levels for Fire spells

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Secondary Spell Speciality: Cold
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[10/20] Cold Spell Power and +[1/2] caster levels for Cold spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Spell Knowledge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your dragon heritage grants you +1 to your caster level and maximum caster level on spells of your dragon element.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Spell Augmentation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds special effects to spells related to of your dragon's element. Fire spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to deal a blast of [3d6/6d6/9d6] extra Light damage Cold spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to deal a blast of [3d6/6d6/9d6] extra Sonic damage Acid spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to reduce enemies' Fortitude save by 5 for [10/20/30] seconds Electric spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to reduce enemies' Reflex save by 10 for [10/20/30] seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Ability IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Flyby Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your draconic lineage gives you the ability to soar through a group of enemies, damaging them with the fury of the elements. 2d6 damage of your dragon's energy type per caster level is dealt to any enemies struck during the attack. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier) reduces the damage by half. Each enemy is also knocked down unless it succeeds on a Strength or Dexterity save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier). Cooldown: 1 minute

DC.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Flyby Attack (Damage)
DC.Description: 2d6 damage of your dragon's energy type per caster level is dealt to any enemies struck during the attack. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Flyby Attack (Knockdown)
DC.Description: Each enemy is also knocked down unless it succeeds on a Strength or Dexterity save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Breath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Like a true dragon, you can breathe a powerful cone of intense elemental energy that deals 1d5 + 15 damage per caster level to enemies within its area of effect. A successful Refelex save (DC 20 + half character level + Cha/Int modifier) reduces the damage by half. You can use this ability 5 times per rest. Cooldown: 1 minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Breath Augmentation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Add special effects to your breath attacks. 15% chance that target will sleep. 15% chance that target will be slowed for 10 seconds. 15% chance that target will be paralyzed for 4 seconds. 15% chance that target will suffer 2d8 strength damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Ability V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Energy Vortex
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to cause intense elemental energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 elemental damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half. Cooldown: 2 minutes Cost: 30 SP

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Vortex: Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause intense fire energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Fire damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Vortex: Fire
DC.Description: Intense fire energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Fire damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Vortex: Cold
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause intense cold energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Cold damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Vortex: Cold
DC.Description: Intense cold energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Cold damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Vortex: Acid
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause intense acid energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Acid damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Vortex: Acid
DC.Description: Intense acid energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Acid damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Vortex: Electric
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause intense electric energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Electric damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

DC.Name: Energy Vortex: Electric
DC.Description: Intense electric energy to swirl around you, dealing damage to enemies within its area of effect. This effect follows you and deals 1d6 Electric damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds. A successful Reflex save (DC 20 + half character level + Int/Cha modifier) reduces the damage by half.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Hunger
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
The voracity of you draconic ancestors is strong within you. Once per second, when you cast a spell, this is a 5% chance that you will gain an Enhancement Bonus to Temporary HP equal to (10 + Double your Epic level) for 10 seconds, and a 5% chance that you will gain an Enhancement Bonus of Temporaray SP equal to (10 + Double your Epic level) for 10 seconds.
If Draconic Fury is active, you also gain a 10% chance that you will gain a Racial Bonus to Temporaray HP equal to (10 + Double your Epic level) for 10 seconds, and a 10% chance that you will gain a Racial Bonus to Temporary SP equal to (10 + Double your Epic level) for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Fearsome Invulnerability
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your draconic lineage allows you to occasionally enter a state of frightening imperviousness. For 30 seconds you have DR 100/Epic, Resistance 200 to Fire/Cold/Electricity/Acid, +30 PRR, MRR and MRR Cap, and your hitpoints regenerate at a very swift rate. Cooldown: 4 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Ability VI
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Celestial Destiny
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain 50 spell points. Each additional level of Exalted Angel grants 50 spell points and +1 to your Cleric, Favored Soul and Paladin caster levels if you have any levels in the class.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Mass Cure Moderate Wounds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Casts Cure Moderate Wounds on multiple targets. Positive energy is channeled to heal moderate wounds of allies or damage undead for 2d6+4 hit points plus an addition 1 for every caster level up to caster level 30. Undead who make a successful Will save reduce the damage by half.
Spell-Like Ability: This ability benefits from your Metamagic Feats without paying the normal additional spell point cost. Cooldown: 9 seconds Cost: 35 Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Angelic Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: While you are above 50% Health, you have a +2 Sacred bonus to Charisma, and all nearby enemies have a -2 penalty to attack rolls. This penalty counts as a Fear effect and stacks with the Aura of Menace from the Angel of Vengeance enhancement. Cooldown: 10 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Astral Vibrance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: While you are above 50% health, nearby enemies below 50% health take 1d4 Light damage every 2 seconds, increasing by 1d4 every 2 seconds they remain in your aura (up to 20d4 per 2 seconds) and nearby allies below 50% health receive 1d4 Positive Energy healing every 2 seconds increasing by 1d4 Positive Energy healing every 2 seconds, increasing by by 1d4 every 2 secons they remain in your aura (up to 20d4 per 2 seconds). Having this ability active costs 1 sp every 2 seconds, increasing by 1 every 2 seconds. Cooldown: 1 minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Transcendental Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 to the DC of all of your spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Ascendance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Major Form Toggle: Assume angelic form, changing your type to Outsider Good (Angel). As an Angel, your unarmed attacks deal Light damage, and when you smite an enemy, you migt gain temporary hit points.
When you cast Light damage spells, you might gain temporary spell points.
When you cast Positive Energy healing spells on allies, you might grant the target temporary hit points.
Your Vorpal hits deal large amounts of extra Light damage. Against undead your critical hits deal large amounts of extra Light damage.
While in Angelic form, Angelic Presence and Astral Vibrance work whether or not you are above 50% health.
Astral Vibrance has no spell point drain while you are in Angelic form. You can only be in one Major Form at a time. Duration: 2 minutes Cooldown: 5 minutes Cost: 50 Spell Points

Stance.Name: Angelic Form
Stance.Description:
Assume angelic form, changing your type to Outsider Good (Angel). As an Angel, your unarmed attacks deal Light damage, and when you smite an enemy, you migt gain temporary hit points.
When you cast Light damage spells, you might gain temporary spell points.
When you cast Positive Energy healing spells on allies, you might grant the target temporary hit points.
Your Vorpal hits deal large amounts of extra Light damage. Against undead your critical hits deal large amounts of extra Light damage.
While in Angelic form, Angelic Presence and Astral Vibrance work whether or not you are above 50% health.
Astral Vibrance has no spell point drain while you are in Angelic form. You can only be in one Major Form at a time. Duration: 2 minutes Cooldown: 5 minutes Cost: 50 Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Avenging Light
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: A searing orb of radiant light shoots forth to smite your target, dealing 1d6+2 hit points of Light damage per Character Level. A successful Fortitude save (DC 10 + character level + Cha/Wis modifier + Evocation bonuses) reduces the damage by half. Cooldown: 3 seconds Cost: 3 spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Radiant Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[10/20/30] Light Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Endless faith
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Spell Point pool increased by [4/7/10]%. Echoes of Power now restore up to [18/24/30] spell points. (If you previously did noy have the Echoes of Power ability, it is granted to you.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Healing power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[10/20/30] Positive Energy Spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Judgment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Target Undead or Evil Outsider will explode when killed, dealing 10d100 Light damage to other undead or evil outsiders near them. This ability cannot affect players. Cooldown: 15 seconds Cost: 10 spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Embrace the Light
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You take [10/20/30]% less Light damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Soundburst
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Blasts an area with tremendous cacophany, doing 1d4+4 Sonic damage and stunnin enemies for 6 seconds. A successful Fortitude or Spell Resistance save negates the stun. (DC 10 + character level + Cha/Wis Modifier) Spell-Like Ability: This ability benefits from your Metamagic Feats (such as Quicken) without paying the normal additional spell point cost. Cooldown: 15/11/7 seconds Costs: 12/9/6 Spell Points

DC.Name: Exalted Angel: Soundburst
DC.Description: Blasts an area with tremendous cacophany, doing 1d4+4 Sonic damage and stunnin enemies for 6 seconds. A successful Fortitude or Spell Resistance save negates the stun.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Lay to rest
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Touch Activate: Target Undead or Evil Outsider that is under the effects of Judgement takes 10d100 Light damage. Cooldown: 15 seconds Cost: 10 spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Shadows Upon You
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target foe becomes cursed with Shadows Upon You, reducing all saving throws by -2 for 20 seconds. Whenever this foe is damaged by spells or attacks, saving throws are reduced by an additional -1 for five seconds. Stacks up to 10 times. Cooldown: 20 seconds Cost: 20 spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Piercing Spellcraft
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to spell penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Purity of Essence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Healing Amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Ability III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Judge the Many
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Undead or Evil Outsiders judged by you gain "Guilt by Association". When an Undead or Evil Outsider with Guilt by Association dies, any Undead or Evil Outsiders caught in the Judegment blast have a 50% chance to be affected by Judgement.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Rebuke Foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Only usable when Endless Ardor stack is 5 or higher. Target enemy tales 5% additional damage from physical and Light damage for 30 seconds. Your Endless Ardor is reset to zero. Cooldown: 3 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Blood and Radiance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Each time you cast a Light based spell, you gain Endless Ardor: +[1/2/3] Sacred bonus to Positive Energy spellpower for 10 seconds.
Each time you cast a Positive Energy based spell, you gain Righteous Fervor: +[1/2/3] Sacred bonus to light spellpower for 10 seconds.
Each of these effects can stack up to 10 times, and new stacks add 10 seconds to the remaining duration.

Stance.Name: Blood and Radiance
Stance.Description: Each time you cast a light based spell, you gain Endless Ardor: +[1/2/3] sacred bonus to positive energy for 10 seconds. Each time you cast a positive energy spell, gain Righteous Fervor: +[1/2/3] sacred bonus to light spellpower for 10 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Excoriate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When your Righteous Fervor stack is 5 or higher, your Light spells and Smites have a 3% chance to stun opponents for 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Ability IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Be at Peace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target enemy is dazed for one minute, no save. Damage breaks this effect. Endless Ardor and Righteous Fervor stacks are reset to zero. Cooldown: 2 minutes Cost: 10 spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Leap of Faith
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: You are able to leap through air to bring the fight to your enemies or traverse casms that make normal adventurers balk. Using this ability costs 10 spell points. Uses of this ability recharge at a rate of one every 15 seconds in private areas, and 3 seconds in public areas. If you already possess this ability, it now recharges at a rate of one every 12 seconds in private areas instead. Cooldown: 3 seconds Cost: 10 spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Ability V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Sun Bolt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Casts A powerful bolt of light deals 1d4+4 Light damage per caster level (up to a maximum of caster level 15) to targets in its path. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half, vs. DC 10 + character level + Cha/Wis modifier. This spell is a bolt and has double range. Spell-Like Ability: This ability benefits from your Metamagic Feats (such as Quicken) without paying the normal additional spell point cost. Cooldown: 12 seconds Cost: 12 spell points

DC.Name: Exalted Angel: Sun Bolt
DC.Description: Casts Sun Bolt as a Spell-Like Ability (benefits from metamagic feats at no additional cost). Reflex save for half damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Divine Wrath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: You call down divine wrath on your foes, dealing 2d6 light damage per character level, Will DC 10 + character level + Cha/Wis modifier reduces damage by half. Allies caught within blast are healed for 1d6 HP Positive Energy per character level. Cooldown: 20 seconds Cost: 40 spell points

DC.Name: Exalted Angel: Divine Wrath
DC.Description: Call down divine wrath on foes, dealing 2d6 light damage per character level, will save for half.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Reborn in Light
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
True Resurrection: You are healed to full heath, and activate Ascendance, Angelic Presence, and Astral Vibrance (even if they are currently on cooldown). For two minutes (or until you leave Angelic form), you are immune to Light damage, have 50% incorpreality, and gain +100 Light and Healing Power.
This ability can be used while dead, raising you at full health and in addition to the above benefits, the cooldowns of Light and Positive Energy spells are reduced to one fifth of normal, all spells cost 50% spell points, and all of your physical attacks gain On Hit: 100 Light damage and On Critical: Destroy evil Undead or Evil Outsiders under 1000 hit points.
This ability can be used once per rest. Cooldown: 10 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Ability VI
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger's Repertoire
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Passive: For every level of Fatesinger, you gain +2 Bard Songs, +25 Spell Points, +10 Universal Spell Power, 2 additional levels of your Bardic Inspiration, and +10 Melee Power, and +4 Ranged Power.
If you do not have Bardic Aria, you gain the feat Inspire Courage as an independent Song. Abilities that enhance your bard songs will also enhance that feat as if you were a bard. Abilities that trigger off of a Bardic Inspiration use will trigger when you use Inspire Courage.
For every subsequent level of Fatesinger, you gain 1 effective arcane caster level, for a total of 5.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Glitter of Fame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Gain +1 to all Attributes, +1 to all Saves

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Harmonic Resonance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Your attacks have a 10% chance per hit of building a stacking Harmonic Resonance in your enemies. Harmonic Resonance: Each stack increases the creature's vulnerability to Sonic damage by 10% and reduces their AC by 2. The effect may stack up to 5 times and lasts up to 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Intoxicating Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Enemies that strike you have a 5% chance of becoming Fascinated for 12 seconds, with no saving throw.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Grandeur
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Passive: Your friendly spellcasts leave a lingering buff that grants +3 AC and +3 PRR per stack up to 2 (for a total of +6 AC and +6 PRR), and your offensive spellcasts now have a chance to cause Harmonic Resonance in your foes.
Harmoinc Resonance: Each stack increases the creature's vulnerability to Sonic damage by 10% and reduces their AC by 2. The effect may stack up to 5 times and lasts up to 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Majesty
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You no longer suffer from Arcane Spell Failure, are immune to Charisma Damage, and have +25 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: First Harmonic Chord
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your Inspire Courage has an additional +[1/2/3] to hit, damage, saves versus Fear, and +[3/6/9] Universal Spell Power.
Passively, you benefit from an additional +[1/2/3] to hit, damage, saves versus Fear, and +[3/6/9] Universal Spell Power.
'Look to the prepared for Fortune's blessing.' --Lin Dazzar, Envoy of the Twelve

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Siren's Song
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Mesmerize a single target. The target also takes 2 Constitution damage every [3/2/1] seconds. Duration: 12 seconds
'Look into my eyes. Trust in me, my pet, and let all the world melt away...' --Selis

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Music of the Spider Queen
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds to your Fascinate: Your Fascinate gains the power to mesmerize Vermin. Mesmerized Vermin stop acting and behave like they have been fascinated. However, unlike truly fascinated creatures, they are not susceptible to suggestion.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Dirge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Bard Song: Produce a haunting funeral march that affects nearby enemies. Affected enemies suffer from Dirge.
Dirge: For every two caster levels you have, this creature takes 10d[4/6/8] Negative damage and 10d[8/10/12] Sonic damage every 3 seconds (Fortitude save for half damage). In addition, enemies affected by Dirge may be slowed by 5% if they fail the Fortitude save.
Duration: 18 seconds 'The Enemy falls to our wrath, and everywhere, their light is fading. But though our cause is just, it must also be remembered that our enemy fought for his own cause and believed in it as strongly as we did in ours. And so I have come to this quiet spot to light a candle in honor of his memory. Has Fate favored him this day, I should like to think that he would have done the same for me.' --Elemar's Payer

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Second Harmonic Chord
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your Inspire Courage now grants an additional +[1/2/3] to all Skills. Passively, you benefit from an additional +[1/2/3] to all Skills.
'Unleash the winds! Fly, my friends! Fly on to your deadly marks!' --Gwynn Glowsing, Huntmaster of House Phiarlan

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Bound Fate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Bardic Curse: Your target must make a Will save or be bound in place briefly. In addition, your target will become [6/10/12]% more vulnerable to magical damage, and also suffers -[5/10/15] Spell Resistance and -[4/6/8] damage. Duration: 45 seconds 'The chains of Fate have you, demon, and you are too dumb to know you are already dead.' --Larisong

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Reign
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Spontaneous Song: You gain +[20/40/60] temporary hitpoints. For the duration of the buff, on a vorpal strike, you unleash a debilitating thunderclap for [7/9/11]d20 Sonic and [7/9/11]d20 Electrical damage.
Vanquish your foes in battle with a song of glory.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fastesinger: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Third Harmonic Chord
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Inspire Greatness now grants an additional +[1/2/3] Physical Resistance Rating. Passively, you benefit from an additional +[1/2/3] Physical Resistance Rating. 'Seductive, enchanting, tantalizing... these are the qualities that might describe my lessers...' --Lolth, Demon Queen

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Grim Fate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Adds to your Bound Fate: Your Bound Fate now inflicts affected creatures with an additional [6/10/12]% vulnerability to physical attacks. Grim Fate may take effect, even if Bound Fate does not. Duration: 60 seconds
'Fate, one day, claims us all. Today, she visits you.' --Larafeal Loommistriss, upon confronting Ihlazur

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Arcane Hymn
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You sing a magical Hymn that resonates within the Arcane Sphere. When you activate this ability, your target is surrounded by magical energies, bestowing Arcane Resonance.
Each member of your party, including yourself, may only benefit from one Hymn at a time, regardless of source. Attempting to activate this ability on someone else willdispel the Hymn from your former target. If you attempt to activate a different Hymn on someone who is already benefitting from this Hymn, it will dispel this Hymn as it applies the new one. You may activate this ability on yourself.
Arcane Resonance: +1 to Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma, +20 Universal Spell Power, +2 Spell Penetration, +4 Use Magic Device, +10% to your Fire, Cold, Acid and Electric Absorption.

Stance.Name: Arcane Hymn
Stance.Description: Arcane Resonance: +1 to Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma, +20 Universal Spell Power, +2 Spell Penetration, +4 Use Magic Device, +10% to your Fire, Cold, Acid and Electric Absorption.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Aria
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Passive: You sing your Bardic Inspiration as if you had [1/2/3] additional Bard levels. Spontaneous Song: Generate [15/25/35]% less threat when you cast spells for the duration of this song. In addition, you gain +[20/40/40] Sonic Spell Power, and +[5/10/15] Force, Positive, and Negative/Poison Spell Power.
Your voice carries like a gale over the skein of Fate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Ability III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Fourth Harmonic Chord
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your Inspire Heroics now grants an additional +[1/2/3] Armor Class, +[1/2/3]% Dodge, and +[1/2/3] to all Saving throws.
Passively, you benefit from an additional +[1/2/3] Armor Class, +[1/2/3]% Dodge, and +[1/2/3] to all Saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Divine Hymn
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You sing a magical Hymn that resonates within the Divine Sphere. When you activate this ability, your target is surrounded by magical energies, bestowing Divine Resonance.
Each member of your party, including yourself, may only benefit from one Hymn at a time, regardless of source. Attempting to activate this ability on someone else will dispel the Hymn from your former target. If you attempt to activate a different Hymn on someone who is already benefitting from this Hymn, it will dispel this Hymn as it applies the new one. You may activate this ability on yourself.
Divine Resonance: +1 to Strength, Charisma and Wisdom, +1 maximum Smite Evil charges, +2 to hit damage, and to confirm critical hits, +10 Physical Resistance Rating, and +25 Positive and Negative Spell Power.

Stance.Name: Divine Hymn
Stance.Description: Divine Resonance: +1 to Strengh, Charisma and Wisdom, +1 maximum Smite Evil charges, +2 to hit damage, and to confirm critical hits, +10 Physical Resistance Rating, and +25 Positive and Negative/Poison Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Martial Hymn
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You sing a magical Hymn that resonates within the Martial Sphere. When you activate this ability, your target is surrounded by magical energies, bestowing Martial Resonance.
Each member of your party, including yourself, may only benefit from one Hymn at a time, regardless of source. Attempting to activate this ability on someone else will dispel the Hymn from your former target. If you attempt to activate a different Hymn on someone who is already benefitting from this Hymn, it will dispel this Hymn as it applies the new one. You may activate this ability on yourself.
Martial Resonance: +1 to Strength, Dexterity and Wisdom, +2 Sneak Dice, +20 Maximum Hit Points, +10 Physical and Magical Resistance rating, +5 Armor Class, and +10 Melee and Ranged Power

Stance.Name: Martial Hymn
Stance.Description: Martial Resonance: +1 to Strengh, Dexterity and Wisdom, +2 Sneak Dice, +20 Maximum Hit Points, +10 Physical and Magical Resistance rating, +5 Armor Class, and +10 Melee and Ranged Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Primal Hymn
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You sing a magical Hymn that resonates within the Primal Sphere. When you activate this ability, your target is surrounded by magical energies, bestowing Primal Resonance.
Each member of your party, including yourself, may only benefit from one Hymn at a time, regardless of source. Attempting to activate this ability on someone else will dispel the Hymn from your former target. If you attempt to activate a different Hymn on someone who is already benefitting from this Hymn, it will dispel this Hymn as it applies the new one. You may activate this ability on yourself.
Primal Resonance: +1 to Dexterity, Constitution and Wisdom, +25 Maximum Hit Points, +10 Spell resistance, +10 Healing Amplification, +10% Attack Speed with Throwing Weapons and Bows, and an additional +3 Strength while Raging.

Stance.Name: Martial Hymn
Stance.Description: Primal Resonance: +1 to Dexterity, Constitution and Wisdom, +25 Maximum Hit Points, +10 Spell Resistance, +10 Healing Amplification, +10% Attack Speed with Throwing Weapons and Bows, and an additional +3 Strength while Raging.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: The Fith Chord
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Adds Inspire Transcendence to your Bardic Ballad.
Inspire Transcendence: +1 to all Spell DCs, +1 to the DC of all Tactical Feats, +3 Spell Resistance and True Seeing.
Passively, you benefit from an additional +1 to all Spell DCs, +1 to the DC of all Tactical Feats, +3 Spell Resistance and you are immune to Blindness and benefit from the True Seeing spell.
A verse from the Song of Heroes, whose powerful notes fill your limbs with vigor in battle.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Metamagic Attunement I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a metamagic

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like Enlarge Spell, your spells have twice the range. This does not increase their Spell Point cost.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Eschew
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like Eschew Materials, your spells no longer need common material components. This does not increase their Spell Point cost.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Extend
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like Extend Spell, your spells last twice as long. This does not increase their Spell Point cost.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Masquerade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Passive: You have a 10% reduction on the costs of your spells. You also have the power to switch your Twist of Fate at a Rest Shrine.
Close your eyes. Roll a dream into a ball. Count to three and throw it over your shoulder. open your eyes, and let Destiny be undone! --excerpt from 'Secret Recipes'

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Bladesong
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Melee and Missile attacks deal an additional 2d6 Sonic damage on hit, scaling with Sonic Spell Power. +3% Competence Bonus to Melee Attack Speed. You have +1 Critical Multiplier on rolls of 19-20. A verse from the Song of Heroes, whose harmonious notes sweep away the strain of concentration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Ability V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Greater Shout
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You may cast the spell Greater Shout as a Spell-like ability. Emits an ear splitting yell that deals 1d3+3 Sonic damage per caster level and stuns targets in its path. A successful Fortitude save halves the damage and negates the stun. Cooldown: 6 seconds Cost: 6 spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Metamagic Attunement II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a metamagic

EnhancementSelection.Name: Embolden
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like Embolden Spell, your spells add an additional 2 to their DCs. This does not increase their Spell Point cost.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Intensify
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like Intensify Spell, your spells have an additional 75 to their Spell Power. This does not increase their Spell Point cost.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like Quicken Spell, your spells cast much faster and can't be interrupted. This does not increase their Spell Point cost.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Turn of the Tide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Spontaneous Song: Activate this ability to gain: Full Base Attack Bonus +40% weapon damage DR 15/- +4 Charisma +3 to hit Your attacks from weapons deal an additional 5d10+75 Sonic damage and 5d10+75 Light damage per hit While under the effects of Turn of the Tide, you do not automatically fail Will save by rolling a natural 1. Cooldown: 3 minutes
'Shining like the sun, the Singer fell upon the horde. Fiery, his sword gleamed, cutting through their ranks. And when light had faded, and with the carnage all around, he quietly cleaned his blade, sat upon a lonely rock and wrote a poem of I know not what.' --Recollections, Lormac Stoutarm

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Ability VI

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Adrenaline I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain Druid and Ranger caster levels equal to your Fury of the Wild level if you have any levels in those classes.
Gain 2 Adrenaline uses per rest. Consume 1 Adrenaline: Your next attack has +300% damage, and has +2 critical threat range and confirmation of critical hits. You are considered Raged until your next attack.
You gain +1 Melee Damage, +6 Melee power and +1 Ranged Power per level of Fury of the Wild, including this one.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Brawn I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +50 maximum HP

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Brawn II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +50 maximum HP

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Adrenaline III

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Adrenaline Overload
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +1 Adrenaline use per rest. Consume 1 Adrenaline: Your next attack has +400% damage, and has +16 critical threat range and confirmation of critical hits. You are considered Raged until your next attack. +1 Damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Tunnel Vision
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While raged, your melee attacks deal +1d[8/10/12] extra damage, you gain +[1/2/3] Intimidate, +[1/2/3] Will Saves and you lose -5 AC, -10% Fortification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Primal Scream
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Nearby allies are raged gaining +[3/4/5] morale bonus to Strength and Constitution for 3 minutes. Nearby enemies take [10/20/30]d20 sonic damage. [3/4/5] uses per rest.

Stance.Name: Primal Scream
Stance.Description: You and nearby allies are raged gaining +[3/4/5] morale bonus to Strength and Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Boulders
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Multiselector: Choose between throwing a Boulder and channeling that might into a Melee attack.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Boulder Toss
EnhancementSelection.Description: Throw a boulder at an enemy, dealing [6/12/20]d100 bludgeoning damage and knocking down an enemy on a failed Reflex save, DC 10 + Strength Modifier. (This does not benefit from spellpower.)

DC.Name: Fury of the Wild: Boulder Toss
DC.Description: Throw a boulder at an enemy, dealing [6/12/20]d100 bludgeoning damage and knocking down enemy on failed reflex save DC 10 + Strength Modifier.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Boulder's Might
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: +5[W]. Requires you to be fighting in Two Handed Fighting style to use. Cooldown: 6 Seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Fast Healing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You heal [2/4/6]d20 HP each minute using positive energy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Injury
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are below 100% health, enemies you damage in melee are shaken. Rank 2: When below 70% health, enemies you damage in melee bleed for 1d10 damage every 2 seconds for 12 seconds. Rank 3: When below 30% health, your melee strikes have a 10% chance to paralyze enemies for 5 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Unstoppable Fury
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While raged, when you miss with a melee you gain +[1/2/3] attack for 20 seconds. Can stack 3 times for up to +[3/6/9] attack. Loses 1 stack every 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Acute Instincts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While raged, you gain +[0/1/2] Wisdom, +[2/4/6] Balance, Heal, Listen, Spot, Search, Concentration and +[1/2/3] insight bonus to saves vs traps.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Damage Reduction

Gain [2/4/6] Physical Resistance Rating. Rank 3: Barbarians additional add 1% to their Damage Reduction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Fury Made Placid
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spend 1 Adrenaline: Stop being raged. You heal 2d100 HP every two seconds over the next ten seconds. For 3 minutes, you gain +6 Wisdom and cannot benefit from rage or Adrenaline, and sentient enemies attacking you physically or magically have a 20% chance to become paralyzed and helpless with regret for 3 seconds on a failed DC 50 Will Save. Cannot train if you have Fury Eternal.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Two Handed Fighting, your Vorpal Threat Range is increased to 19-20.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Unbridled Fury
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Every three seconds, for thirty seconds, you gain Adrenaline Overload: Your next attack deals +400% damage and has +16 critical threat range and confirmation of critical hits.
While this is active and you fight with a Two Handed weapon, Strikethrough Blows produced on enemies around you when you stand still and attack deal +100% damage and have 100% chance of triggering weapon effects. +100% Strikethrough You gain the feats Two-Handed Fighting, Improved Two-Handed Fighting, and Greater Two-Handed Fighting for the duration. Cooldown: 5 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Inner Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your soul is like a great garden, and its beauty and perfection depend on how you tend it during all seasons.
You may activate this ability to focus your thoughts and instantly restore 25-125 Ki. Cooldown: 3 minutes
Passive Bonus: You also gain to +10 to your maximum Ki and +1 stacking Spell Resistance that stacks will all other sources of Spell Resistance. These bonuses increase by an additional +10 Ki and +1 Spell resistance for each level of Grandmaster of Flowers that you have. You now fight with the unarmed combat style of a Monk while Centered. You gain proficiency with Handwraps.
+10 Melee Power and +3 Ranged Power per level in Grandmaster of Flowers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Centered Mind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The state you seek removes all grief, all craving, and all fear to bring mind, body, and soul into harmonious balance. this enhancement grants you Slippery Mind as a bonus feat, allowing you extra saving throw when you fail a save versus enchantments. You also gain +1 Tactics DC (including Stunning).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Wholeness of Spirit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
As warm winds chase away snow and ice, so does new life begin from old.
You may activate this ability to bring your mind, body, and soul into harmonious balance, restoring health as if you were affected by the benefits of a Heal spell, as well as curing all ability damage, negative levels, and other adverse conditions that may be affecting you. Cooldown: 2 minutes Cost: 30 Ki

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: The Abiding Path
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You are no longer troubled by the world's demands.
You are unhindered by slippery surfaces such as ice, grease, or flowing water. You also gain +1 to Tactics DCs (including Stunning).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Ubiquity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your ability to traverse a battlefield is unparalleled. While Centered, you can use the Tumble skill to pass through enemies, enabling you to evade or attack them by surprise from any side.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Balance in All Things
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
If you can succeed in purging yourself of the last traces of imperfection, you will know enlightenment.
You are immune to most forms of knockdown, gain +1 to your Passive Ki generation, and also gain +1 to Tactics DCs (including Stunning).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Lily Petal
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Project a bolt of pure Ki energy to damage a single enemy at range and restore 5 Ki to yourself. Damage: 80 to 120 plus 8 to 12 per Character Level. This damage scales with the higher of Melee and Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Perfect Balance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to Balance, Jump and Tumble and [1/2/3]% Dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Enlightenment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[15/30/45] Ki and +[2/4/6] Concentration. Gain +[0/0/1] passive Ki regeneration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: A Dance of Flowers
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[0.25/0.5/1][W] to weapon attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain Electricity resistance [4/8/12], and a +[10/20/30]% Enhancement bonus to Movement speed. You also gain +[2/4/6]% chance to Doublestrike on your Melee attacks.

Damage: 80 to 120 plus 8 to 12 per Character Level (Reflex Saving Throw DC 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Stunning Bonuses for half damage). The damage scales with the higher of Melee or Ranged Power. Cooldown: 12 seconds Cost: 20 Ki.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Drifting Lotus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: By performing the legendary Drifting Lotus technique, you coalesce a radiant orb of Ki energy in your fist, and then smash down upon your enemies with the force of falling heavens. Enemies in the vicinity of your attack may make a Reflex saving throw (DC 10 + character level + Wisdom modifier + stun bonuses) for half damage. Any enemies who fail their Reflex save are knocked down by the force of your blow. Damage: 100-160 +10-14 per character level. This damage scales with the highest of Melee and Ranged Power. Cooldown: 15 seconds Cost: 25 Ki.

DC.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Drfiting Lotus
DC.Description: Damage: 100-160 +10-14 per character level. This damage scales with the highest of Melee and ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Dancing with Flame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain Fire Resistance [4/8/12], and a +[1/2/3] bonus to your attack and damage rolls. You also gain +[0.3/0.6/1][W] damage added to your weapon attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Devastating Critical
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +1 Critical Damage Mulitplier on rolls of 19-20.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Perfection of Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[2/4/6] to your Reflex saving throws. You gain a +[1/2/3] bonus to your Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle and Intimidate skills. Rank 3: You will no longer fail a Reflex saving throw on a natural one, if your total saving throw result is equal or higher than the DC effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Ability V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: A Scattering of Petals
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You focus your Ki into a handful of flower petals, and release them into the air, blinding nearby enemies and deflecting enemy blows. On Activation: Nearby enemies have their Fortification reduced by 200% and lose sneak attack immunity for 12 seconds. In addition, each nearby enemy must make a Fortitude saving throw (DC 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Stunning bonuses) or become blinded for 9 seconds. For the next 12 seconds, you gain +100 PRR and +10 Natural Armor. Cooldown: 90 seconds Cost: 30 Ki.

DC.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: A Scattering of Petals
DC.Description: Nearby enemies must make a Fortitude save or become blinded.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Everything is Nothing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: On Activation: Your state of luminous consciousness allows your will to alter the fabric of the planes, ripping your foes out of time and space. Up to six nearby enemies must make a saving throw (DC 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Stunning bonuses) or be erased from the multiverse. If they succeed at their saving throw, they are instead paralyzed by temporal shock for 6 seconds, after which point they take 1000 points of damage (Fortitude save as above for half damage). This damage scales with the highest of Melee or Ranged power. Bosses are immune to the death and paralysis effects, and instead immediately take damage. Player characters are entirely immune to Everything is Nothing.

DC.Name: Everything is Nothing (Erasure)
DC.Description: On Activation: Your state of luminous conciousness allows your will to alter the fabric of the planes, ripping your foes out of time and space. Up to six nearby enemies must make a saving throw or be erased from the multiverse.

DC.Name: Everything is Nothing (Damage)
DC.Description: Everything is Nothing. If they succeed at their saving throw, they are instead paralyzed by temporal shock for 6 seconds, after which point they take 1000 points of damage. This damage scales with the highest of Melee or Ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Ability VI
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Shrug Off Punishment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For each level of Legendary Dreadnought, including this one, you gain +10 Max Hitpoints, +3 Melee Power and +2 Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Action Hero
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Reduces the cooldowns of your Action Boost abilities by 33%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Unstoppable
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to remove all Crowd Control effects currently restraining you. This ability can be used while helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Unmovable
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +20 Action Boost bonus to to Fortitude and Balance saves for 60 seconds. This ability can be used while helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Thick Skinned
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to take 25% less damage from all sources for 30 seconds. This ability can be used while helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Combat Brute
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While under the effects of any Action Boost, you gain both +1[W] damage with melee weapons and deal +20% damage to helpless opponents.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Sundering Swings
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: For the next [9/12/15] seconds, all attacks you make apply an Improved Sunder effect on hit. Cooldown: 1 min

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Legendary Tactics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to DC's of all tactical feats.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Extra Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Action Boost per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Action Boost Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[15/20/25] Action Boost bonus to attack bonus for 20 seconds. (This enhancement cannot be taken if you have Action Boost Attack as a class enhancement, and it shares a cooldown with all other action boosts).

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Action Boost Attack

EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Tactical Melee Weapon Attack: Perform an attack with +5[W] damage and +[1/2/3] Critical Threat Range. Cleave attacks have a [15/30/50]% chance to reset the cooldown of this ability (this cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds).
(Requires an equipped melee weapon.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Improved Combat Expertise
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When the Combat Expertise stance is active, you gain +20 Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Improved Power Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When the Power Attack stance is active, you deal +0.5[W] damage with weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Action Boost Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged Power for 20 seconds. (This enhancement cannot be taken if you have Action Boost: Melee Power as a class enhancement).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Lay Waste
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tactical Melee Cleave: Perform an Area of Effect attack with +5[W] damage with +1 Critical Threat Multiplier. On Hit: Knocks the target down, Balance DC (10 + Character Level + Strength Modifier + Trip DC Bonuses) Negates. Momentum Swing has a 25% chance to reset the cooldown of this ability (this cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds).

DC.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Lay Waste
DC.Description: Perform an Area of Effect attack with +5[W] damage with +1 Critical Threat Multiplier. On Hit Knocks the target down, Balance DC Negates.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Critical Damage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] damage on critical hits (before weapon multipliers).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Action Boost Haste
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to receive a +[20/25/30]% Action Boost attack speed bonus for 20 seconds. (This ability cannot be taken if you have Action Boost Haste as a class enhancement).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Unusual Tactics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are a studied master of a wide variety of methods for gaining the upper hand. +2 to the DCs of your Tactical Feats, DC of Rune Arm Shots, DC of Breath Weapons, DC of Assassinate, DC of Poisons, and +2 to the Perform, Bluff, Diplomacy, and Intimidate skills.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Volcano's Edge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: On Hit: 100 Fire damage. On Critical: Target takes incineration damage. On Vorpal: 10d100 Fire damage. Requires a Kama, knife, sickle or Sword to be equipped in your main hand. Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Lightning Mace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: On Hit: 100 Electrical damage. On Critical: Gain +15% enhancement bonus to melee doublestrike for 6 seconds. On Vorpal: 10d100 Electrical damage. Requires a club, greatclub, mace, morningstar, or Quarterstaff to be equipped in your main hand. Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Anvil of Thunder
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: On Hit: 100 Sonic damage. On Critical: Target is stunned for 6 seconds. On Vorpal: 10d100 Sonic damage. Requires an axe, hammer, maul, or pick to be equipped in your main hand. Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Master's Blitz
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: For 15 seconds, you gain +7 Melee Power, +7 Ranged Power and select either +50% Dodge (dodge cap applies!) or +30 PRR. Any time you hit an opponent while under the effects of Master's Blitz, you have a chance to gain an additional stack of the melee/ranged damage bonus and restart the duration. When you first activate this ability, you start with three stacks of increased damage. The damage bonus stacks up to 10 times, and decrements by 1 every 15 seconds.

Stance.Name: Masters Blitz
Stance.Description: Activate: For 15 seconds, you gain +7 Melee Power, +7 Ranged Power and select either +50% Dodge (dodge cap applies!) or +30 PRR. Any time you hit an opponent while under the effects of Master's Blitz, you have a chance to gain an additional stack of the melee/ranged damage bonus and restart the duration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Headman's Chop

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Arcane study I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain 50 spell points and +1 to your Warlock, Wizard, Sorcerer, Bard, Alchemist and Artificer caster levels if have any levels in the class. +1 to All Spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Arcane study II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 50 Spell Points and +1 to your Warlock, Wizard, Sorcerer, Bard, Alchemist and Artificer caster levels if have any levels in the class. +1 to All Spell DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Arcane Spellsurge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your understanding of magic is so keen that you can periodically enter a state of heightened arcane channeling. Activate Arcane Spellsurge to add +5 to all of your spell DCs for the next 20 seconds. Cooldown: 1 minute Passive: You gain 50 Spell Points and +1 to your Warlock, Wizard, Sorcerer, Bard, Alchemist and Artificer caster levels if have any levels in the class. +1 to All Spell DCs

Stance.Name: Arcane Spellsurge
Stance.Description: +5 to all spell DCs for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Sigil of Warding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Inscribes a runic sigil on the ground where you designate. It remains there for 60 seconds and adds [1/2/3] AC and [5/10/15] PRR to you and any allies standing within its radius. No more than a single Sigil per caster can exist at one time - if you cast another, your previous one is immediately erased. Cooldown: 30 seconds Cost: 20 spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Imperceptible Casting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your deep understanding of the arcane allows you to cast powerful spells using only the merest gestures and whispers. For the next 30 seconds, you gain +10 Universal Spell Power and the threat you generate from spells is reduced by 95%. Cooldown: 1 minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Unearthly Reactions
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: From years of honing your mind, your wits have become quick to react to danger. You gain +[1/2/3] Dodge, +[2/4/6] to Reflex saves. Rank 3: When you tumble, you will phase out from reality briefly, passing through enemies as you do so.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Impregnable Mind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your mind is protected by powerful psychic wards. You gain +[2/4/6] concentration and +[2/4/6] to Will saves. Rank 3: You will also no longer automatically fail Will saves on a 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Sigil of Lifeshielding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Inscribes a runic sigil on the ground where you designate. It remains there for 60 seconds and grants all the same protection of a Deathward spell (immunity to death spells, Energy Drain, and Negative energy damage) to you and any allies standing within it's radius. Any Undead enemies that enter the sigil's radius take [1/2/3]d6 Light damage every 2 seconds as long as they remain within. No more than a single Sigil per caster can exist at one time - if you cast another, your previous one is immediately erased. Cooldown: 30 seconds Cost: 20 spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Fade Into the Weave
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your mind and body are so closely interweaved with the essence of magic that you can meld into it when you are in danger. Upon activating this ability you gain +25 Universal Spell Power, trigger a Diplomacy effect, and for the next 20 seconds you are invisible. This invisibility does not break if you cast spells or attack enemies. Cooldown: 2 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Sigil of Energy Negation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Inscribes a runic sigil on the ground where you designate. It remains there for 60 seconds and grants [20/40/60] stacking resistance vs. Fire, Cold, Electricity and Acid damage to you and any allies standing within its radius. No more than a single Sigil per caster can exist at one time - if you cast another, your previous one is immediately erased. Cooldown: 30 seconds Cost: 20 spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Variable Resistance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you take fire, cold, electric, or acid damage, you gain 10 stacking resistance to that element for [1/2/3] minutes. If you are hit by the same energy type consecutively, the effect can stack up to 3 times for 30 stacking resistance. The whole stack is cleared if you take damage from a different energy type.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Piercing Spellcraft
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You understand magical wardings well enough to know just how to breach such defenses. You gain +[1/2/3] bonus to spell penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Spell School Augmentation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants unique buffs or debuffs to your spells of the school chosen with Spell School Specialist. Chosen school spells have [5/10/15]% chance to reduce target <save depending on school> by 5 or 10 for [10/20/30] seconds. Conjuration/Evocation: Reflex -10. Enchantment/Illusion: Will -10. Necromancy/Transmutation: Fortitude -5. Abjuration: [5/10/15]% chance to increase target's Armor Class by 5 for [2/?/?] minutes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell School Augmentation: Abjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: Abjuration spells now also increase the targets AC by 5 for [2/?/?] minutes

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell School Augmentation: Conjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: Conjuration spells now also reduce the targets reflex save by 10

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell School Augmentation: Enchantment
EnhancementSelection.Description: Enchantment spells now also reduce the targets will save by 10

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell School Augmentation: Evocation
EnhancementSelection.Description: Evocation spells now also reduce the targets reflex save by 10

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell School Augmentation: Illusion

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell School Augmentation: Necromancy
EnhancementSelection.Description: Necromancy spells now also reduce the targets fortitude save by 5

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell School Augmentation: Transmutation
EnhancementSelection.Description: Transmutation spells now also reduce the targets fortitude save by 5

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Sigil of Battering Spellcraft
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Inscribes a runic sigil on the ground where you designate. It remains there for 60 seconds and grants +[15/30/45] stacking spellpower to you and any to allies standing within its radius. No more than a single Sigil per caster can exist at one time - if you cast another, your previous one is immediately erased. Cooldown: 30 seconds Cost: 20 spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Nullmagic Guard
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you take damage, there is a [2/4/6]% chance that a burst of antimagic energy expands from your body. Nearby enemies are subject to a Dispel Magic effect, which may strip them of their magical protections, and will be rendered unable to cast spells and lose [2/3/4] Spell Resistance for [10/20/30] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Call Kindred Being
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Allows you to summon a powerful being that varies depending on the spell school chosen with Spell School Specialist. Abjuration summons an Animated Armor Conjuration summons a Golem Enchantment summons a Succubus Evocation summons a Living Meteor Swarm Illusion summons a Dream Reaver Necromancy summons a Lich Transmutation summons a Gargoyle. Note--the golem sometimes turns hostile and attacks the party. Cooldown: 60 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Spell School Familiarity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Reduces the cooldowns of your spells that belong to the school chosen with Spell School Specialist 5% per tier.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Nullmagic Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Offensive spells you cast have a [5/10/15]% chance to subject the target to a Dispel Magic effect (which may strip it of its magical protections), render it unable to cast spells, and cause it to lose [2/3/4] Spell Resistance for [10/20/30] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Grand Summoner
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your summoned creatires are stronger than those conjured by mages who do not comprehend the inticacies of the arcane. Your summons gain +4 to all ability scores, increased health, increased fortification (50%). They also gain an extra 40% boost to movement speed. These bonuses stack with Augment Summoning and similar effects that boost the power of your summons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Master of Spell School
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Increases the caster levels and maximum caster levels of your spells that belong to the school chosen with Spell School Specialist by 1 each per tier.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Master of Spell School: Abjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have achieved a virtually unparalleled mastery of Abjuration magic. Your caster level and maximum caster level on spells of this school are each increased by +[1/2/3]. You also gain a +[1/2/3] to DCs with spells from this School.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Master of Spell School: Conjuration

EnhancementSelection.Name: Master of Spell School: Illusion

EnhancementSelection.Name: Master of Spell School: Necromancy
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have achieved a virtually unparalleled mastery of Necromancy magic. Your caster level and maximum caster level on spells of this school are each increased by +[1/2/3]. You also gain a +[1/2/3] to DCs with spells from this School.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Arcane Tempest
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Creates a chaotic massively powerful storm of force energy that deals 1d6+6 Force damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds Cost: 30 spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Nullmagic Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your comprehension of the arcane allows you to unravel spells at the base level, before they do any harm. When activated, for 20 seconds, you and allies near you are immune to harmful spells. Cooldown: 4 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Arcane Adept
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your vast understanding of magic allow you to bend spells in ways that make you energy use far more efficient. All spells you cast receive an enhancement bonus of -10% to their spell point costs.

EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Strength of Spirit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +20 Universal Spell Power. +10 Melee Power and +4 Ranged Power per level in Primal Avatar, including this one.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Magic of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +50 SP per level of Primal Avatar. You gain caster levels equal to your Primal Avatar level for Druid and Ranger spells, if you have any levels in those classes. +1 Evocation and Transmutation DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Primal Travel
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You quickly jump backwards several times. For 20 seconds you gain +10 Primal bonus to tumble and 50% Primal bonus to dodge (ignoring your maximum dodge).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Mighty Among Spirits
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 HP and +15 MRR. +1 Evocation and Transmutation DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Eternal Return
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: While below 50% health, you gain 12 health and lose 4 SP every two seconds. (Stays toggled on until manually turned off.) Cooldown: 5 Seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Walk with the Spirits
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For 30 seconds, you become 25% incorporeal, invisible and ethereal to monsters, and gain +30 Hide and Move Silently. Cost: 100 SP Passive: +1 Evocation and Transmutation DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Ephemeral Evolution
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you take physical damage, you gain +1 Physical Resistance for 3 seconds. This stacks up to [5/10/15] times, up to once per second. Stacks fade away 1 at a time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Rejuvenation Cocoon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Protect target ally with a shield of [90/120/150] temporary HP for 9 seconds. Heals 5d6 HP every 2 seconds while the shield persists. Costs 12sp to activate. 12 second cooldown. (Metamagic abilities don't increase the cost of Rejuvenation Cocoon.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Insidious Spores
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target enemy becomes contaminated with spores for 18 seconds. Every 2 seconds the target takes [6d6] Poison and Rust damage. Stacks up to [2/3/4] times. Enemies damaged by Insidious Spores become Contagious for five minutes after, spreading Insidious Spores to some nearby enemies when they die. Costs 30sp to activate. 5 second cooldown. (Many monsters are immune to Rust damage, exept for Constructs.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Friends of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You call forth a small animal from nature, providing a bonus to nearby allies. Duration: 3 minutes. Cooldown: 3 minutes. Bat: +10 Sonic Spell Power, +5 Sonic Resistance, +3 Listen Bird: +1 Dodge, +3 Spot Fox: +1 sneak attack damage, +3 Move Silently Frog: +2 PRR, +3 Jump Squirrel: +2 attack while flanking, +3 Hide

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Seeking Balance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] Reflex Saving Throws, +[2/4/6] Tumble and +[2/4/6] Balance while shapeshifted into an animal form, wielding two weapons, or unarmed. These are Primal bonuses. Skill bonuses required already having at least one rank in the skill.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Supple as Spring
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and nearby party members gain +[1/2/3]% Primal Bonus to Dodge if they have been damaged in combat in the past six seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Favored Enemy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Some things should not be. Gain +2 damage against Aberrations, Constructs or Undead. This also increases your damage against anoy of your other Favored Enemies by +2.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Aberration
EnhancementSelection.Description: You do 2 extra points of damage against Aberrations

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Construct
EnhancementSelection.Description: You do 2 extra points of damage against Constructs

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Undead
EnhancementSelection.Description: You do 2 extra points of damage against Undead

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Natural Shielding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your summoned and charmed pets, hirelings, and monsters gain +[30/60/100] maximum HP and +[10/20/30] PRR. Rank 3: Natural Creatures also gain evasion: When they make a successful Reflex save to avoid damage, they suffer no damage instead of half damage. (Natural Creatures include: Air Elemental, Animal, Earth Elemental, Fire Elemental, Magical Beast, Plant, Vermin and Water Elemental.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Balanced Attacks
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[2/4/6] Primal bonus to Attack as long as you are shapeshifted into an animal form, wielding two weapons, or unarmed. Rank 3: these attacks knock down enemies for 2 seconds on Vorpal.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Summer Smoke
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: You and nearby paty members and your nearby summons have a small chance to deal [5/10/15]d20 extra fire damage with melee, ranged or offensive spells. Cooldown: 5 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Tsunami
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Sends forth a wave of water, knocking enemies down and dealing 30 cold damage plus 1d10 per character level and 30 bludgeoning damage plus 1d10 per character level. The cold damage and knockdown are negated on a successful Fortitude save vs. 10 + Wisdom modifier + Character level. Some monsters can resist Tsunami completely, such as Water Elementals and Oozes. Cost: 50 SP. 7 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: The Oncoming Storm
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Attacks by your summoned and charmed pets, hirelings, and monsters gain a 1% chance to knockdown enemies. Rank 2: and a 1% chance to deal 20d20 Sonic damage when they attack. Rank 3: and a 1% chance to deal 20d20 Electric damage when they attack.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Paired Parry / Symetric Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +5 AC or +3% physical damage, while in animal form, unarmed, or two-weapon fighting.

EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain +5 AC, while in animal form, unarmed, or two-weapon fighting.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Symetric Strikes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Autumn Harvest
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When nearby enemies die there's a 5% chance for all party members near that enemy to receive [10/15/20]d10 positive healing. (This is not affected by spell power.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Stormrage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies damaged by your attacks or spells are also struck by lightning, dealing 10d20 electric damage, halved on a reflex save vs. DC 50. Lightning strikes up to one enemy each second. You also gain featherfall and Deflect Arrows. Duration 18 seconds. Cost: 50 SP, 12 second cooldown

DC.Name: Primal Avatar: Stormrage
DC.Description: Enemies damaged by your attacks or spells are also struck by lightning, dealing 10d20 electric damage, halved on a reflex save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Summon Dryad Elder
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Summon a Dryad Elder. She uses her magic for damage spells as well as support and healing. Costs 50 SP, 2 minute cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Chill of Winter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Enemies that damage you or nearby allies with melee attacks have a 20% chance to become chilled, receiving 1d20 cold and 1d20 rust damage every two seconds and slowing their attack and movement speed by [5/15/25]% for 20 seconds. This damage can stack up to 10 times. 5 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Spirit Boon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Temporarily gain +2 Primal bonus to all physical abilities (Str, Dex, Con) or mental abilities (Int, Wis, Cha).

EnhancementSelection.Name: Natural Evasion
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Evasion while in animal form, unarmed, or two-weapon fighting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Avatar of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Major Form: You become an Avatar of Nature Every 6 seconds, you gain +1 size, +2 Strength, +2 Constitution, a large bonus to damage based on size, and lose some movement speed and cannot jump or cast spells. These bonuses increase up to size 4. Once at size 4, you stay there for 12 seconds before reverting back to your normal form. You may toggle off the stance to end the form early. Size 1+: +50 Size bonus to PRR Size 2+: When you attack enemies they become poisoned, taking 2d10 poison damage every 2 seconds for several seconds. This poison stacks up to 5 times. Size 3+: Enemies attacking you have a chance to become diseased, dealing 1d4 Constitution damage every two seconds for 10 seconds. Size 4: The ground shakes when you put your foot down. Your third attack while standing still knocks down nearby enemies and deals extra bludgeoning damage in an area. You can only be in one Major Form at a time.

Stance.Name: Avatar of Nature
Stance.Description: You become an Avatar of Nature Every 6 seconds, you gain +1 size, +2 Strength, +2 Constitution, a large bonus to damage based on size, and lose some movement speed and cannot jump or cast spells. These bonuses increase up to size 4. Once at size 4, you stay there for 12 seconds before reverting back to your normal form. You may toggle off the stance to end the form early. Size 1+: +50 Size bonus to PRR Size 2+: When you attack enemies they become poisoned, taking 2d10 poison damage every 2 seconds for several seconds. This poison stacks up to 5 times. Size 3+: Enemies attacking you have a chance to become diseased, dealing 1d4 Constitution damage every two seconds for 10 seconds. Size 4: The ground shakes when you put your foot down. Your third attack while standing still knocks down nearby enemies and deals extra bludgeoning damage in an area. You can only be in one Major Form at a time.
