EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +1 Sneak Attack die, +10 Melee Power, and +6 Ranged Power for each level of Shadowdancer, including this one.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: For 30 seconds you gain: Full movement speed while sneaking +5 Attack bonus to-hit with Sneak Attacks +2 Sneak Attack dice +3 Hide +3 Move Silently.

Stance.Name: Shadow Training II
Stance.Description: Activate: For 30 seconds you gain: Full movement speed while sneaking +5 Attack bonus to-hit with Sneak Attacks +2 Sneak Attack dice +3 Hide +3 Move Silently.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: You generate 20% less melee and ranged threat.

Stance.Name: Shadow Training III
Stance.Description: Toggle to generate 20% less melee and ranged threat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Activate this ability to use Shadow Walk up to 5 times per rest. Also, while using weapons that qualify for Weapon Finesse, you gain 3% Profane bonus to your chance to doublestrike.
This doublestrike bonus applies to attacks made by a Dagger, Handaxe, Kama, Kukri, Light Hammer, Light Mace, Light Pick, Rapier, Short Sword, Sickle, or while Unarmed or in Druid animal form. Cooldown: 45 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Training V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to use Dimension Door up to 5 times per rest. The cooldown for Shadow Training II's ability is reduced to 3 minutes. Cooldown: 1 minute 5 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You now have Evasion. (When you make a successful Reflex save to avoid damage, you suffer no damage instead of half damage.)
You also gain +2 Assassinate DC. In addition, when you roll a natural 20 on a melee or ranged attack, you envelop the target in shadow, granting it a 5% vulnerability to physical damage and removing its sneak attack immunity for a short duration, if applicable.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Stealthy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are at home and nearly undetectable in the shadows. You gain +[2/4/6] to Hide, Move Silently and your Assassinate ability. Rank 3: You can now Hide in Plain Sight. (At all times while sneaking, conditions are treated as two 'eyes' better - you can hide even in plain daylight, and it takes opponents longer to detect you.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Lance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Throws three spears made of solidified shadows at an enemy. Each deals [4/6/8]d8 + [18/24/30] unholy damage and blinds the target it if fails a Fortitude save (DC [14/16/18] + Character level + Dex/Int modifier + Assassinate DC bonuses). this damage scales with 400% of the higher of your Melee and Ranged Power. Cooldown: 30/20/10 seconds

DC.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Lance
DC.Description: hrows three spears made of solidified shadows at an enemy. Each deals [4/6/8]d8 + [18/24/30] unholy damage and blinds the target it if fails a Fortitude save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Acrobatic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: you are incredibly nimble and light on your feet. You gain +[2/4/6] Balance, Jump and Tumble and a +[3/6/9] bonus to Reflex while tumbling.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Technician
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your expertise in subtefuge makes you alert and capable of neutralizing almost any lock or trap. You gain +[2/4/6] to Search, Spot, Disable Device, and Open Lock, as well as a +[2/4/6] bonus to attacks rolls when flanking enemies.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Escape Notice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are capable of blending in to your surroundings so effectively that your enemies can no longer target you. This ability triggers a Diplomacy effect that uses your Hide skill instead. Cooldown: 1 minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Lithe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Reflex Saves, Armor Class, and Light Armor Maximum Dexterity Bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Skill Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your training in a wide variety of disciplines grants you +1 to all skills. This stacks with other forms of Skill Mastery.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Cloak yourself in darkness, granting temporary immunity to light and negative damage for 5 minutes or until 120 damage have been absorbed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee or Ranged Attack

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Meld Into Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: By merging with the darkness itself, you gain a +100% Enhancement Bonus to dodge for [9/12/15] seconds that ignores your dodge cap. Cooldown: 2 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Grim Precision
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are familiar with how to find chinks in an enemy's armor, as well as how to compensate for an evasive opponent. You now bypass [5/10/15]% enemy fortification and [1/2/3]% enemy Dodge rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Improved Invisibility
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You turn invisible for [10/20/30] seconds. Attacking does not break this effect. After it wears off, you retain partial concealment for a time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Pierce the Gloom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are accustomed to seeing clearly even in the darkest conditions. Activate this ability to clear any blindness effect on yourself. For 30 seconds afterwards you always hit except when you roll a 1 on your attack roll. Cooldown: 2 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Manipulation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain control of a target through its own shadow, manupilating it as though it were a puppet into doing your bidding. You Dominate the target for 1 minute if it fails a Will save (DC 10 + character level + Dex/Int modifier + Assassination DC bonuses), after which it is subject to instant death if it fails a Fortitude save (DC 10 + character level + Dex/Int modifier + assassination DC Bonuses). Cooldown: 3 minutes

DC.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Manipulation (Domination)
DC.Description: Gain control of a target through its own shadow, manupilating it as though it were a puppet into doing you bidding. You Dominate the target for 1 minute if it fails a Will save

DC.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Manipulation (Death)
DC.Description: Gain control of a target through its own shadow, manupilating it as though it were a puppet into doing you bidding. You Dominate the target for 1 minute if it fails a Will save

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Untouchable
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +3% Dodge, +1 Critical Damage Multiplier on rolls of 19-20.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Executioner's Strike/Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and Ranged Attack. Active Ability: Melee or ranged attack. Perform an attack with +[1/2/3][W] damage, +1 Critical Threat Range and +1 Critical Damage Multiplier. On hit: You have a 35% chance to kill a living target instantly if the target fails a Fortitude save (DC 7 + Character level + Dex/Int modifier + Assassinate DC). Even on successful save target takes an additional [50/75/100] damage from this attack. Cooldown: 30 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Description: Perform a Melee attack with +[1/2/3][W] damage, +1 Critical Threat Range and +1 Critical Damage Multiplier. Even on successful save target takes an additional [50/75/100] damage from this attack.

Even on successful save target takes an additional [50/75/100] damage from this attack.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Sealed Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Repeated exposure to the Plane of Shadow has taught you ways to protect your life force - you have become immunity to energy drain.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Consume
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Create a field around yourself that lasts 10 seconds. Every 2 seconds, the aura causes one nearby corporeal enemy to be devoured by its own shadow and die or causes 80 to 120 damage. A successful Fortitude save vs. (DC 10 + Dex/Int modifier + character level + Asassinate DC bonuses) negates the death effect. You are free to perform other action while the aura is active. Cooldown: 3 minutes

DC.Name: Consume
DC.Description: Create a field around yourself that lasts 10 seconds. Every 2 seconds, the aura causes one nearby cororeal enemy to be devoured by its own shadow and die or causes 80 to 120 damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Form
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Major Form: Shroud yourself with darkness and assume many traits of a shadow. While in this form, you gain 25% incorpreality (and ignore incorpreal miss chance), float as if affected by featherfall, have bonuses to Hide, Move Silently and Tumble, and deal strength damage on all melee and ranged critical hits. When tumbling, you vanish into a cloud of black smoke and can pass through enemies while doing so. You also take double damage from Light effects.
You can only be in one Major Form at a time. Cooldown: 1 minute

Stance.Name: Shadow Form
Stance.Description: Shroud yourself with darkness and assume many traits of a shadow. While in this form, you gain 25% incorpreality (and ignore incorpreal miss chance), float as if affected by featherfall, have bonuses to Hide, Move Silently and Tumble, and deal strength damage on all melee and ranged critical hits. When tumbling, you vanish into a cloud of black smoke and can pass through enemies while doing so. You also take double damage from Light effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Dark Imbuement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For 30 seconds you deal an extra 9d6 unholy damage with every melee or ranged strike (this scales with 200% of the higher of Melee or Ranged Power), you gain +15 Melee and Ranged Power, +2 Sneak Attack Dice, the effective range of your melee attacks increases dramatically, and your ranged attacks have a 30% chance to explode, dealing 18d6 unholy damage to all enemies in a large radius around your target (this scales with 200% Ranged Power). Cooldown: 2 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Favor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain 100 SP and proficiency with longbows and shortbows and +1 to attack and damage with ranged weapons. You gain Druid and Ranger caster levels equal to your Shiradi level if you have any levels in those classes. Each level of Shiradi Champion, including this one, grants +10 Ranged Power.
Each time you Vorpal with ranged and thrown attacks you gain Favor of the Fey. You gain Favor of the Fey 7% of the time you cast offensive spells.
Favor of the Fey: +1 Luck bonus to Ranged Attacks and +1 Diplomacy. This stacks up to 10 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Visions
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and damage with ranged weapons, +5 Spell Power, +5 Search. You automatically detect nearby secret doors with a DC of 45 or lower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Favorable Winds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to attack and damage with ranged weapons. Your ranged and thrown attacks and offensive spells have a 7% chance to deal 5d10 additional sonic damage. This damage scales with 200% Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Sixth Sense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 attack and damage with ranged weapons. +5 Spell Power, +5 Listen. You bypass 20% Dodge and have Ghost Touch.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Favorable Wind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to attack and damage with ranged weapons. Favorable Winds upgraded to 7% chance to deal 10d10 additional sonic damage. This damage scales with 200% Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your ranged and thrown attacks and offensive spells have a 7% chance to deal 2d100 extra force damage. This damage scales wih 200% Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Stay Frosty
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Shiradi Ranged Stance: Ranged and thrown attacks and offensive spells have a 7% chance to deal 3d[10/20] extra cold damage, and have a 20% chance to slow enemies by 50% for 10 seconds. This Cold damage scales with 200% Ranged Power. Cooldown: 5 seconds. Passive: +[3/6] Listen and Spot.

Stance.Name: Stay Frosty
Stance.Description: Shiradi Ranged Stance: Ranged and thrown attacks and offensive spells have a 7% chance to deal 3d[10/20] extra cold damage and slow movement speed for [5/10] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Wild Shots
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Hurl nine daggers in a wide arc in front you. Each deals [10/15/20]d20 piercing damage that scales with 200% Ranged Power. Enemies hit by daggers are immune to further hits from Wild Shots for 5 seconds. Cooldown: [30/20/15] seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Healing Spring
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Nearby allies heal 1d100 positive energy every [60/40/20] seconds for five minutes. Usable once per rest. Cooldown: 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Illusion of Well Being

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Stay Good
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Shiradi Ranged Stance: Ranged and thrown attacks and offensive spells have a 7% chance to deal 3d[10/20/20] extra light damage. The Light damage scales with 200% Ranged Power. Rank 3: Ranged and throwing weapons you equip are considered Good. Cooldown: 5 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: In the Weeds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Dodge, +[2/4/6] Hide. After standing still for a few seconds you gain +1 Dodge, +3 Hide, +3 PRR and +3 MRR. Ranks 2/3: This can stack [2/3] times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Stand and Deliver

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Audience with the Queen
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Once per Rest, you can spiritiually pop off for some tea with your lady, the Queen of Summer, returning a few seconds later. Unusable while incapacitated.
Depending on your Diplomacy with the Queen, you may experience effects either favorable or ill, though the tea is always delicious. (Diplomacy check) Diplomacy DC: 20 - Success, 40 - Critical Success. Cooldown: 2 minutes 34 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Rain of Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Call upon a thousand invisible fairies to rain pointy wooden death around you!
Every second for thirty seconds each enemy around you has a 20% to take 10d100 damage. Damage may consist of up to 10 damage types. This damage scales with 200% Ranged Power. Cooldown: 3 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Hunt's End
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your next shot with a Ranged or Thrown weapon has +400% damage and +16 to its Critical Threat Range. This shot ignores incorpreality. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyielding Sentinel: Vigor of Battle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 40 spell points, and each level of Unyielding Sentinel grants +5 Melee Power, +3 Ranged Power, +40 Spell points, and +1 Cleric, Favored Soul, and Paladin caster levels if you have any levels in those classes. +50 HP. You gain +1 Intimidate for each level of Unyielding Sentinel, including level 0. Sentinel Stance: Activate to enjoy the Vigor of Battle. +20 Positive Healing Amplification +50 HP Enemies you hit gain Healing Touch for 3 seconds, which grants 10 temporary HP to targets they attack. (You can only be in one Sentinel Stance at a time.) Cooldown 20 seconds

Stance.Name: Vigor of Battle
Stance.Description: Sentinel Stance: Activate to enjoy the Vigor of Battle. +20 Positive Healing Amplification, +50 HP. Enemies you hit gain Healing Touch for 3 seconds, which grants 10 temporary HP to targets they attack.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyielding Sentinel: Unbreakable
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive bonuses: +5 Sacred bonus to Natural Armor. You gain the Diehard feat. Sentinel Stance: Activate to become Unbreakable. You gain DR 10/Epic. (You can only be in one Sentinel Stance at a time.) Cooldown: 20 seconds

Stance.Name: Unbreakable
Stance.Description: You gain DR 10/epic.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyielding Sentinel: Stand Against the Tide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Passive bonus: +2 Attack. Sentinel Stance: Activate to Stand Against the Tide. +1 Attack Damage +60% threat generation +5% fortification +1 to Fortitude, Relfex and Will saving throws
This bonus stacks up to five times while standing still. (You can only be in one Sentinel Stance at a time.) Cooldown: 20 seconds

Stance.Name: Stand Against the Tide
Stance.Description:
Sentinel Stance: Activate to Stand Against the Tide. +1 Attack Damage, +60% threat generation, +5% fortification, +1 to Fortitude, Relfex and Will saving throws
This bonus stacks up to five times while standing still.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyielding Sentinel: Heed No Pain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive bonus: +10 Physical Resistance. +20 additional Physical Resistance while Unbreakable.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyielding Sentinel: Steadfast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive bonuses: +2 Attack, +1 bonus to all saves. You cannot be knocked down while Standing Against the Tide.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyielding Sentinel: Divine Energy Resistance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and nearby allies gain +35 Enhancement bonus to resist Enegy for 1 minute per character level (Includes Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire and Sonic) Spell-Line Ability: This ability benefits from your Metamagic Feats (such as Quicken) without paying the normal additional spell point cost. Cooldown: 6 seconds Cost: [225/150/75] spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your shield's AC contribution is increased by [15/30/50]%.
